41004032	Wankuyeim ilivan, ilana, “Kweitan kabebay ma̱wan towen kuliganes va̱gan bukukwakins Yowbad nakaleiwag. Adok ma̱wana tipol kaytul-nen, bitasop singay kakit, tage beisob mo bimlavag kay avakaein, yayagen kawka̱veks; man biyoyows bimimeis biwlules sibwan wayayagein.”
41004033	Nakabebay ma̱wan singay babaw ansinap ikatpel isekes. Aveiyag ikadilokes bikakins mo isekes ma̱wan.
41004034	Nag anilivan didumwal isekes, nag; kabebay-wan. Wankuyeim siney navamul tatonen, tasiyas-wan mo ilik va̱gan silawun meiveka kabebay bikakins.
41004035	Yam towen kwayav, Yeisuw wa̱wag nises, idibakes, ilana, “Kumeis kutouws tadopels, taneis palatan.”
41004036	Itouws tasiyas, ilisawes gamag babaw nisesus waven mo idopels bineis palatan, ikavetans sisiyas mwasanin wag.
41004037	Isisawls, bwaw avakaein ilivatus, soup inay-o; kakita bimukul wag.
41004038	Togo Yeisuw nikow abeikun, nisen wawawun wag, imasis kangagay, mo inekes, iwgunis, ilansa, “Tamwey, kukit, tabta kukwakin kakita bitamta̱mats?”
41004039	Iligen, ikit, idibek yag son kaysay, ilana, “Deisa! Beitay!” Yag mo idabab, niwal avakaein.
41004040	Ikous, mo idibakes tasiyas, ilana, “Wawun amipwa̱yat? Adok nag kusimounids waseg yey, ne?”
41004041	Singaya igoulus, sisiyas illivans, ilansa, “Amata taw towen? Idibakew yag son kaysay, mo ikanawes aygan.”
41005001	Idopels ineis palatan, ilugs ven Gelasin waseg.
41005002	Yeisuw ibus, in wanakaew, mo takayeiluw teitan isap, imek. Bo ilisow alawag towen takunumwan, inoun imek Yeisuw.
41005003	-
41005004	Taw towen nag ivag nabunatum, immasisa wakalawag. Nag teitan gamag kadilok bitawtoun biyous taw towen, biyawen sen waseg. Tut babaw niyawwanis sen waseg o kaken nikiptukwes amweilok waseg, tage ivatay, iwlitun sen, iwut amweilok kaken waseg mo isawl. Tut babaw ma̱wan-wan. Nag teitan gamag kadilok vayuwein biyous.
41005005	Mapuna nises wakalawag o wa̱koy, biwkuwak-wana beiyam oko beiboug, mo biwekey dakul bikow, tatonena-wan biwaway wa̱won.
41005006	Tage Yeisuw ilug im, ikin kadiveiyov, isawl im, bikulul kid wamatan.
41005007	Aygan avakaein iwak, ilana, “Aveiyag bukunuwakeig Yeisuw, ya̱koum Tamam Yowbad walba̱lab. Kunuway Tamam; mata kuweig, ke?”
41005008	Anilivan ma̱wan peinan Yeisuw bo idibek yeiluw bilisow kid gamag towen, binoun.
41005009	Yeisuw ikatigan yeiluw ilana, “Yeiluw ya̱koum, amiyagam?” Iw to yeiluw, ilana, “Yagag Kamimet, peinan meiveka yakamey ka̱siw nakases.”
41005010	Mo igilagel waseg Yeisuw, ilana, “Awoum kwayabem bakan kadiveiyov.”
41005011	Tage bwaloud babaw ikamkwams awuyow wa̱koy.
41005012	Siyas yeiluw igilagels, ilansa, “Kwayabem bakan bwaloud wanuwes.”
41005013	Itam, ilana, “Kuweis.” Iweis gog, isiws wanuwes bwaloud, mo isisawls, ineis koy tigtageg waseg mo ikalka̱louws inineis wayvagam, iwgweles, bwaloud singay babaw, mamagina akweiy tawsan.
41005014	Tasiyas gog tamtakavateins aleis, isawls, ikamteles youd towen wawnovek o vena babaw wasigeis. Iliganes gamag babaw, bisaps kid bineis ikines.
41005015	Isaps, inekes Yeisuw, ikines towen takayeiluw bo ibwein, bo isikam anakweim, nissin wadadan. Bo iyow nuwes peinan ikakins yeiluw babaw neisiws wanuwan taw towen; nagein gog bo ibwein.
41005016	Gamag mwasanin nisesus, ikines takayeiluw bo ibwein, yeiluw mo iyagages bwaloud, wankuyeim mo ikamteles gamag tasiyas mwana nimeis.
41005017	Iliganes tasiyas mo igilagels waseg Yeisuw sivines bilisow siven, binoun.
41005018	Mapuna itouw wa̱wag, bo beiyum. Toge takayeiluw mtowen mwana neibwein igilagel waseg Yeisuw, sivinan kid sona bineis.
41005019	Yeisuw gog ipiyev, ilana “Nag. Bweina kuyum kun wamven, kudibakes talawom mo bikakins ama̱wan daGuyaws nikalin nuwan waseg ya̱koum, ilabeim.”
41005020	Iligen, iyum, in ika̱mat ama̱wan nivkek Yeisuw nileb. Wawnuwan ven towen Dekapolis gamag babaw iliganes, mo isom ninous.
41005021	Yeisuw siney navamul idopels, iyums ineis palatan; babaw gamag iliganes, ikatuyouns imekes Yeisuw, igaw nises walasin yevagam avakaein.
41005022	-
41005023	Isap tanuwagan sinagog teitan, yagan Yelos, ikin Yeisuw, ikulul avakaein wamatan, igilagel, ilana, “Natug kuda̱vin ankatoun avakaein. Kum kusen namam wa̱won kuyamov.”
41005024	Yeisuw itam, mo inounas ineis son taw towen. Singay babaw gamag ibwa̱kuns waseg, ipapeps wa̱won.
41005025	Inounas, na̱tan vin nakatoun inek Yeisuw. Ankatoun peinan buya̱vin iwta̱wout sinawatan kweiy bweilim; nag imda̱mad.
41005026	Doket babaw iyyokons, bo nag. Vin na̱wen namoney igimwelena bo iyakous; tage doket tasiyas nag ilabes bwein vin mana̱wen, ankatoun bo ivakaeina singay.
41005027	Mana̱wen vin bo iligen bulagan Yeisuw, isiw wanuwan gamag babaw, ikikun ee... mo ikabkwen anakweim matan.
41005028	Idoki misinaka bikabkwen anakweim matan mo beibwein.
41005029	Ikabkwen, nuwanaw mo imad buya̱vin; isimkwen wa̱won, ikakina bo ibwein.
41005030	Tage Yeisuw isimkwen natawtoun bo ilisow won, itouvin wanuwein gamag babaw, ilana, “Kal ikabkwen agukweim?”
41005031	Iweis navamul, ilansa, “Gamag singay babaw ipapeps wa̱wom. Aveiyag wawun kulana, ‘Kal ikabkwaneig’?”
41005032	Tage Yeisuw ivvatus gamag babaw, bikin kid kal nikabkwen.
41005033	Vin mana̱wen ikakina bo ibwein won, anpwa̱yat seikwan, tage inek Yeisuw, ikulul wamatan, ikamtel anilivan iyakous.
41005034	Iwa̱ge Yeisuw, idibek ilana, “Vin ya̱koum, nukusimounid waseg yey, mapuna bo kubwein. Mwa̱saw waseg kunoun, peinan amkwatoun bo ikous.”
41005035	Igawa illivan, teitan gog gamag meinoy neim tanuwagan sinagog wanbunatum, idibek, ilana, “Natum bo ikanig. Awoum kweitan wotet kusek takatimlakay towen.”
41005036	Yeisuw gog iligen, idibek tanuwagan sinagog, ilana, “Awoum bikubukub nuwam, bweina bukusimounid.”
41005037	Yeisuw ilana, “Awoum kumeis tababaw yakamiy. Bweina yey sigwey gunavamul tasiyas Pita, Yemes son bwadan Yon, o gwad taman. Misinaka amateinim.”
41005038	-
41005039	Isaps tanuwagan sinagog wanven, ikines tavva̱lams ivva̱lams, talloupids illoupids, ages avakaein. Isiw, ilana, “Aveiyag wawun kuvva̱lams, agamiy avakaein? Gwad na̱wen na-ikanig; immasis-wan.”
41005040	Tasiyas gog igagigs issiba̱wes. Yeisuw mo idibakes babaw bineis watoulan; misinaka gwad taman inan, sisiyas navamul asteitoun sisiy binekes gwad nimsik-yay.
41005041	Yeisuw inek gwad towen, iyous naman, ilana, “Talita koum.” (Takativini gog bein aga-Muyuw, mamagina, “Gwade, adibakeim kukit.”)
41005042	Gwad na̱wen nuwanaw itamanaw inoun, anbweilim mamagina sinawatan kweiy. Ikines, singay isom ninous tasiyas.
41005043	To go Yeisuw anilivan tawtoun idibakes, ilana, “Awoum kwamteles youd towen”, mo ilana, “Kan kusekes nitumiy beikam.”
41006001	Yeisuw ilisow ven towen, iyum in wanven tatonen; navamul gog ibbwa̱kuns waseg.
41006002	-
41006003	Sa̱bat waseg isilamaw nakatimlakay wasinagog. Tanganegs babaw isom ninous, ilansa, “Ama̱wan singaya isinap taw towen? Kal isek ansinap mo iwotet singay tawtoun wanaman waseg? Adok towen tawtelein amweilok, ne? Inan Meliy, budan tasiyas Yemes, Yoses, Yud, Saymon, sisiyas nunet nitasesus sidayas.” Mapuna mo ipiyaves mtowen Yeisuw.
41006004	Iw to Yeisuw, idibakes, ilana, “Vena babaw itams palopit waseg. Misinaka naven tatonen bipiyev, o taliven tasiyas wanbunatum bipiyaves.”
41006005	Mapuna ven towen waseg ta-ma̱wan biwotet tawtoun. Deisa takatouns asteiyuy isen naman wawous mo ibweins.
41006006	Bo isom nanon peinan nag bisimounids ven towen waseg.
41006007	-
41006009	Tage ita̱vin ven mwasanin, ikatimlakay. Mo idawes navamul sinawatan teiy, ikayabes asteiy asteiy bineis ven babaw; isek sitawtoun va̱gan bikayabes yeiluw; ilana, “Awoum kunamiy kukwawes wa̱ked; misinaka mikaytuk; kaeimiy awoum; amikaw awoum, mimoney awoum; misinaka sandol kuvaligaves wakikeimiy; amikweim mwayntanok.”
41006010	Ilana, “Bukuneis kweitan ven, awoum kuglagals, kukin kal wanbunatum bukusiws, bweina bukusesusa bunatum towen oko tutan bo bukuneis mo bukunounas.
41006011	“Kukin ven kweitan bipiyaveimiy, o bipiyaves amilivan, kadiloka kulisawes ven towen, kwatsa̱pis musmusan pwepway wakikeimiy bininein wasiven mo bikakins asisinap kalbaleb.”
41006012	-
41006013	Iliganes tasiyas sinawatan teiy inounas iggeiguys va̱gan gamag bikanavin ninous; o ikkayabes yeiluw babaw, o takatounsa babaw ilgubokes tagon wawous mo ibweins.
41006014	Inounas tasiyas, king towen Elod iligen bulagan, peinan babaw gamag niliganes liva̱nen Yeisuw. Gamag mwasanin idokes Yon bo ikit kanig waseg, mapuna Yeisuw nawotet singaya tawtoun.
41006015	Mwasanin gog ilansa, “Mtowen Ilaytiy.” Tage mwasanin ilansa, “Mtowen palopit ma̱wana siyas palopits kweiboug.”
41006016	Tage Elod iligen bulagan Yeisuw mo ilana, “Mtowen Yon, nabob kayon, tage bo imov vayuwein.”
41006017	-
41006018	Kweiboug Yon ikan Elod ilana, “Amsinap kalbaleb, kuvagut bwadam nakwav.” Peinan bwadan Pilip nakwav Elodiyas ivagut mtowen Elod. Yon ikanan, mo igeg nanon mtowen Elod, ikayeb natouwats iyousis Yon, iyawanis naman, isen wanuwan deil.
41006019	-
41006020	Elodiyas-vak ikamliw Yon, sivinan beiweiy. Nag gog, peinan Elod ikayus, iwen Yon, ikakina gamag tadidumwal, bwanabwein; ikayus, sivinan biligen aygan, tage Yon anilivan waseg mo iyageg nanon Elod.
41006021	Mana̱wen vin sivinan beiwey Yon, ikayamat oko Elod isagal, anva̱van sigeilin, peinan yam towen inan nikop, ikamkwam siney tasiyas gabmans sisiyas takalikays sisiyas min-Galiliy situwa̱veks.
41006022	-
41006023	Tasiyas ikamkwams imwamoums, mo isap Elodiyas natun kuda̱vin isilasal. Isilasal oko ikalin nuwes tasiyas sisiy Elod, idibek gwad mana̱wen, ilana, “Aveiyag sivinam, kulivan mo basekeim.” Itabudabod, ilana, “Magat sivinam baliv gunaven to namtakavet, palatadadan yak, palatadadan yey. Bweina kulivan mo baliv basekeim palatan.”
41006024	Gwad mana̱wen iligen, in watoulan, ikatigan inan, ilana, “Aveiyag balivan?” Iwa̱ge inan, ilana, “Kulivan busabwesan Yon, tabapta̱ysein gamags.”
41006025	Iligen, nuwanawa iyum, inek king towen, initoug, ilana, “Sivinag Yon busabwesan kusen wakabmavin mo kusekeig, mtowen tabapta̱ysein gamags.”
41006026	Iligen king towen, igeg nanon, tage nag bipiyev, peinan bo itabudabod, o tasiyas siney bo iliganes anilivan.
41006027	-
41006028	Mapuna ikayeb takaymatein bunatum teitan, ilana, “Kun kubob kayon Yon, busabwesan kudeg wakabmavin kumey.” Inoun in wa̱deil, ibob kayon Yon, busabwesan isen wakabmavin, imey, isek gwad mana̱wen; ikow, inow, isek inan.
41006029	Inavamul Yon iliganes bo iweiys, mo imeis, ikawes takaning towen, inawes, isenas wakalawag.
41006030	-
41006031	Yeisuw nagamag nikayabes mo iyums, ikatuyouns imekes Yeisuw, ika̱mats siwotet babaw o sikatimlakay babaw; mo idibakes, ilana, “Kumeis, taneis nawoud makaw, ya̱kids-wan bitayeiwas tut kadiyakus.” Peinan singay babaw gamag inounawas inounamas; ta-ma̱wan biyeiwas o beikams kan, nag.
41006032	Mapuna itouws wa̱wag, idopels ineis nawoud makaw, tasiyas-wan bisiwas.
41006033	Tage gamag babaw bo ikines nikala̱vis-o nineis. Tasiyas gog gamag babaw bo iwtusis, ilisawes siven babaw isisawls, inoys wa̱ked, bo imgwayes, Yeisuw siney navamul wankuyeim.
41006034	Ita̱lags siney navamul, ikin gamag babaw, inok nuwan, peinan ma̱wana mansiyas sip, ta-ivag sitamtakavatay, mapuna ikatimlakes sinap babaw.
41006035	-
41006036	Ikatimlakay ee... kwayav, navamul mo imekes Yeisuw, ilansa, “Ven to nawoud makaw o bo iboug, kwayabes gamag babaw, bineis ven mwasanin walasids va̱gan bigimwals kaeis beikams.”
41006037	Iw to Yeisuw ilana, “Kusekes kaeis beikams.” Tasiyas gog ikatugwans, ilansa, “Tabta bakan bakagimwal asibled lakatuy kina, bakasekes ikams, ne?”
41006038	Iwa̱ge, ilana, “Kweivin amibled? Kuneis, kukines.” Ikakins, ivinis, ilansa, “Kweinim bled, son in mwanay.”
41006039	Yeisuw mo ilivan va̱gan bisinis tasiyas wakunuwatan awuyow, kweitan bod, kweitan bod waseg.
41006040	Mapuna isinis, bod kweitan, kweitan, mwasanin lakatutan, mwasanin sinawanim.
41006041	Isinis ikous, Yeisuw mo ikow bled siyas kweinim son in mwanay, ikin walba̱lab, ikalin nuwan Yowbad waseg, mo ikikivis bled tasiyas, isekes navamul bikawes bisenas wamtes gamag, beikams. Mansiyas in-vak ikaleiwag, isekes asibabaw beikams.
41006042	Ikamkwams tasiyas, ikamuweips-wan.
41006043	Ikous, kan nikambwages ikatikunakus sinawatan kweiy kaynad, bled son in.
41006044	Tasiyas takamkwams mamagina kweinim tawsan tawaw.
41006045	Ikous, mo idibakes navamul, ilana, “Kutouws kudopels, kumugwas, kuneis palatan, ven yagan Beteseid; yey gog bases bakayabes gamag babaw.”
41006046	Ikayabes ikous, mo ikatulag in wa̱koy, initoug waseg Yowbad.
41006047	Ikala̱vis navamul, ineis watapwana yevagam avakaein; bo iboug. Tage Yeisuw anmwa̱net-wan isiwana waven.
41006048	Yeisuw ikines ikalla̱vis, kala̱lav nimeis, peinan yag itow meinoy neim wamtes. Kakita beiyam mo inoun wakunuwatan yevagam, sivinan binekes.
41006049	Tasiyas gog ikines Yeisuw wakunuwatan yevagam inoun imimeim, iwaks, aspwa̱yat, idokes kid a̱luw.
41006050	Asibabaw ikines, iwenes singay. Towen gog idibakes, ilana, “Yey. Bwein-wan. Awoum beivag amipwa̱yat.”
41006051	-
41006052	Mo itouw, inekes wa̱wag, mo idabab yag. Singay isom ninous. Ninous tasiyas keikay, peinan nag ikakins Yeisuw natawtoun silawun tut towen waseg ikow bled kweinim mo ivakamus gamag babaw.
41006053	Ikala̱vis ee... ita̱lags palatan, ven yagan Genesalet, lon ikawes ilaves in wanakaew, siwag ikot.
41006054	-
41006055	Ineis wanakaew, towous bo iwtusis, isisawls, ineis vena babaw, ikawes takatouns nimmasis wakabes, imeyes am-palawen iliganes Yeisuw nises.
41006056	Yeisuw am-palawen binoun bein, takinew wunkakit, o takinew wunovek, o takinew wanawoud, tasiyas towous mo bikawes takatouns biseinis wavtakon ven, mo binitougs va̱gan bikabkwanes matan anakweim; o kalisiy tasiyas ikabkwanes mo ibweins.
41007001	-
41007002	Wankuyeim tasiyas Palisiy sisiyas takatimlakeins kaleiwag mwasanin meinoy nimeis Yelusalem, ikatuyouns imekes Yeisuw; ikines navamul mwasanin nag iwidis nimes, tage sona ikamkwams.
41007003	-
41007004	Tasiyas gog Palisiy asisinap kweitan, sisiyas min-Yudiy babaw; kukin nimes nag biwidis beibwein, nag beikams; peinan ikikuns tammwayas asisinap waseg. Asisinap ma̱wana kukin beinoys wamaket bimeis, biwidis nimes mo beikams; kukin nag biwidis nimes nag beikams. Asisinap babaw ma̱wan, iwdiwids askwa̱vig, askunasoup, sikabmavin, o abes.
41007005	Tasiyas Palisiy sisiyas takatimlakeins kaleiwag ikines, mo ikatiga̱nes Yeisuw, ilansa, “Aveiyag wawun muvamul nag ikikunis tammwayas sikaleiwag; nimes bikibik sona ikamkwams.”
41007006	Iwa̱ge Yeisuw, mo idibakes, ilana, “Tayyaweid yakamiy! Palopit towen Isaya ilivnek livneimiy, kweiboug Yowbad anilivan ilel, bo ikunakeimiy, mamagina: ‘Gamag tasiyas isiwyoubugs wudousa mav waseg; Tage ninous nag imekeig.
41007007	Makava itapwa̱louls waseg yey, Peinan nag ikatimlakays gunakaleiwag, tage gamag mwasanin sikaleiwag ikatimlakays.’
41007008	“Yowbad nakaleiwag bo kupiyaves, tage kutams waseg gamag mwasanin sikaleiwag.”
41007009	Mo idibakes, ilana, “Singaya kusinaps, tage kupiyaves Yowbad nakaleiwag, mo kukwatilawos mikaleiwag tatineimiy.
41007010	“Kweiboug Moses ilivan Yowbad nakaleiwag mamagina: ‘Kuvna̱ses timmiyas o inmiyas,’ o ‘Kukin kal biyeg taman o inan, kuweiys beimat.’
41007011	Tage yakamiy mikaleiwag mamagina: Gamag bweina bidibek taman o inan, bilana, ‘Bo akatibom youd towen silma̱nin Yowbad; ta-ma̱wan basekeim yak.’
41007012	Mamagina kutams va̱gan bikamgwayes taman o inan.
41007013	“Amikikun towen waseg bo kugulekwes Yowbad nakaleiwag. Amisinap babaw ma̱wan.”
41007014	Yeisuw mo idawes gamag babaw, isineikimas, idibakes, ilana, “Babaw yakamiy, kuliganes agulivan mo bukukwakins.
41007015	“Nag aveiyag watoulan gamag beisiw wa̱won biyageg, nag. Tage aveiyag wanuwan gamag bisap bein wamnat mo biyageg gamag towen.”
41007017	Ilivan ikous, ilisawes gamag babaw, inoun in wanbunatum. Navamul mo ika̱tiganes Yeisuw, sivines kid bikakins nakabebay silawun.
41007018	-
41007019	Iw to Yeisuw, idibakes, ilana, “Adok yakamiy-vak tatagouwaws yakamiy! Youd babaw watoulan gamag beisiw wa̱won, nag biyabik, nag. Peinan nag beisiw wananon; misinaka in watoubun wankuyeim mo bipwal bein wamnat.” Yeisuw anilivan towen waseg ikabwein kan babaw; nag kweitan bwaboum, nag.
41007020	-
41007022	Wankuyeim mo ilivan, ilana, “Aveiyag wanuwan gamag bisap bein wamnat, youd towen biyabik gamag. Peinan wanuwan gamag bispuy nakanuway kalbaleb, subwan, veinaw, katumat gamag, kanavay mav, mitmwamon, kameiliw, katadividav, kalimwa̱saw, silponay, livan kalbaleb, kaya̱pam, sinap kalbaleb.
41007023	“Sinap tasiyas kalbaleb wanuwan gamag bisap mo biyabik gamag towen.”
41007024	Ikous, Yeisuw itamanaw in wawnuwan ven Ta̱yil; mo isiw in bunatum kweitan, nag sivinan gamag bikakins; nag gog, ta-ma̱wan bisowum.
41007025	-
41007026	Vinen-Saloponis na̱tan, nag vinen-Yudiy; tage bo iligen bulagan Yeisuw nises ven Ta̱yil waseg, mo inoun inek silma̱nin bikulul binitoug waseg, peinan yeiluw neiweiy natun kuda̱vin, sivinan kid bikayeb yeiluw binoun; ilana, “Kum kwayeb yeiluw towen neiweiy natug.”
41007027	Iw to Yeisuw, ilana, “Wanmugwana bavakamus gamagal. Awoum bakow gamagal kaeis basekes mansiyas awuk beikams, awoum.” Ilivan ma̱wan peinan min-Yudiy idokes tobwag ven gimgilis mamagina awuk.
41007028	Mana̱wen vin ikatimop aygan, igilagel, ilana, “O guyaw, mansiyas awuk-vak waskawan teibol beikams musmusan gamagal asibled ikalka̱louws.”
41007029	Iw to Yeisuw ilana, “Amlivan bwein. Kunoun kun, kukin natum, yeiluw bo ilisow.”
41007030	Inoun in wanbunatum, iban natun nimmasis wa̱keb, yeiluw bo ilisow.
41007031	Wankuyeim ilisow wunsiyas ven walasin Ta̱yil, ikanapel Saydon, in yevagam avakaein yagan Galiliy, wawnuwan Dekapolis.
41007032	Mo imeyes takakon teitan, anilivan wadadan-wan, ilansa, “Tab kadilok bukusen namam wa̱won, takakon towen.”
41007033	-
41007034	Yeisuw itok takakon towen, ilisawes gamag babaw, mo teigan paley ikawgil didin waseg, mo giwun waseg iwlik mayen; ikous iyey, ikin walba̱lab, singay igeg nanon, mo ilana, “Epipat.” (Aga-Muyuw waseg mamagina “Kwaliyow.”)
41007035	Nuwanaw ikaliyow teigan, mayen ibwein, anilivan mo ididumwal.
41007036	-
41007037	Yeisuw gog idibakes, ilana, “Awoum kwamteles gunawotet towen, awoum.” Anilivan babaw ma̱wan, tage nag ikanawes, singaya illivans-wan inawotet bulagan. Singaya isom ninous, ilansa, “Inawotet babaw singay bwein. Takakons ivag ibweins mo iliganes livan, o tasiyas asilivan wadadan ivag mo ilivans bwein.”
41008001	-
41008002	Misiya̱mun towen, babaw gamag nikatuyouns nimekes vayuwein Yeisuw, nag ivag kaeis beikams, mo idawes navamul, imekes, idibakes, ilana, “Bo inok nuwag gamag tasiyas babaw nikanatouns waseg yey, kaeis gog nag.
41008003	“Kukin bakayabes bineis wasiven asimoun-wan, adok bisoumats wa̱ked. Peinan mwasanin siven kadiveiyov.”
41008004	Iweis navamul tasiyas, ilansa, “Ven to nawoud makaw; ama̱wan bitavakamus gamag tasiyas? Kan gog nag.”
41008005	Iw to Yeisuw, ilana, “Akweivin amibled?” Ilansa, “Kweinim kweiy.”
41008006	Idibakes gamag babaw, ilana, “Kusinis wapwepway.” Wankuyeim mo ikow bled siyas kweinim kweiy, ikalin nuwan Yowbad waseg, ikivis bled siyas, isekes navamuls va̱gan bivaganes; mo ikawes isekes babaw gamag wasigeis.
41008007	Asiyin mwanayun-wan nisesus, ikow wanaman, mo initoug Yowbad waseg, ikalin nuwan peinan in. Ikous, mo idibakes navamul va̱gan bikawes bisekes babaw gamag, mo isekes.
41008008	Babaw gamag ikamkwams, bo ikamuweips, mo ikatikunakus kan towen nikambwages, mo idagis wagamwat, imlavag gibsinim gibsiy.
41008009	-
41008010	Ikous, mo ikayabes tasiyas kweivas tawsan gamag, inounas; mtowen siney navamul itouws wa̱wag, idopels ineis ven Dalmanut.
41008011	Tasiyas Palisiy mwasanin mo inekes Yeisuw, ikammnimans, mamagina iyakwanes, ilansa, “Kuvag muwotet bitawtoun ma̱wana naman mulin Yowbad.”
41008012	Yeisuw gog singay igeg nanon, ilana, “Gudwouvaws yakamiy sivinamiy bukukines Yowbad naman mulin,” mo itabudabod, ilana, “Nag bukukines, nag.”
41008013	Vayuwein mo ilisawes, itouws wa̱wag, idopels ineis palatan.
41008014	Tage bo inumlaves kaeis; misinaka katanoka bled wa̱wag.
41008015	Yeisuw mo iguyes, ilana, “Kuvna̱seimiy. Kadiloka kupiyaves tasiyas Palisiy asiyist o Elod anayist.”
41008016	Iliganes, idibakes sisiyas, ilansa, “Adok anakabebay, peinan tanumlaves adableds.”
41008017	Yeisuw gog ikakina ninous, idibakes, ilana, “Wawun kulansa, ‘Tanumlaves adableds’? Singay tatagouwaws yakamiy; ninoumiy nag.
41008018	-
41008019	“Sam mitamiy tage nag kuwtusis; sam tigamiy tage nag kuliganes beibwein. Adok nag kunuways akivis kweinim bled silma̱nin kweinim tawsan gamag, kweivin kaynad kan nikambwages mo kwatikunakus, ne?” Ilansa, “Sinawatan kadiney.”
41008020	Vayuwein Yeisuw ikatiga̱nes, ilana, “Wankuyeim akivis bled kweinim kweiy silma̱nin kweivas tawsan gamag, kweivin gamwat kan nikambwages mo kwatikunakus, ne?” Ilansa, “Gibsinim gibsiy.”
41008021	Iwa̱ge Yeisuw, ilana, “Igawa tatagouwaws yakamiy!”
41008022	Wankuyeim Yeisuw inoun in Beteseid, imeyes takatoun teitan, ilansa, “Tabta bukwabkwen matan toukwaw towen, ne?”
41008023	Yeisuw iligen, ivakaben, inow watoulan ven, igus matan, naman waseg ikabkwen, ikatigan, ilana, “Kukin tan?”
41008024	Itamnow matan, ilana, “Akin gamag mwasanin, tage askakin ma̱wana amweilok ininounas.”
41008025	Vayuwein mo ikabkwen matan, mo ikinbunik, bo ibwein.
41008026	Yeisuw mo ikayeb beiyum bein wanbunatum, ilana, “Awoum bukun waven.”
41008027	Wankuyeim Yeisuw siney navamul ita̱vins wunsiyas ven wawnuwan Sisaliy, guyaw towen Pilip nikaleiwag wasigeis. Inounas wa̱ked, ikatiga̱nes navamuls, ilana, “Gamag idokeigs kal yey?”
41008028	Iweis tasiyas, ilansa, “Gamag mwasanin idokes ya̱koum tabibapta̱ysein gamags towen Yon; tage mwasanin idokeims Ilaytiy yak, o mwasanin idokeims ya̱koum palopit teitan.”
41008029	Yeisuw mo ikatiga̱nes, ilana, “Tage yakamiy, kudokeigs kal yey?” Iw to Pita, ilana, “Yak Kelis yak.”
41008030	Mapuna Yeisuw idibakes, ilana, “Awoum gamag mwasanin bikakinsa yey Mesay Kelis yey; awoum kwamteleigs; awoum.”
41008031	Wankuyeim mo ikatimlakes, ilana, “Gimgilitoun yey, kadiloka a̱bag bigeg singay; kadiloka bipiyaveigs tasiyas tammwayas sisiyas tanuwgwes lun situwa̱vek sisiyas takatimlakeins kaleiwag, mo bikatimateigs; yam kweitoun mo ba̱kit vayuwein.”
41008032	Anilivan towen kamnat; toge Pita ika̱nan, ilana, “Awoum kulivan ma̱wan.”
41008033	Yeisuw itouvin, ikin navamuls, ikan Pita, ilana, “Kusineikik ya̱koum Seitan, amsinap ma̱wana gamag asisinap, nag ma̱wan Yowbad ansinap.”
41008034	Ikous, mo idawes gamag babaw sisiyas navamuls, ikatuyouns imekes, mo idibakes, ilana “Kavel tan yakamiy sivinan bibkunig, kadiloka bipiyev nakaleiwag tatonen mo bikokew anklos tatonen va̱gan mo bibkunig.
41008035	“Kavel-tan yakamiy sivinan bikayus mwamovan mo biyamkwen, tage kukin biyamkwen mwamovan peinan gunawotet, mo bises bwein.
41008036	“Kukin gog bikow wuliyoug meivek-wan, ven watinow wuliyougwan, mo biyamkwen mwamovan, adok nag bimwa̱saw, nag.
41008037	“Aveiyag mo bisek maysan silma̱nin mwamovan, ne? Nag.
41008038	“Tut towen gudwouvaws tappeyaws o asisinap babaw kalbaleb. Tage kukin kal bimsin agulivan mamagina bimseneig Gimgilitoun yey; o yey-vak ma̱wan igaw tamag mititeilin waseg ba̱yum bam sigwey Yowbad nataka̱yobs, mo beivag agumwasin gamag towen waseg.”
41009001	Mo idibakes, ilana, “Mounid adibakeimiy, mwasanin yakamiy nukutablawaws wasalig nag bukukwanigs tage bukusesus-wan mo bukukines Yowbad nakaleiwag beim, son natawtoun.”
41009002	-
41009003	Yam kweinim katanok ikous, Yeisuw mo itokes Pita, Yemes, Yon, ikatulags ineis koy avakaein wakunuwatan; tasiyas-wan isiwas. Wamtes mo ivag ankakin kweitan, anakweim ivag ankakin gimagim, pwapwa̱kaw igegayous; nag teitan gamag ven watinow anakweim bivag pwapwaka̱wun ma̱wan, nag.
41009004	Mo ikines Ilaytiy son Moses isaps, sisiy Yeisuw illivans.
41009005	-
41009006	Iw to Pita, idibek Yeisuw, ilana, “Tamwey, bo tamwa̱saws peinan tasesus towen; bakawlul bunatoun bwan, bunatan ya̱koum, buniyuwein Moses, buntounun Ilaytiy.” Anilivan ma̱wana illivan mav; na-ikakin aveiyag bilivan, peinan aspwa̱yat.
41009007	Mo lov kweitan ilumwes tasiyas, aygan teitan iliganes wa̱lov, ilana, “Mtowen natug bwanabwein, kuliganes aygan.”
41009008	Nuwanaw mo ikins palatan palatan, makaw; misinaka Yeisuw sisiy.
41009009	Wankuyeim iwloubus, idibakes, ilana, “Youd towen nukukines, awoum kwamteles gamag mwasanin wasigeis ee... Gimgilitoun yey bakanig, ba̱kit vayuwein, mo kwamteles wasigeis.”
41009010	Youd towen nag ikamteles gamag mwasanin wasigeis; tage tasiyas-wan illivans, idokes aveiyag silawun anilivan towen, “Bakanig mo ba̱kit vayuwein.”
41009011	Iweis tasiyas, ilansa, “Aveiyag wawun tasiyas takatimlakeins kaleiwag asilivan, ilansa, ‘Kadiloka Ilaytiy bimgwey Mesay waseg’?”
41009012	-
41009013	Yeisuw gog mo idibakes, ilana, “Ilaytiy iginmug, ikatilow youd babaw. Tabta kukwakins silawun Bukitab liva̱nen Gimgilitoun nises, mamagina, ‘Gamag bipiyaves; a̱ban bigeg singay’? Adibakeimiya mtowen-vak Ilaytiy bo neim, itam ninous mo iyagages towen, ma̱wan liva̱nen nises Bukitab waseg.”
41009014	Yeisuw siney navamul asteitoun, tavasin gog mtowen, mo iwloubus iwekes navamul meivek-wan watinow nisesus, ikines gamag singay babaw nisiwnis, tasiyas takatimlakeins kaleiwag nikikamnimans sisiyas navamul mwasanin.
41009015	Gamag babaw ikines Yeisuw bo neim, isom ninous, isawls inekes, imulouls sisiy.
41009016	Iw to Yeisuw, ilana, “Aveiyag silawun mikamniman?”
41009017	-
41009018	Iw teitan gamag, ilana, “Tamwey, natug towen amey va̱gan bukukin, peinan yeiluw neiweiy bo ikakon. Kukin beiweiy mo bikalavatouw bikabala̱wein, beipoul wadon, bikakil kimwatun, bilamtumweitol won. Bo adibakes muvamuls va̱gan bikayabes. Iyokons bo nag.”
41009019	Iw to Yeisuw, ilana, “Takakons yakamiy! Tut kadiveiyov sigwey yakamiy nitasesus bo asoumat. Gwad towen kumey waseg yey.”
41009020	Imeyes gwad towen waseg Yeisuw, yeiluw ikin Yeisuw, iweiy gwad towen, itatat won, ikalivatow wapwepway, ikanivnavin, ipoul wadon.
41009021	-
41009022	Yeisuw mo ikatigan taman, ilana, “Kweivin tut ankatoun ma̱wan?” Ilana, “Igaw-o wagwa̱din. Tut babaw iwaweiy, ikalivatow in wa̱kov o wayvagam, sivinan bilbaleb. O Tamwey, tabta binok nuwam yakamey? Tabta ikadilokeim bukulabem?”
41009023	Iw to Yeisuw, ilana, “Aveiyag wawun amlivan kulana, ‘Tabta ikadilokeim’? Kukin bitasimounid, sinap o wotet babaw mo bikadilokeid.”
41009024	Gwad to taman mo igel, ilana, “Asimounid-wan; tage kulabeig va̱gan basimounid beibwein.”
41009025	Yeisuw gog ikin gamag babaw isisawls imimeis, mo idibek yeiluw towen, ilana, “Yeiluw yak, gwad towen nukuvag nikakon, adibakeim kulisow gwad towen, kusiwana, awoum kuvgavaw bukumek gwad towen; awoum.”
41009026	Iligen, mo iwak, iweiy gwad towen, itatat won, mo ilisow gwad kabalamat nimmasis ma̱wana takanig, babaw gamag idokes bo ikanig.
41009027	Yeisuw gog iyous naman, itamnow gwad towen, itamanaw.
41009028	Wankuyeim Yeisuw mo inoun in isiw wabunatum, navamul mo inekes, tasiyas-wan illivans, ilansa, “Aveiyag wawun na-ikadilokem bakakayeb?”
41009029	Iw to Yeisuw, ilana, “Singay keikay anka̱yob bitakayabes tasiyas; misinaka bitanitoug waseg Yowbad mo bitakayeb.”
41009030	Ilisawes ven towen, mo ikanpeles Galiliy, inounas; tage nag sivinan gamag bikakins.
41009031	Inawotet gog ikatimlakes navamuls, ilana, “Gimgilitoun yey, teitan gamag bisilkodeig mo gamag mwasanin biyousigs, beiweigs bakanig, bammasis kweitoun yam mo ba̱kit vayuwein.”
41009032	Anilivan towen na-ikakins tasiyas; aspwa̱yat bikatiga̱nes silawun livan towen.
41009033	Inounas ineis ven Kapaneyum, isiws wabunatum, mo ikatiga̱nes, ilana, “Aw-livan wa̱ked nukuliva̱nes, ne?”
41009034	Tasiyas gog isesusa ikka̱pays, peinan wa̱ked nikamnimans, idokes kal biguyaw.
41009035	Mapuna isin, idawes tasiyas sinawatan teiy, imeis, idibakes, ilana, “Kal yakamiy sivinan biguyaw, kadiloka bimlatoul, babaw gamag bimugwas, mtowen bikuyeim, o bikanow ages gamag babaw.”
41009036	-
41009037	Ilivan ikous, mo itok gwad teitan, imey, isein wamtes tasiyas, mo inup iwlibob, idibakes, ilana, “Kal ya̱koum bileb teitan gwad, ma̱wana gwad towen, peinan gungamag towen, mamagina bilabeig yey, o mamagina bileb mtowen Tamag nikayabeig nam.”
41009038	Iw to Yon, ilana, “Tamwey, nakakin taw teitan ikayabes yeiluw, yagam yak waseg, kasilbwed, peinan nag ibwa̱kun wasigeis ya̱kids.”
41009039	-
41009040	Yeisuw gog ilivan, ilana, “Awoum kusilbwed. Nag kal biwotet tawtoun yagag waseg mo nuwanaw bitawyageig, nag. Kukin kal nag isilbwadeids mamagina ilabeids-nan.
41009041	“Kukin kal bisekeimiy amisoup bukumoums peinan kuwteles Kelis nawotet, mounid adibakeimiy nag biyamkwen maysan mtowen.
41009042	“Gamagal tasiyas isimounids waseg yey, kukin kal bikatsilakes silma̱nin bikakins sinap kalbaleb, singay kalbaleb mo bilouvat gamag towen. Kukin gamag mwasanin bikawes dakul avakaein biyawanis kayon mo bilaves bein wabwanit, nakalbaleb towen kalamwey; tage kukin bisesuna ee... bikatsilek teitan gwad, singaya kalbaleb mo bilouvat.
41009043	“Kukin gog namam bikatsilakeim silma̱nin amsinap kalbaleb, kadiloka kubob, wankuyeim namam palatanok mo bukuban mwamovam. Awoum namam paley bilaveims bukun wadiginasim, kov nigidaged bigabum tut nag beikous.
41009045	“Kukin gog kakeim bikatsilakeim silma̱nin amsinap kalbaleb, kadiloka kubob, wankuyeim kakeim palatanok mo bukuban mwamovam. Awoum ge kakeim paley bilaveims bukun wadiginasim.
41009047	-
41009048	“Kukin matam bikatsilakeim silma̱nin amsinap kalbaleb, kadiloka kugut kulev, igaw wankuyeim matam palatanok mo bukusiw wanuwan Yowbad nakabkaleiwag. Awoum matam paley bilaveim bukun wadiginasim; simwa̱mwats bitatets wa̱wom; o kov bigidaged-wan; nag beimat.
41009049	“Kov bigabuds va̱gan bitayayan.
41009050	“Sol bwanabwein bo bwein. Kukin gog sol bigeg, nag sabal-nen bitaban vayuwein. Sol bises wasigeis yakamiy bo bwein, va̱gan bukumsamwas simsimiyas wasigeis.”
41010001	Ikous, mo itamanaw Yeisuw, inoun in wawnuwan Yudiy mo iga̱pel lay Yoldan, in palatan. Vayuwein-vak gamag babaw mo ikatuyouns ininekes Yeisuw, mo ivgavaw katimlakay gamag wasigeis, peinan nawotet tut babaw ma̱wan.
41010002	Tasiyas gog Palisiy mo inekes Yeisuw, sivines kid biyakwanes, mo ikatiga̱nes Yeisuw, ilansa, “Tab kadilok bitapiyev dakwav, ne?”
41010003	Iw to Yeisuw, ilana, “Kweiboug Moses bo isekeimiy mikaleiwag, ama̱wan?”
41010004	Ilansa, “Moses bo itam, nakaleiwag ma̱wan towen, kukin vin bitapiyev, inalet bitalel tasek mo tapiyev.”
41010005	Iw to Yeisuw, ilana, “Peinan ninoumiy keikay yakamiy, mo isekeimiy nakaleiwag towen.
41010006	-
41010008	“Tage kweiboug Yowbad niginbun gamag kuda̱taw son kuda̱vin, mapuna taw bilisow taman son inan, binek nakwav, mapuna asteiy bimlavag wous katanok. Nag teitan na̱tan, nag; wous bo ilatanes imlavag katanok-wan.
41010009	“Peinan Yowbad bo ilaten, awoum gamag bilivis, awoum.”
41010010	Ikous, iyums ineis wanbunatum, navamul mo ikatiga̱nes vayuwein, sivines kid bikakins silawun nakatimlakay towen.
41010011	Yeisuw mo idibakes, ilana, “Kukin kal bipiyev nakwav, bivevaw gog nayuwein vin, mo biyageg nakwav tatonen, peinan taggeinawl towen ikanavay mav.
41010012	“Na̱wen-vak kukin bipiyev namwan, o beivay gog son tayuwein taw mo bikanavay mav.”
41010013	Wankuyeim gamag mo imeyes nitsiyas, sivines Yeisuw naman bisen wawous. Tage navamul idokes kid bisilbwades gamagals, awoum kid bimekes Yeisuw.
41010014	Yeisuw gog ikines, mo ika̱nes, ilana, “Gamagal bweina bimeis waseg yey. Awoum kusilbwades, peinan tasiyas wanuwan Yowbad nakaleiwag mamagina gamagal.
41010015	“Mounid adibakeimiy, kukin beivag ninoumiy ma̱wana gamagal mo bukutams Yowbad nakaleiwag waseg, mo bukusiws wanuwan. Kukin gog nag, bo nag.”
41010016	Ilivan ikous, iwliboub gamagal wasigeis, naman isen wawous, anilivan bwanabwein mo isekes gamagal tasiyas.
41010017	Ikous, ininoun wa̱ked, mo teitan taw isawl inek, ikulul avakaein wamatan, ilana, “Takatimlakay bwanabwein yak, aveiyag bavag mo mwamovag nag beikous?”
41010018	-
41010019	Iw to Yeisuw, ilana, “Aveiyag wawun kudokeig toubwein yey? Toubwein anmwa̱net Yowbad. Adok kaleiwag tasiyas kukwakin: awoum kuweiy gamag, awoum kwanavay mav, awoum kuveinaw, awoum kuyaweid, awoum kusilponay, o kuvna̱ses tamam son inam.”
41010020	Iwa̱ge, ilana, “Tamwey, igaw-o wagwa̱dig asilamaw kaleiwag tasiyas oko nagein igawa avvalut kaleiwag tasiyas wasigeis.”
41010021	Togo Yeisuw ikin taw towen, ikalin nuwan waseg, idibek, ilana, “Katanoka sinap ika̱bwag waseg yak, kadiloka kuymayis muvavag babaw, maysan kukow, kuvgen, kusekes tasiyas tasimavs, mo kum kubkunig; tage maysan bwein igaw mo bukuban walba̱lab.”
41010022	Mto taw bo isisiyuw nanon, mo itamanaw, inoun, singay igeg nanon, peinan nawliyoug babaw, ikayus.
41010023	Yeisuw gog itouvin, idibakes navamul, ilana, “Singay keikay tasiyas guyawaw beisiws wanuwan Yowbad nakabkaleiwag waseg.”
41010024	-
41010025	Navamul gog iliganes anilivan sitovek, bo isunasun ninous. Vayuwein Yeisuw mo idibakes, ilana, “Sigwey, singay keikay tasiyas guyawaw beisiws wanuwan Yowbad nakabkaleiwag waseg. Mansiyas kamel beisiws vas analeg kalimwey-nen keikay, tage guyawaw beisiws Yowbad nakabkaleiwag waseg, singaya keikay.”
41010026	Tasiyas gog singay isunasun ninous, illivans sisiyas, ilansa, “Kalisiy kid beisiws Yowbad nakabkaleiwag waseg?”
41010027	Yeisuw bo ikinbunikes tasiyas, ilana, “Gamag wasigeis na-ikadilok, tage Yowbad bwein kadilok, peinan Yowbad kadilok youd babaw.”
41010028	Iw to Pita, ilana, “Yakamey gog nakapiyev mavavag babaw mo kabkunim.”
41010029	-
41010030	Yeisuw ilana, “Mounid adibakeimiy, kal yakamiy bilisow naven, budan, nunet, inan, taman, nitun, o napwepway, va̱gan bikanow agulivan bwanabwein, nagein tut towen mo biban lakatutan nabunatum, budan, nunet, inan, nitun, napwepway; tage gamag mwasanin biyagages; igaw gog tut wanakougwaw mwamovan bises bisigeg.
41010031	“Tage babaw tasiyas tumumug bikuyeims, o tasiyas takukuyeims mo bimugwas.”
41010032	-
41010034	Inounas wa̱ked bineis kid Yelusalem, Yeisuw imug, navamuls wankuyeim bo ikubukub nuwes, sisiyas bod mwasanin wankuyeim aspwa̱yat. Inounas ee... mo idawes navamul sinawatan teiy, vayuwein inekes, ikamteles aveiyag igaw mo bilivet, ilana, “Bitaneis Yelusalem, teitan gamag mo bisilkodeig Gimgilitoun yey, mo biyousigs tasiyas tanuwgwes lun situwa̱vek sisiyas takatimlakeins kaleiwag, biyateleigs bisekeigs wasigeis tobwag ven gimgilis va̱gan beiweigs, bikatimateigs; tasiyas gog bisiba̱weigs, bigusugs, biwaweigs vatul waseg, ikous mo bikatimateigs; yam kweitoun mo ba̱kit vayuwein.”
41010035	Sebidiy nitun tasiyas Yemes son Yon mo inekes Yeisuw, ilansa, “Tamwey, sivinem bukutam aveiyag bakalivan.”
41010036	Ilana, “Aveiyag sivinamiy?”
41010037	Iweis tasiyas, ilansa, “Igaw muguyaw waseg, kutam va̱gan bakasin teitan wamkwa̱tay, teitan wamkimaw.”
41010038	Yeisuw idibakes, ilana, “Nag kukwakins silawun mikanitoug towen. Tab kadilok bukumwamwes kwa̱vig towen ba̱moum, o tab kadilok bibapta̱yseimiy ma̱wana bibapta̱yseigs yey?”
41010039	-
41010040	Ilansa, “Ikadilokem-wan.” Iw to Yeisuw, ilana, “Mounid bukumwamwes kwa̱vig towen yey ba̱moum o bibapta̱yseimiy ma̱wana bibapta̱yseigs yey; tage nag kadilok bakaliwageimiy va̱gan bukusinis wagunka̱tay o wagunkimaw, nag. Tamag nakaleiwag towen, bikaleiwag kalisiy bisinis wadadag.”
41010041	Navamul gog tasiyas sinawatan iliganes, mo ikawkunes Yemes son Yon.
41010042	Mapuna Yeisuw idawes bimeis, binekes; imeis mo idibakes, ilana, “Kukwakinsa tasiyas idokes guyawaw tobwag ven wasigeis, ikaliwages sigamag, siwotet kweitan kweitan isekes biwteles.
41010043	“Tage yakamiy nag ma̱wan. Kal yakamiy sivinan biguyaw bweina bimlavag mitouwat.
41010044	“Kal yakamiy sivinan bimlavag mitamumug, kadiloka biwotet silma̱nin miwotet.
41010045	“Gimgilitoun yey bo ma̱wan, nag am va̱gan bukulabeigs, tage balabeimiy yakamiy, o mwamovag batam mamagina baymiyiseimiy tababaw yakamiy.”
41010046	Ikous anilivan towen, inounas oko ineis Yelikow, ikanapels Yelikow binounas siney navamul sisiyas gamag babaw. Toukwaw teitan nissin wadadan ked ininitoug money wasigeis gamag babaw; yagan Batamiyas, peinan taman yagan Tamiyas.
41010047	Toukwaw towen iligen butun gum-Nasalet yagan Yeisuw, peinan bo neim, mo iwak, ilana, “Yeisuw, ya̱koum Deibid tabun ya̱koum, binok nuwam yey.”
41010048	Babaw gamag bo ika̱nes, ilansa, “Kukwa̱pay.” Togo singaya iwkuwak, ilana, “Ya̱koum Deibid tabun ya̱koum, binok nuwam yey.”
41010049	Yeisuw gog im itom, ilana, “Kudibakes beim.” Mapuna idibakes toukwaw towen, ilansa, “Bweina kutamanaw kum. Bo idaweim.”
41010050	Togo ilavew anpwa̱lum, nuwanaw mo itamanaw, inoun inek Yeisuw.
41010051	Inek Yeisuw, Yeisuw ikatigan, ilana, “Aveiyag sivinam bavag peinam yak?” Iw toukwaw towen, ilana, “Tamwey, sivinag beilal matag.”
41010052	Yeisuw gog idibek, ilana, “Nukusimounid waseg yey, mapuna bo kubwein; bweina kunoun.” Nuwanaw ilal matan, mo ibwa̱kun Yeisuw waseg.
41011001	-
41011002	Yeisuw inoun in wunsiyas ven Betepeig o Betaniy, walasin koy yagan Oliv, kakita mo bisap Yelusalem waseg. Mapuna mo idibakes navamul asteiy va̱gan bimugwas kid bineis ven wunkakit, ilana, “Kuneis ven towen wamatads, bukusiws wanuwan mo bukuba̱nes donkiy na̱tan, kayon niyawanis vatul waseg, gamag nag itotouws waseg. Igaw. E, bukuba̱nes mo kulikus vitulen, kutokes kumeyes.
41011003	“Kukin teitan gamag bilivan, bilana, ‘Aveiyag wawun kulikus donkiy na̱wen?’ kulansa, ‘Tanuwagan sivinan. Nawotet biyakous, mo biyamen.’”
41011004	Inounas tasiyas mo iba̱nes donkiy wavtakon ven, niyawanis kayon wamatan koukwed nititoy, mo ilikus vitulen.
41011005	Ilikus vitulen, tage gamag mwasanin nitablawaws wadadan ilivans gog, ilansa, “Aveiyag wawun kulikus donkiy mana̱wen?”
41011006	Mo ikatimapus ages ma̱wana Yeisuw nikatimlakes; ilivans ma̱wan, mo itams.
41011007	Itams tasiyas, mo imeyes donkiy waseg Yeisuw, asikweim isenas watapwan mo imwen isin wakunuwatan.
41011008	Mwasanin gog asikweim iyaves wa̱ked, mwasanin isa̱ves amweilok yayagein wanawoud iyaves wa̱ked.
41011009	Tasiyas tamumugwas sisiyas takkuyeims iwkuwaks, ilansa, “Osana! Yowbad bikatinabweids. Kakavasim nukum daGuyaws yagan waseg.
41011010	Tamads Deibid nakaleiwag bukuwgow. Tanuwagan liba̱lab bo bikatinabweids.”
41011011	Yeisuw inoun in wunovek Yelusalem, isiw in wanuwan Yowbad nabunatum bunavakaein, ikin palatan palatan, youd babaw ikikin ikous, mo iyum ineis Betaniy siney navamul; bo iboug.
41011012	Iyam nen ga̱boug ilisawes Betaniy bineis Yelusalem, ivag anamoun.
41011013	Anamoun, ikin kadiveiyov yaveinun nitet, sam yageivein, idoki anagin biban beikam; iwekey gog nag; makava yageivein. Peinan nag tutan beiwuw. Igaw.
41011014	Iw to Yeisuw, ikawtun kay kaywen, ilana, “Adok nag bukuvgavaw beivag anagim, beikams gamag, nag.” Navamul iliganes anilivan towen.
41011015	Inounas ineis Yelusalem, isiws wanuwan Yowbad nabunatum mo ikayabes tasiyas taggimmwals wabunatum, siteibol ikatitan tasiyas nikatimapus money dakul waseg, o ikatitan abes tasiyas niggimwals bwabun.
41011016	Nag itam va̱gan gamag bikokews kunes wanuwan Yowbad nabunatum.
41011017	Ikatimlakes, ilana, “Bukitab wanuwan livan nises mamagina: ‘Ven babaw gimgilis bidokes gunbunatum nitoug buntuman.’ Tage yakamiy nukuvkakes mamagina buntuman veinaw.”
41011018	Tasiyas gog tanuwgwes lun sisiyas takatimlakeins kaleiwag iliganes anilivan, sivines kid ama̱wan bivkakes mo biyablebes; tage iwenes peinan gamag babaw igoulus, sivines biliganes nakageiguy.
41011019	Kwayav waseg Yeisuw siney navamul mo ilisawes wunovek.
41011020	Iyam nen ga̱boug, ininounas wa̱ked, mo ikines yaveinun bo ikallayaga ikous.
41011021	Pita inuway, mo ilivan ilana, “Tamwey, kay kaywen nukwawtun bo ikalayag.”
41011022	-
41011023	Iw to Yeisuw, idibakes tasiyas, ilana, “Livan mounid badibakeimiy. Kadiloka kunmises Yowbad va̱gan wotet tawtoun biwtel. Kal yak bukubidek koy towen, kulana, ‘Kunoun kun kumukul wabwanit,’ tage nag beivag nanoum akweiy, bukunamisa-wan, mo bivag ma̱wana amlivan nukulivan.
41011024	“Mapuna badibakeimiy, kukin bukukululs bukunitougs Yowbad waseg, kukwakins-wan bisekeimiy, mo bukuba̱nes youd tasiyas.
41011025	“Kukin bukunitougs Yowbad waseg, aveiyag gamag asisinap waseg yakamiy kuninuwes, kunumlaves, bikalin nuwamiy. Igaw Tamads walba̱lab mo biwidimiy binumlev amisinap kalbaleb yakamiy.”
41011027	-
41011028	Wankuyeim mo inounas, vayuwein ineis Yelusalem. Ineis Yelusalem, Yeisuw ininoun wanuwan Yowbad nabunatum, mo iweis tasiyas tanuwgwes lun situwa̱veks sisiyas takatimlakeins kaleiwag sisiyas tammwayas, inekes Yeisuw, ilansa, “Aw-kaleiwag towen? Kal isekeim mukwaleiwag silma̱nin muwotet towen?”
41011029	Iw to Yeisuw, ilana, “Kweitan youd bakatiga̱neimiy, kudibakeigs, mo badibakeimiy silawun gunakaleiwag silma̱nin gunawotet towen.
41011030	“E, kudibakeigs silawun Yon inawotet waseg ibapta̱yses gamags. Tabta Tamads walba̱lab isek nawotet towen, o gamag teitan watinow isek nawotet? Kudibakeigs silawun nawotet Yon.”
41011031	Iliganes, illivans sisiyas, ilansa, “Kukin bitalansa, ‘Tamads walba̱lab,’ mtowen Yeisuw bikatimop aygads bilana, ‘Aveiyag wawun nag kusimounids waseg mtowen Yon?’
41011032	“Tage awoum talansa, ‘Gamag teitan isek nawotet’; mata ge gamag babaw biyagageids, peinan isimounids waseg Yon, idokes palopit tatonen.”
41011033	Mapuna ikatimapus Yeisuw aygan, ilansa, “Nag kakakin.” Iw to Yeisuw, ilana, “Yey-vak ma̱wan, nag badibakeimiy kal nisekeig gunawotet towen.”
41012001	Ikous, mo isilamaw nakabebay, isekes mamagina, “Bigulen gleip teitan tamwey isop; kal ilev ikous wadadan bag palavas; wayn kasinen ivkaes ikous; tamtakavatein bag nabunatum iwlul ikous; mo isekes gamag mwasanin siwotet va̱gan biwwotets inabag, mo inoun in kweitan ven, isiw.
41012002	“Wankuyeim anagin tutan bo bimwanoug ivag sivinan bikamkwen, mo ikayeb natouwat binekes tasiyas tawteleins bag, anagin bikow bimey, tamwey towen bikamkwen.
41012003	“Inekes, mo iwaweiys; nag kan isekes, ikayabes, makava iyum.
41012004	“Mo ikayeb tayuwein-vak, inekes tasiyas tawteleins bag, iwaysa wakunun iyagages; mo iyum.
41012005	“Im, ikayeb-vak tatounun; in mo iweiys, ikatimates. Wankuyeim ikayabes babaw, mwasinis iwaweiys, mwasinis ikatimates.
41012006	“Ikous natouwats babaws, anmwa̱net natun tatonen nises, mo ikayeb binekes; ilana, ‘Bo bivna̱ses natug o bisiwyoubus.’
41012007	“Nag gog. Tasiyas tamtakavateins bag illivans, ilansa, ‘Kukines tamwey towen natun beim. Kumeis, taweiys; igaw gog tamwey towen bikanig, mo bitakawes dakiyays, bag towen.’
41012008	“Mo ituts, inekes, iweiys taw mtowen, tamwey natun, mo inupes, ilaves, in watoulan bag.
41012009	“Tamwey taginibag towen ininuway, ilana, ‘Aveiyag bavag?’ Adok bo binekes, tasiyas tamtakavateins bag bikatimates, bisek gog siwotet gamag mwasinis wasigeis.
41012010	“Adok nag kukwakins liva̱nen, Bukitab waseg nises mamagina: ‘Wululay towen, tawteleins bunatum nipiyaves, tage bo imlavag anma̱wamwan bunatum.
41012011	DaGuyaws nawotet towen; bo isom nanouds.’”
41012012	Yeisuw anilivan iyakous, tasiyas ikakins-wan Yeisuw anilivan peinan asisinap kalbaleb, mo ikapasal nuwes, idokes kid biyousis Yeisuw beiweiys. Nag gog; aspwa̱yat peinan ikines gamag singaya babaw, mapuna bo ilisawes, inounas.
41012013	Min-Yudiy tasiyas mo ikayabes Palisiy mwasanin sisiyas Elod nagamag mwasanin, binekes Yeisuw bikatiga̱nes, bikines kukin beibol anilivan mo biyateles kid.
41012014	Inekes Yeisuw, idibakes, ilansa, “Tamwey, kakakina ya̱koum amsinap kamnat. Nag bukuvnas gamag teitan mo bukupiyev kid son, nag. Nag kuninuway gamag askakin watoulan, nag. Tage mukwatimlakay mounid, Yowbad inaked silma̱nin. Tab kadilok bitapa̱yins Sisal nata̱kis, ne? Bitatams Sisal waseg o bitapiyaves adok?”
41012015	Tage Yeisuw bo ikakin tayyaweids tasiyas, idibakes ilana, “Wawun kuyakwaneigs, ne? Money silma̱nin ta̱kis kumeyes bakin.”
41012016	Imeyes money dakul towen yagan danaliyus, ikin, ikatiga̱nes, ilana, “Kal gamag kululuwan nileles money towen waseg, o kal yagan nileles towen?” Iweis tasiyas, ilansa, “Sisal.”
41012017	Yeisuw mo idibakes, ilana, “Sisal navavag kutams Sisal waseg, o Yowbad navavag kutams Yowbad waseg.” Iliganes anilivan towen, bo isom ninous tasiyas.
41012018	-
41012019	Tasiyas Sadusiy asilivan, ilansa, “Takanigs nag beikits vayuwein.” Tasiyas gog inekes Yeisuw, ikatiga̱nes, ilansa, “Tamwey, kweiboug Moses nilel dakaleiwags mamagina: Kukin kal taw bikanig, natun nag, bwadan mo beivays son nakwab va̱gan bikop natun mo bimlavag tuwan natun.
41012020	“Tamwey teitan, budan gog teinim tatanok; tamwey iginivay son nakwav, mo ikanig, natun nag.
41012021	-
41012023	“Isiken mo ivay son nakwab, mo ikanig, natun nag. Isiken, isiken, isiken iveivaysa sisiy nakwab, imta̱mats, nitus nag, ee... iyakous tawaw, mo ikanig kuda̱vin na̱wen. Igaw beikits vayuwein takanigs tasiyas, vin namwan kavel; peinan babaw neivays sisiy?”
41012024	-
41012025	Iw to Yeisuw, idibakes, ilana, “Adok bo ibol amilivan yakamiy, peinan nag kukwakins Bukitab anilivan, o nag kukwakins Yowbad natawtoun. Igaw beikits vayuwein mamagina anelos tasiyas walba̱lab, nag beivays, nag.
41012026	-
41012027	“Tage takanigs bo beikits vayuwein. Adok nag kukwakins Yowbad anilivan Bukitab waseg, Moses kweiboug ikin kaligweg nigigob kov. Yowbad mo idibek, ilana, ‘Yey Ebelam naYowbad yey, vey Aysak naYowbad yey, yey Yekob naYowbad yey.’ Yowbad tamwamovs tasiyas siYowbad, nag imtakavates tasiyas takanigs, nag. Singay ibol ninoumiy.”
41012028	Teitan takatimlakein kaleiwag iligen sikatugwan waseg Yeisuw, ikakina nakatumap tawtoun, mo inek Yeisuw, ikatigan, ilana, “Aw-kaleiwag imug?”
41012029	-
41012030	Iw to Yeisuw, ilana, “Kaleiwag tamumug mamagina: Kuliganes min-Yisleil yakamiy, daGuyaws Yowbad anmwa̱net. Kadiloka kusiwyoubus daGuyaws Yowbad, ateimiy mounid kuta̱mes waseg, mwamovamiy mounid kuta̱mes waseg, ninoumiy mounid kuta̱mes waseg, mitawtoun mounid kuta̱mes waseg.
41012031	“Kwayuwein kaleiwag mamagina: Kuvnas soum ma̱wana ya̱koum tatoneim nukuvna̱seim. Nag kweitan kaleiwag imgwayes tasiyas.”
41012032	-
41012033	Takatimlakay towen idibek Yeisuw, ilana, “Singaya bwein mukwatimlakay. Amlivan mounid, peinan daYowbads anmwa̱net; nag tayuwein nises. Kaleiwag tasiyas nukulivan ilisawes mansiyas man bitagob va̱gan bitalun Yowbad waseg. E, bo imug kaleiwag tasiyas va̱gan bitasiwyoubus Yowbad a̱teids mounid waseg, datawtouns mounid waseg, o bitavnas sod ma̱wana ya̱kid tatoneid nitavna̱seid.”
41012034	Yeisuw iligen, ikakina taw towen anilivan bwanabwein, idibek, ilana, “Ya̱koum kadilakusa Yowbad nakabkaleiwag bukukwakin.” Ikous, mo igoulus Yeisuw; bo iyakousis sikatugwan.
41012035	-
41012036	Wankuyeim ikatimlakes gamag wanuwan Yowbad nabunatum, ilana, “Aveiyag wawun takatimlakeins kaleiwag asilivan, ilansa, ‘Kelis Deibid tabun.’ Kweiboug Yowbad Kululuwan ansinap ikatipel isek Deibid, ilana: ‘DaGuyaws idibek gunguyaw, ilana: Kusin wagunka̱tay va̱gan bava̱ges beibus siyas astameiliw yak, bukuvnivans wakunutes.’
41012037	“Mtowen Deibid tamwey, ama̱wan bidok tabun naGuyaw?” Yeisuw nakatimlakay gamag babaw sivines binganegs.
41012038	-
41012039	Yeisuw nakatimlakay wasigeis, ilana, “Kupiyaves asisinap tasiyas takatimlakeins kaleiwag. Sivines binounas asikweim vayvayov mo gamag bikululs wamtes wavtakon ven. Tapwa̱loul waseg sivines bisinis wa̱keb, o sagal waseg bisinis wapwa̱siw.
41012040	“Tage tasiyas asisinap kalbaleb kupiyaves, peinan ikwekways nakwabs sivavag, mo sinitoug iveiyov. Tayyaweids tasiyas. Igaw Yowbad mo bimop asisinap kalbaleb, biyagagesa singay.”
41012041	Yeisuw isin wanuwan Yowbad nabunatum, ikin gamag babaw imimeis bimulouls. Simuloul ilaves in wanuwan didawag avakaein. Ikin guyawaw simuloul singaya avakaein.
41012042	Wankuyeim mo ikin nakwab na̱tan nasimav isiw im, ilev namoney dakul kekel akweiy, mamagina akweiy toya.
41012043	Yeisuw ikin, idawes navamul, imeis, idibakes, ilana, “Mounid adibakeimiy nakwab mana̱wen nasimav namuloul ilisow simuloul tasiyas gamag babaw.
41012044	“Tasiyas imulouls ikous, tage babaw simoney nises. Mana̱wen gog nasimav bo ililavena iyakous. Nag kweitan namoney nises va̱gan bigimwel kan beikam; nag.”
41013001	Ikous, mo itamanaw, ilisow Yowbad nabunatum, binoun kid; navamul teitan mo idibek, ilana, “Tamwey, kukin wululay tasiyas dakul bwana̱bweins, o bunsiyas bunatum bunamna̱bweins-wan.”
41013002	Iw to Yeisuw, ilana, “Bunsiyas bunatum bunuwka̱veks bo bigulekwes beikous. Nag kweitan dakul bises wakaban. Babaw-wan bigulekwes beikous.”
41013003	-
41013004	Inoun in koy yagan Oliv, isin, ikin Yowbad nabunatum palatan-o nises. Siyas Pita siney Yemes, Yon, Andiluw, tasiyas-wan asteivas mo ikatiga̱nes Yeisuw, ilansa, “Asina̱vin biva̱ges ma̱wan? Sivinem bakakakin anatut abivatus towen, bukulivan mo bakakakin youd tasiyas bisaps wadaban pwepway. Kudibakem va̱gan bakakakin.”
41013005	Yeisuw mo isilamaw anilivan, idibakes tasiyas, ilana, “Kuvna̱seimiy; awoum teitan gamag bikatidavimiy.
41013006	“Tage babaw gamag biweis, mo bilansa, ‘Yey-aya!’ mo bikatidavis babaw gamag, bidokes kid Kelis.
41013007	“Tage igaw mo bukuliganes bulagan naviy, naviy mwasanin kadilakus, mwasanin kadiveiyov. Bukuliganes, awoum beivag amipwa̱yat. Bo biva̱ges ma̱wan, tage nakabiyokous tut igaw.
41013008	“Igaw bod mwasanin bikanaviys wasigeis bod ma̱wasanin, ven mwasanin bikanaviys wasigeis ven mwasanin. Nik beinik ven mwasanin waseg. Gamag bikamates moun. Bisilamaw ma̱wan simoumouvit kalamwey, tage watibwelon tut mo bivakaein singay.
41013009	“Kuvna̱seimiy; igaw mo biyateleimiy takaleiwag wamites, o sinagog wanuwan biwaweimiy, vatul waseg, o peinan agugwamag yakamiy bo bitamnaweimiy wamtes siyas gabman sisiyas guyawaw, mapuna livan bwanabwein mo bukusekes.
41013010	“Tage wanmugwana bukukwawes liva̱neig bwanabwein kunawes, kugeiguys vena babaw wasigeis. Nakabiyokous tut igaw.
41013011	“Avei-tut bitokeimiy bukuneis silma̱nin ya̱tal, awoum kuninuways aveiyag bukuliva̱nes, tage tut towen aveiyag bikamat waninoumiy bukulivans ma̱wan. Yakimiy amilivan nag, tage Yowbad Kululuwan anilivan.
41013012	“Tut towen wamatads tuwan teitan biyatel va̱gan beiweiys bwadan, o times biyateles va̱gan beiweys nitun, o gamagal gog bitamanaws mo biyagages beiweiys timsiyas o insiyas.
41013013	“Gamag babaw mo bikamliweimiy peinan agugwamag yakamiy. Tage bweina kwaptuleimiy; igaw nakabiyokous tut waseg mwamovamiy mo bukuba̱nes.
41013014	“Igaw mo bukukines takalbaleb singay bitet ven bwaboum waseg. (Kal bivin mo bikakin silawun livan towen.) Kukines, magat Yudiy bukusesus, kadiloka kusawls kuneis wa̱koy.
41013015	“Kukin kal bisesuna wapwa̱siw, kadiloka bisawl, awoum biyoubaw beisew bikow nawliyoug; awoum.
41013016	“Kukin kal iwwotet wa̱bag, awoum beiyum bikow anakweim; awoum.
41013017	“Tut towen wamatads siyas nakakuda̱poms bigeg abes sisiyas siyas nivvasus nitsiyas.
41013018	“Kuntougis Yowbad, awoum ge bukusawls bulbweilim anatut loulun waseg.
41013019	“Igaw tut towen beim, singaya gamag abes bibeg. Kweiboug Yowbad niginbuniyay nag ma̱wan. Bweilim babaw nag ma̱wan. Nagein nag ma̱wan. E, tut towen beim singaya gamag abes bigeg, tage nag vayuwein biwgow.
41013020	“Magat daGuyaws nag bigidem yam mwasanin, adok babaw gamag bikanka̱nigs beikous. Tage peinan bo ikatigik nagamag mwasanin bikatimoves, mapuna bibob yam mwasanin.
41013021	“Tage tut towen wamatads, kukin kal bilivan, bilana, ‘Kukines Kelis towen-one,’ o bilana, ‘Towen-an nises’, awoum kusimounids.
41013022	“Igaw bisaps yaweid Kelis mwasanin, o yaweid palopit mwasanin, bikatidavis gamag. Mulin nimes biva̱ges tawtoun mo bikatidavis gamags. Magat kadilokes mo bikatidavis Yowbad angamag tasiyas nilivnakes.
41013023	“Kuvna̱seimiy; peinan bo akatiboug nuwamiy mo kukwakins aveiyag bukulivatus tut wanakougwaw.
41013024	-
41013025	“Tut towen wamatads, abes singaya bigeg, ka̱las biladadub, o tibukon bikayus mititeilin. Siyas wutun walba̱lab bikalka̱louws. Aveiyag tawtoun nises walba̱lab mo beigwey.
41013026	“E, mo bukukineigs Gimgilitoun yey baw, lov waseg, son guntawtoun o mititeilig avakaein.
41013027	“Mo bakayeb guntakayobs bikatinakus agugwamag tasiyas meinoy nimeis ven katanok katanok wadaban pwepway.
41013028	-
41013029	“Yaveinun waseg kabebay kweitan nises. Igaw biya̱sus mo bukukwakins, bukulansa, ‘Wuwal bisilamaw.’ Yakamiy ma̱wan, bukukines youd tasiyas mo bukukwakins kakita mo ba̱yum baw.
41013030	“Mounid adibakeimiy gudwouvaws yakamiy, igaw bukusesus ee... mo bukukines youd siyas babaw.
41013031	“Liba̱lab son pwepway beikous tage agulivan nag beikous.
41013032	“Yam towen nag takakins. Nag takakins ga̱boug o kwayav o boug adok. Nag takakins. Yowbad natun yey nag akakin. Tamag anmwa̱net ikakin.
41013033	“Kuvna̱seimiy, kula̱lals. Nag kukwakins asina̱vin ba̱yum bam.
41013034	“Nagein ma̱wan teitan gamag bein bita̱vin palatan, tage inagamag bimtakavates inaven. Tamwey towen bisekes siwotet kweitan kweitan; tamtakavatein gog koukwed bidibek bilana, ‘Kwaymateig ga ba̱yum.’
41013035	“Kukwayamatsa beibwein. Nag kukwakins asina̱vin bunatum tanuwagan beiyum, adok kwayav, adok watapwan boug, adok walalayis, adok ga̱boug. Nag kukwakins.
41013036	“Awoum kumasis kwangagays, mata ge bilabuboleimiy geg.
41013037	“Adibakeimiy, o babaw gamag badibakes ma̱wan, ‘Kwaymateigs beibwein!’”
41014001	-
41014002	Igaw akweiy yam mo Kaltuwon Sigeilin bisagals, makava bled beikams. Tage tanuwges lun situwa̱vek sisiyas takatimlakeins kaleiwag sivines kid beiweiys Yeisuw, idokes kid anmwa̱neta biba̱nes mo biyousis; mapuna ilansa, “Awoum bitayousis sagal wanuwan, mata ge gamag bikayuses mo bikawpwanaws adok.”
41014003	Yeisuw gog nises Betaniy, ikamkwam wanbunatum toulepel teitan, yagan Saymon, mo na̱tan vin isiw im, ikokew nabotol bwanabwein. Wanuwan nabotol tagon nises yagan nad, maysan singay avakaein. Ikatuv nabotol, mo ilgubok kunun Yeisuw.
41014004	-
41014005	Mwasanin gog mo ivtokays livan, idibakes sisiyas, ilansa, “Aveiyag wawun iyamkwen tagon towen? Kadiloka bitayamiyis, bitakow lakatutoun kina, mo bitavgen tasekes tasiyas tasimavs.” E, singaya ikawkunes mana̱wen vin.
41014006	-
41014007	Yeisuw gog idibakes, ilana, “Deis! Awoum kutawyages mana̱wen vin; nawotet singaya bwanabwein waseg yey. Tasimavs tut babaw simiyas kusesus, asina̱vin sivinamiy bweina bukulabes. Yey gog kweitan, nag simiy yey bitasesun-wan tut babaw, nag.
41014008	“Wotet towen ikadilok mana̱wen waseg mo niwtel waseg yey. Bo iptum woug nanawan, silma̱nin alawag.
41014009	“Adibakeimiy igaw ven babaw bigeiguys liva̱neig bwanabwein waseg, mo nawotet mana̱wen vin biliva̱nes va̱gan gamag babaw mo bininuways.”
41014010	Mtowen gum-Iskaliyot yagan Yudas, Yeisuw navamul teitan, mo inekes siyas tanuwgwes lun situwa̱veks, sivinan kid bisilkod Yeisuw.
41014011	Iliganes Yudas anilivan, mo ikalin nuwes, ilivnakes namoney bisekes, maysan nawotet towen. Itam, mo ikayamat tut bwanabwein va̱gan basilkod Yeisuw.
41014012	Yam towen bisilamaws makava bled bikamkwams, o biwaweiys Kaltuwon bulukwan, navamul idibakes Yeisuw, ilansa, “Nanoum yak, avanuy bakan bakakatineg va̱gan Kaltuwon Sigeilin bitakams?”
41014013	Yeisuw iligen, ikayabes navamul asteiy, ilana, “Kuneis waven, bukulivatus taw teitan ikokew nakunasoup, kwabkunis taw towen.
41014014	“Kwabkunis, kukines avei-bwan beisiw, kunekes tanuwagan bwan towen, kulansa, ‘Matovek ilana: Avanuy bwabwal mabunatum va̱gan baka̱kam Kaltuwon Sigeilin sigwey gunavamul.’
41014015	“Mtowen taw mo bikatimlakeimiy bukukines bunavakaein wanuwan nabunatum, wanakaew nises, bo ikatinages nanawan silma̱nin amkwam; towen waseg kuva̱ges kads.”
41014016	Navamul asteiy inounas ineis waven iba̱nes taw towen ibukunis, mo iba̱nes bunatum ma̱wana Yeisuw nilivnek, mo ikatinages Kaltuwon Sigeilin.
41014017	Kwayav waseg Yeisuw mo isap siney navamul.
41014018	Isiws bunatum towen, isinis ikamkwams, Yeisuw mo ilana, “Tawaw, tasilkodeig teitan sods nitakamkwams.”
41014019	Iliganes tasiyas, singaya igeg ninous, tatanok tatanok idibakes sitovek, ilansa, “Kal? Yey?”
41014020	Iw to Yeisuw, ilana, “Yakamiy sinwatan amiteiy. Teitan yakamiy gog tasilkodeig soug kasow amabled wanuwan loutan.
41014021	“Gimgilitoun yey ba̱noy ked towen Bukitab nilivnek, tage mtowen tasilkodeig singay kalbaleb bilivet. Magat inan nag bikop bo bwein, togo bo ikop, imligamag mo singay kalbaleb bilivet.”
41014022	Igaw ikamkwams, mo ikow bled kweitan, ikulul, ikalin nuwan Yowbad waseg, ikiv, isekes navamuls, ilana, “Kukwawes kukwams, peinan woug.”
41014023	-
41014024	Wankuyeim mo ikow kwa̱vig, itapwa̱loul, isekes, imoums asibabaw-wan; mo idibakes, ilana, “Towen buya̱vig silma̱nin kaleiwag kweivaw, iwta̱wout pinamiy babaw yakamiy.
41014025	“Adibakeimiy nag vayuwein ba̱moum gleip sipinen ee... Tamag nakabkaleiwag waseg mo sipinen kweivaw ba̱moum.”
41014026	Ikams ikous, wous kweitan ikanweles, mo isaps, ikatulags ineis wa̱koy yagan Oliv.
41014027	Yeisuw mo idibakes navamuls, ilana, “Babaw yakamiy bukulisaweigs, peinan Bukitab nilivnek mamagina: ‘Baweiy mtowen tamtakavatein sips, mo bikatigayays.’
41014028	“Wankuyeim ba̱kit vayuwein mo bamgwayeimiy bitaneis waGaliliy.”
41014029	Iw to Pita, idibek natovek, ilana, “Magat babaw tasiyas bilisaweims, tage yey nag.”
41014030	Yeisuw idibek, ilana, “Adibakeimiy nagein, boug waseg bukukwaya̱neig siva̱toun, mo kolkolek beigel sivay nubweig ga̱boug.”
41014031	Tage Pita anilivan tawtoun idibek, ilana, “Nag bakaya̱neim. Kukin bukumat, aditeiy soug yak bitamat.” Babaw asilivan ma̱wan.
41014032	Inounas ines ven yagan Getsemaniy, idibakes navamuls, ilana, “Kusinis towen, yey ban anitoug Yowbad waseg.”
41014033	Itokes Pita, Yemes, Yon, asteivas ineis palatan, mo singay igeg nanon, anpwa̱yat seikwan.
41014034	Idibakes, ilana, “Singay igeg nanoug. Bo bakanig adok. Kusesus towen kukwaymateigs.”
41014035	-
41014036	Inoun in kadiyakus, imasis kantukov wapwepway, initoug Taman waseg, idok kid bigidem youd kalbaleb wamatan, kakita bo bilouvat, ilana, “Tamag, bo ikadilokeim youda babaw. Kuyamen agukwa̱vig towen; awoum ba̱moum. Nanoug yey awoum; tage nanoum yak kuvag ma̱wan.”
41014037	-
41014038	Iyum inekes navamul bo imasis, idibek Pita, ilana, “Bo kumasis, ne? Nag kadilokeimiy tut kadilakus-wan kwaymateigs. Kwaymateigs kunitougs; mata ge bukusiws abiyokon waseg. Ninoumiy waseg bukutawtouns; nag gog, woumiy tougweys.”
41014039	Vayuwein mo in palatan initoug, anilivan ma̱wan nilivan.
41014040	Iyum inekes, vayuwein bo imasis, peinan mites bo inanup. Nag ikakins ama̱wan bikatimapus aygan.
41014041	-
41014042	Sivtounun inoun, initoug, iyum, ilana, “Bo kumasis, kuyeiwas, ne? Bo deis. Datuts bo ikous. Teitan gamag bo bisilkodeig Gimgilitoun yey; tasiyas takalbalebs bo biyousigs. Kukits, tanounas; tasilkodeig bo isap.”
41014043	Igawa illivan, navamul teitan, Yudas, isaps siney tasiyas takaweins pulut son new; peinan tammwayas bo ikayabes nimeis. E, tammwayas sisiyas tanuwgwes lun situwa̱vek sisiyas takatimlakeins kaleiwag bo ikayabes nimeis.
41014044	Tasilkodein bo idibakes kweitan sinap va̱gan bikakins kal Yeisuw, ilana, “Kukines kal bakamuloul soug, mtowen Yeisuw, kuyousis, kumtakavates beibwein.”
41014045	-
41014046	Mto Yudas iwek Yeisuw, ilana, “Kalin nuwag guntovek yak,” mo ivayams son. Tasiyas ikines, ituts, iweis, iyousis, itawtouns waseg.
41014047	Teitan gog nitet wadadan mo ikow napulut tanmunum, iweiy natouwat tanuwgwes lun sitovek avakaein, ibob teigan.
41014048	-
41014049	Yeisuw gog idibakes, ilana, “Mipulut minew kukokews, kuyousigs ma̱wana tavveinaw yey. Yam katanok katanok Yowbad wanbunatum wamtamiy akatimlakes gamags, nag kuyousigs. Tage sinap ma̱wan va̱gan bikamat liva̱neig Bukitab waseg nilivnek.”
41014050	Inavamul babaw bo isawls, ilisawes Yeisuw.
41014051	-
41014052	Natabwa̱kun teitan anakweim mwayntanok nisikam, bisawl kid, tage bo iyousis; ilisow anakweim wanimes, sona mwadoyan mo isawl in.
41014053	Itokes Yeisuw binawes tanuwgwes lun sitovek avakaein wamatan, biyateles. Ikatuyouns nimeis babaw siyas tanuwgwes lun situwa̱vek, sisiyas tammwayas, sisiyas takatimlakeins kaleiwag.
41014054	Pita anmwa̱net ibwa̱kun kadiveiyov, nag in walisis, isap tanuwgwes lun sitovek avakaein wanven, mo isinis siney tasiyas tawwotets, ikamunuws wa̱kov.
41014055	Iya̱tals. Tanuwgwes lun situwa̱vek sisiyas tammwayas babaw iyateles Yeisuw va̱gan kid bikatimates, tage silawun nag iba̱nes.
41014056	Iyya̱tals, gamag babaw asilivan yaweid-wan, peinan asilivan nag ilatanes.
41014057	-
41014058	Iyyokons ee... tayyaweids asteiy mo itamanaws, ilansa, “Yakamey nakaligen anilivan mamagina, ‘Yowbad nabunatum towen gamag niwlules, yey bo bagulek, ikous, kweitoun yam mo bawlulavaw, tage nag namag bawlul.’”
41014059	Ilivans ma̱wan, tage asilivan nag ilatanes katanok-wan.
41014060	Wankuyeim tanuwgwes lun sitovek avakaein mo itamanaw wanuwein, wamatan Yeisuw, ilana, “Nag aveiyag bukwatimop, ne? Aveiyag silawun asilivan tasiyas?”
41014061	Yeisuw gog isesuna ikka̱pay. Vayuwein ikatigan, ilana, “Tabta ya̱koum Kelis, Tamwey bwanabwein natun yak, ne?”
41014062	Iw to Yeisuw, ilana, “O, ma̱wan. Igaw bukukineigs Gimgilitoun yey bassin Tatawtoun wanaka̱tay, mo bam liba̱lab lov-nen waseg.”
41014063	-
41014064	Tanuwgwes lun sitovek avakaein ikapasal nuwan, iksigeb anakweim, ilana, “Nag sivinads teitan gamag bikamtel ansinap kalbaleb; peinan bo taliganes anilivan kalbaleb. Aveiyag bitava̱ges?” Babaw itams, ilansa, “Kadiloka bitaweiys.”
41014065	Mwasanis mo igusus, ilumwes magin, iwaweiys, ilansa, “Kulivan ma̱wana palopit ya̱koum.” Igawa iwaweiys, siyas tawwotets mo itokes Yeisuw, ineis.
41014066	-
41014067	Pita igawa nises wamatan bunatum, tanuwagan lun natouwat kuda̱vin na̱tan inek Pita, ikin ikamunuw kov, iwtus, ilana, “Adok ya̱koum-vak soum gum-Nasalet Yeisuw ya̱koum, ne?”
41014068	Ikayan, ilana, “Nag. Nag akakin aveiyag kulivan.” Mo inoun in wadunan ked.
41014069	Vin mana̱wen ikin, idibakes tasiyas nitatos, ilana, “Mtowen Yeisuw nagamag teitan.”
41014070	Vayuwein Pita ikayan. Tut kadiyakus wankuyeim siney nitabalawaws idibakes Pita, ilansa, “Mounid ya̱koum Yeisuw nagamag teitan, peinan gum-Galiliy yak.”
41014071	Iw to Pita, ilana, “Nag. Awoum bayaweid; Yowbad beiweig. Nag akakin gamag to nukulivan.”
41014072	Ilivan ikous, kolkolek mo igel sivay. Pita iligen, inuw Yeisuw anilivan mamagina, “Siva̱toun bukwaya̱neig mo kolkolek beigel sivay.” Anilivan nilivnek ma̱wan, inuw Pita, anmwasin mo iva̱lam.
41015001	Walalayis-wan tasiyas tanuwgwes lun situwa̱vek sisiyas tammwayas, sisiyas takatimlakeins kaleiwag, tasiyas tababaws mamagina konsels illivans bo idumwal ninous katanok-wan, mo iyawanis naman Yeisuw, itokes, inawes Paylat wamatan.
41015002	Mtowen Paylat ikatigan, ilana, “Tabta min-Yudiy siking ya̱koum?” Yeisuw ilana, “Ma̱wan amlivan.”
41015003	Tasiyas tanuwgwes lun situwa̱vek iyateles Yeisuw, asilivan babaw waseg.
41015004	Vayuwein mo Paylat ikatigan, ilana, “Nag bukwatimop, ne? Liva̱neim babaw illivans.”
41015005	Tage Yeisuw nag ikatimop anilivan, ikka̱pay-wan, Paylat ikin, bo isunasun nanon.
41015006	Sagal towen waseg Paylat bilik tasiwun deil teitan bein wamnat, kal sivines gamags.
41015007	Bweilim katanok katanok ma̱wan. Teitan gamag yagan Bala̱bas nises wa̱deil, kweiboug siney tasiyas tapiyaveins gabman nakaleiwag ivvatays waseg gabman natouwats mo iweiy gamag.
41015008	Babaw gamag inekes Paylat, ilansa, “Tab bukulik tasiwun deil, kal bakalivan, bisap, ma̱wan mukwaleiwag nukuvvag bweilim babaw.”
41015009	Iw to Paylat, ilana, “Tab sivinamiy min-Yudiy miking balik beiw, ne?”
41015010	Paylat gog ikakina antameiliw Yeisuw tasiyas tanuwgwes lun situwa̱veks, to niyateles.
41015011	Tage tasiyas tanuwgwes lun bo itateiys ninous gamag babaw, igaw mo bikavtagis kid Bala̱bas yagan va̱gan bilik beim wamnat. E, ilivans ma̱wan.
41015012	Vayuwein mo Paylat ikatiga̱nes, ilana, “Aveiyag banuwek mtowen miking min-Yudiy yakamiy?”
41015013	Vayuwein iwaks, ilansa, “Kuweiys waklos, beimat.”
41015014	Iw to Paylat, idibakes, ilana, “Aveiyag ansinap kalbaleb?” Tasiyas gog singay iwkuwaks, ilansa, “Kuweiys, kuweiys!”
41015015	Paylat bo itam wasigeis gamag babaw, ilik Bala̱bas, o idibakes biwaweiys kid Yeisuw, vatul waseg, mo bikatikavates bikayagweg waklos, bikanig.
41015016	Tasiyas takanaviys mo itokes Yeisuw inawes ilaksiwus wasibunatum bunavakaein, idawes sisiyas takanaviys babaw bimimeis.
41015017	Imeis, ikawes kweim bwabwel, ivaskoumis; ikous mo ikawes vatul kulikoul, ikwanis wakunun magina anapay.
41015018	Ikous, mo illivansa mav, ilansa, “Kalin nuwem, min-Yudiy siking ya̱koum.”
41015019	Amweilok ikawes, iwaweiys wakunun, igusus, ikululs wamatan.
41015020	Isiba̱wes ikous, inisis maynawen kweim bwabwel, ivaskoumis anakweim tonen, itokes inawes va̱gan beiweiys waklos.
41015021	Itokes Yeisuw, inounas wa̱ked, ilivatus Saymon meinoy wanawoud neim; gum-Saylin towen nitun asteiy Alekisan son Lup. Ilivatus Saymon, idibakes, ilansa, “Kukew anklos taw towen.”
41015022	Itokes inawes ven Golgot. Golgot takativini bein aga-Muyuw, Busabwes.
41015023	Isekes beimoum wayn son mul, ipiyev.
41015024	Ikous mo ikatikavates, ikayagweg waklos. Ikokews anakweim, ikalawages; ilaves kweitan youd bikines kid kalisiy bikawes asikweim tatanok tatanok tasiyas.
41015025	Ikatikavates ga̱boug, ka̱las italga̱lag.
41015026	Ileles nakalbaleb, isenas waklos mamagina, “Min-Yudiy siking.”
41015027	Asteiy sisiy Yeisuw ikatikavates wasklos, tavveinaws, teitan wanaka̱tay, teitan wankimaw.
41015029	-
41015030	Tasiyas gog inounas wa̱ked, itawyages, asilivan kalbaleb, ilansa, “Ya̱koum tagulekwein Yowbad nabunatum, ne? Kweitoun yam kid bukuwlulavaw, ne? Kubus waklos kum; kwatinabweim tatoneim.”
41015031	-
41015032	Tasiyas tanuwgwes lun sisiyas takatimlakeins kaleiwag illivans, issebaws, ilansa, “Bo ikatinabwes gamag mwasanin, ta-ma̱wan bikatinob tatonen. Magat mtowen Kelis, min-Yisleil dakins, kadiloka beibus waklos beim, bitakines mo bitasimounids.” Siney-vak igawa nikayagwegs wasklos, itawyages Yeisuw.
41015033	Yam towen ya̱nay bo iladadub ven, idadub ee... ka̱las itageg, mo ikamnat.
41015034	Ka̱las itageg, Yeisuw iwak, aygan avakaein, ilana, “Eli, Eli, lamasabaktaniy.” Takativini gog bein aga-Muyuw “GunaYowbad, gunaYowbad, aveiyag wawun nukulisaweig?”
41015035	Iliganes mwasanin siyas nitabalawaws wadadan, ilansa, “Bo idow Ilaytiy beim.”
41015036	Teitan gog isawl in, ikow yotout, ibes kayal matan, isow wayn yayan waseg, iyasel binek Yeisuw wadon beimoum, ilana, “Beitay wouds, bitakines ga beim Ilaytiy mo binib.”
41015037	Ikous, Yeisuw iwak, aygan avakaein, mo ikanig.
41015038	Maynawen kweim nisilbwed palakakit wanuwan Yowbad nabunatum, mo isiled, isilamaw wanakaew in watinow, ivag mwayney.
41015039	Takalikay towen nitamanaw wamatan Yeisuw, iligen aygan avakaein, ikin ikanig, ilana, “Mounid taw towen Yowbad natun.”
41015040	-
41015041	Vinay gog kadiveiyov nitamanaws ikakins, vinen-Magdal yagan Meliy, son valeyin mana̱wen nitun Yemes takakit son Yusitos, sisiy Salom. Kweiboug Galiliy waseg vinay tasiyas ibukunis Yeisuw ivakamus. Tasiyas sisiyas vinay mwasanin nimeis Yelusalem, itamanaws ikakins.
41015042	Kwayav waseg mo ikatinages silma̱nin sagal nubweig Sa̱bat.
41015043	Gum-Alimatiy nises yagan Yosep, min-Yudiy sitakaleiwag teitan bwanabwein, nikaymet Yowbad nakaleiwag beim. Kwayav yam towen mtowen Yosep ikapwapout, inek Paylat, bintoug won Yeisuw va̱gan bikow binow bidibwen.
41015044	Mtowen Paylat idoki singay nuwanaw ankanig Yeisuw, idow natakalikay; im ikatigan, ilana, “Tabta mtowen Yeisuw bo nikanig, ne?”
41015045	Itam, ilana, “O!” mapuna Paylat itam Yeisuw won va̱gan Yosep bikow.
41015046	Mtowen Yosep in igimwel maynatan kweim pwapwa̱kaw, imey, mo ibwiy Yeisuw waklos, imey watinow, mo isumweil won, kweim to pwapwa̱kaw waseg. Ikous mo ikow inow isen wakalawag. Alawag towen neiteiys takunumwan. Dakul avakaein iyatpinis in ikatibwed wadon leg.
41015047	Vinay asteiy ikines alawag towen nisenas, vinen-Magdal yagan Meliy, son valeyin, Yusitos inan.
41016001	Wankuyeim, Sa̱bat ikous, vinay asteitoun igimweles tagon binawes kid biptumis Yeisuw won. Tasiyas vinen-Magdal yagan Meliy, valeyin Yemes inan, sisiy Salom.
41016002	Sa̱bat ikous, kweivaw yam, walalayis ikanakons inounas, bilakwanes kid alawag; ka̱las bo neipel.
41016003	Illivans sisiyas, ilansa, “Kal biyatipin dakul towen nisilbwed wadon leg va̱gan bitasiws?”
41016004	Ilivans ma̱wan mo itamnawes mites, ikines nanawan bo iyatpin nises wadadan leg; singay avakaein dakul towen.
41016005	Iweis tasiyas, isiws wanuwan alawag ikines toubwat teitan nisin waska̱tay, anakweim pwapwa̱kaw. Ikines mo ivag aspwa̱yat.
41016006	Mtowen taw idibakes, ilana, “Awoum beivag amipwa̱yat. Kunineivs gum-Nasalet Yeisuw, neimat waklos. Bo ikit. Bo nein. Kukines nakabmasis makaw-wan.
41016007	“Kuneis kudibakes navamuls sisiy Pita, kulansa, ‘Bo bimgwayeimiy bein waGaliliy, kuneis waGaliliy mo bukukines, ma̱wan nidibakeimiy.’”
41016008	Isaps tasiyas, isawls, ilisawes alawag, itatat wous, singay isom ninous. Nag ikamteles teitan gamag waseg, peinan aspwa̱yat.
41016009	[Sa̱bat ikous, iyam nen bo ikit Yeisuw, wanmugwana isap waseg vinen-Magdal, yagan Meliy, kweiboug nikayeb yeiluw teinim teiy niyagages. Mana̱wen ikin, inoun, inekes Yeisuw nagamag igawa nivva̱lams.
41016010	-
41016011	Meliy ilana, “Bo akin Yeisuw sona mwamovan nises.” Tasiyas iliganes, tage nag isimounids.
41016012	-
41016013	Wankuyeim nagamag asteiy ikines Yeisuw ankakin kweitan, igaw inounas bineis wanawoud. Ikines, iyums idibakes sisiyas, tage nag isimounids.
41016014	Wankuyeim navamul sinwatan tatanok, ikamkwams, mo inekes. Ikines, ilana, “Keikay gamag, takakons yakamiy. Gamag mwasanin bo ikineigs, idibakeimiy, tage nag kusimounids.”
41016015	-
41016018	Ilana, “Kuneis vena babaw, kugeiguys, kusekes livan bwanabwein, gamag tatanok tatanok wasigeis. Kukin kal bisimounid bibaptays mo Yowbad bikatinob; kukin gog nag, Yowbad mo bikamtan. Tasiyas bisimounids mo biwotets tawtoun; yagag waseg bikayabes bwagaw; kaeig kweitan kweitan billivans; mwatet biyousis wanimes; o pwa̱tuw beimoums nag biyagages; bisenas nimes takatouns wawous mo beibweins.”
41016019	SiGuyaw mtowen siney illivans ikous, mo imwen in walba̱lab, isin Yowbad wanaka̱tay.
41016020	Tasiyas gog mo ineis ven babaw igeiguys, siGuyaw ilabes, siwotet mo itawtoun singay. Gamag ikines tawtoun siwotet mo isimounids asilivan waseg.]
42001001	Kalin nuwag ya̱koum Tiyopil. Peinan babaw gamag bo isilamaws mo ileles liva̱nen Yeisuw inawotet niwtel wasigeis ya̱kids.
42001002	Peinan wanmugwana mwasanin bo nikines wamtes, mo ikawes liva̱nen Yeisuw, isekemas yakamey.
42001003	-
42001004	O yey-vak tut babaw aligen livan towen, asisawena oko ayakous, mo nanoug alana, “Adok bweina balivkaes livan babaw, basen mulet waseg, beiw bukukin, guyaw ya̱koum Tiyopil.” Bukuvin va̱gan bidumwal nanoum mo bukusimounid waseg sinap towen nikatimlakeims.
42001005	Tutan min-Yudiy siking yagan Elod, tanuwagan lun teitan yagan Sekaliy. Nakwav yagan Elisabet, mana̱wen Elon delen. Tasiyas tanuwgwes lun dal kweitan kweitan. Mtowen Sekaliy Abiy delen.
42001006	Mtowen Sekaliy son nakwav asisinap didumwal wamatan Yowbad. Yam katanok katanok ivna̱ses Yowbad nakaleiwag babaw, iyakousis.
42001007	Tage nitus nag, peinan Elisabet vinakal bo ivnavek, o namwam bo itovek.
42001008	Tasiyas Abiy delen, anatut waseg iwteles lun Yowbad wanbunatum.
42001009	Peinan sikikun ma̱wan, kweitan youd ilavesa mav mo iton yagan mtowen Sekaliy; mo ikow nawotet kweitan, mamagina isiw in Yowbad nabunatum wanuwan, igob gewuw, manisin simasim seikwan.
42001010	Gamag meivek-wan watoulan bunatum ikululs ininitougs waseg Yowbad, peinan bo tutan gewuw beigabs.
42001011	Mo Yowbad nataka̱yob teitan isap waseg Sekaliy, itoun nakabeigab gewuw wanaka̱tay waseg.
42001012	Mtowen Sekaliy ikin, iyow nuwan, anpwa̱yat seikwan.
42001013	Mtowen anelos mo idibek, ilana, “O Sekaliy, awoum beivag ampwa̱yat. Yowbad bo iligen mukwanitoug, mukwav Elisabet bo bikop nitumiy, mo bukudok yagan Yon.
42001014	“Ya̱koum bukumwa̱saw seikwan simwey babaw gamag bimwa̱saws, mukwav inakopway waseg bikop nitumiy.
42001015	“Mtowen natum bo bitawtoun wamatan Yowbad. Nag beimoum wayn o tawtoun yevagam, nag. Avei-tut inan bikop, Yowbad Kululuwan mo binek gwad towen, son bises bisigeg.
42001016	“Mtowen bo bileb min-Yisleil mwasanin mo bikanavin ninous, beiyum binekes siGuyaw Yowbad.
42001017	“Peinan bo bikanow daGuyaws aygan, biwotet Kululuwan tawtoun waseg, ma̱wan Ilaytiy kululuwan. Bivag timsiyas ninous bikanavin mo binekes gamagal; o tasiyas takapidabs bikanavin ninous mo bisinaps ma̱wana tadidumwals. E, natum inawotet ma̱wan, va̱gan bikabutus inagamag silma̱nin Yowbad inawotet.”
42001018	Iw to Sekaliy idibek anelos, ilana, “Ama̱wan bakakin amlivan towen mounide? Peinan bo atovek, o gunakwav bo ivnavek.”
42001019	Anelos ikatimop anilivan, ilana, “Yey Gebliyel, tut babaw natitamanaw wamatan Yowbad. Bo ikayabeig nam adibakeim bulagan towen bwanabwein.
42001020	“Peinan nag kusimounid waseg agulivan, bo bukusesuna mamagina gumugum yak. Bukusesuna ee... anatut youd towen nalivnek; wankuyeim mo bukulivan.”
42001021	Gamag tasiyas ikayamats Sekaliy, idokes aveiyag wawun inayouviy wanuwan bunatum.
42001022	Ikayamats ee... mo isap. Ta-ma̱wan bilivan; mo ikakins mtowen nikin kweitan youd wanuwan Yowbad nabunatum; anilivan bogo naman-wan; wadon nag ma̱wan bilivan.
42001023	Mtowen Sekaliy ises iwwotet ee... yam towen iyakous nawotet, mo iyum in wanven.
42001024	-
42001025	Wankuyeim nakwav Elisabet mo isum, nises wabunatum kweinim tibukon; mamagina bo issowm wabunatum, ilana, “Yowbad inawotet ma̱wan. Bo ikalin nuwan yey. Gamag nivtokeigs livan vinakal yey, agumwasin; nagein gog bo iyakous.”
42001026	-
42001027	Kweinim tibukon ikous, iton kweivaw, mo Yowbad ikayeb anelos Gebliyel in Galiliy, ven yagan Nasalet. Inek nakubukwab nagtabod nibokes beivay kid son taw Yosep, Deibid delen. Nakubukwab mana̱wen yagan Meliy.
42001028	Mtowen Gebliyel inek Meliy, ilana, “Kalin nuwag! Yowbad soum ya̱koum, ilabeim.”
42001029	Mana̱wen anpwa̱yat singay; ininuway seik aveiyag silawun livan towen.
42001030	-
42001031	Iw to anelos, ilana, “Meliy, awoum beivag ampwa̱yat. Yowbad bo ikalin nuwan ya̱koum. Igaw mo bukukop natum kuda̱taw. Ikous, mo bukudok yagan Yeisuw.
42001032	-
42001033	“Mtowen bo bitawtoun. Gamag bidokes ‘Tatawtoun Yowbad Natun.’ DaGuyaws Yowbad bo bisek inakaleiwag tawtoun, peinan tabun Deibid inakaleiwag; mo bikaleiwag Yekob delen wasigeis. Nakaleiwag bises bisigeg.”
42001034	Meliy ikatigan anelos, ilana, “Ama̱wan ba̱sum, peinan ta-ivag gunamwan.”
42001035	Iw to anelos, idibek, ilana, “Yowbad Kululuwan biwekeim, Yowbad natawtoun waseg bisekeim. Mapuna bukusum natum, gamag bidokes gwad to takamnat, Yowbad Natun tatonen.
42001036	“Tage veiyoum Elisabet bo ivnavek mo isum, natun kuda̱taw nises wanuwan. Idokes kid vinakal mana̱wen, tage neisum kweinim tibukon katanok waseg.
42001037	“Peinan Yowbad waseg, youd babaw bo kadilok.”
42001038	Meliy iligen ikous, mo itam, ilana, “Bwein. Yey Yowbad natouwat yey. Bweina biva̱geig ma̱wan nukulivan.” Anelos towen mo ilisow, inoun.
42001039	-
42001040	Tut towen Meliy mo itamanaw, inuwanaw, inoun in koyakoy, ven kweitan wawnuwan Yudiy, isiw in wanuwan Sekaliy nabunatum, imulouls son Elisabet.
42001041	-
42001042	Elisabet iligen Meliy anilivan ikous, natun mo ivatay wanuwan, Yowbad Kululuwan mo inek mana̱wen Elisabet, aygan avakaein, ilana, “Singaya namwa̱saw ya̱koum. Vinay babaw isimwa̱saw nag ma̱wan ya̱koum. Natum nukusum singay bwanabwein.
42001043	“Aveiyag wawun Yowbad nisiwyoubug mo kumekeig, daGuyaws inan ya̱koum?
42001044	“Nukum, aligen aygam mo natug ivatay wanuwag, peinan bo imwa̱saw.
42001045	“Singay tammwa̱saw ya̱koum peinan kunamis va̱gan bikamat youd towen Yowbad nidibakeim.”
42001046	Iw to Meliy, ilana, “Kululuwag iya̱kawn waseg Yowbad.
42001047	“Singay amwa̱saw, peinan takatinaweig Yowbad.
42001048	“Peinan bo inuway tasimav natouwat yey. Wankuyeim gamag babaw mo bidokeigs nammwa̱saw yey, bweilim katanok katanok waseg.
42001049	“Towen Tatawtoun, singaya bo ilabeig; yagan tonen kamnat.
42001050	“Bo inok nuwan tasiyas nigigoulus; wankuyeim nitsiyas o tibsiyas bo ma̱wan.
42001051	“Naman tawtoun waseg bo itakayway. Bo ikatigulekwes tasiyas takaypamweins sinap.
42001052	“Bo ikatigulekwes sikaleiwag tasiyas tatawtouns; o tasiyas tasimavs bo iyamwenes.
42001053	“Tasiyas asimoun bo isekes kaeis bwanabwein, beikams bikamuweips. Tage bo ikayabes guyawaw, asimoun waseg iyums.
42001054	-
42001055	“Bo inuway anilivan bwein nidibakes tammwayas, tasiyas Ebelam siney delen ya̱kids, tut nag beiyakous. E, bo inuway anilivan, inok nuwan, ilabeids min-Yisleil ya̱kids.”
42001056	Meliy ilivan ikous; asteiy nisesus son Elisabet; adok kweitoun tibukon, mo iyum in wanven.
42001057	Mana̱wen Elisabet nises ee... tutan bo itup mo itapoy naman, natun kuda̱taw.
42001058	Ansinva̱lam sisiyas taliven mo iliganes bulagan Yowbad nasiwa̱youb avakaein waseg Elisabet, inekes, sisiy imwa̱saws.
42001059	-
42001060	Yam kweinim ikous, kwatounun yam mo inekes va̱gan bibwabwes momwan gwad; bidokes kid yagan Sekaliy, mamagina valeyin taman; tage inan igidem sikaleiwag, ilana, “Nag. Tadokes yagan Yon.”
42001061	Iweis tasiyas, ilansa, “Aveiyag wawun? Nag ivag amigamag teitan yagan Yon, bukudokes valeyin.”
42001062	Mo iliva̱tes nimes waseg, ikatiga̱nes taman, avei-yeg waseg bidokes yagan gwad towen.
42001063	Taman towen sivinan buk; isekes mo ilel mamagina “Yagan Yon.” Ikines, bo isom ninous.
42001064	Ilelel ikous, mo ikapwageg wadon, ilivan, iya̱kawn waseg Yowbad.
42001065	Bo iyow nuwes tasiyas; bulagan illivans ven babaw koyakoy wawnuwan Yudiy.
42001066	Asibabaw iliganes, ininuways, ilansa, “Gwad towen aveiyag mo bimlavag?” Peinan Yowbad son gwad towen, ilileb.
42001067	Yowbad Kululuwan mo inek taman Sekaliy, ilivnek sinap, ilana:
42001068	“Min-Yisleil ya̱kids bitaya̱kawns waseg daGuyaws Yowbad, peinan bo ilakwaneids nagamag ya̱kids, ikatinabweids.
42001069	“Natouwat Deibid delen teitan bo isekeids takatinabweids.
42001070	“Kweiboug Yowbad nilivnek waseg asilivan inapalopits tatonen.
42001071	“Anilivan mamagina bikatinabweids; awoum tasiyas nikamliweids biyagageids.
42001072	“O binok nuwan, peinan nilivnek wasigeis tammwayas. Bo inuw anilivan towen mounid.
42001073	-
42001075	“Anilivan mounid towen nisek tabuds Ebelam, itam va̱gan bikatinabweids. Awoum tasiyas nikamliweids biyagageids; mapuna beiyakous adpwa̱yats, o bitakanawes aygan, waseg adsinaps didumwal, bwanabwein, yam katanok katanok.
42001076	“O gwad ya̱koum, igaw gamag mo bidokeims ‘Yowbad Tatawtoun inapalopit ya̱koum.’ Peinan bukumgwey; inaked bukuvag beibwein.
42001077	“Bukwatimlakes inagamag mo bikakins nakatuneib waseg, peinan biwid asisinap kalbaleb, binumlev.
42001078	-
42001079	“Towen Yowbad inasiwa̱youb bwanabwein beinoy walba̱lab bimekeids, mamagina lalayis beim mititeilin waseg bimteilids, o bimteilis kid tasiyas tadadubs, tasiyens kabkanig walasin, mo bikatimlakeids niwal kidenen.”
42001080	Gwad towen bo itawbwat, bo ivakaein, kululuwan bo itawtoun, misik wanawoud ee... anatut waseg mo ikamat wasigeis min-Yisleil.
42002001	Gwad towen Yon igaw kakit, king avakaein yagan Sisal Ogoustos mo ikaleiwag ma̱wana gabman, va̱gan bileles yiges gamag babaw, ven meiveka wasigeis.
42002002	Inakaleiwag towen wanamug, anatut mtowen Kwilinis nikaluweg ven yagan Siliy.
42002003	Sisal ikaleiwag ikous; mo inounas gamags meivek-wan, ineis wasiven tatineis, silma̱nin yiges bileles.
42002004	-
42002005	Yosep-vak ilisow ven Nasalet wawnuwan Galiliy, ikatulags ineis Yudiy, Deibid inaven yagan Betelem, peinan Deibid delen mtowen; e, bilel kid yiges son nakwav Meliy, ankuda̱pom.
42002006	Asteiy nisesus Betelem, mo ilouvat anatut bo nitup.
42002007	Nitup mana̱wen, peinan anigavaw, mo ikop natun kuda̱taw. Isumweil anakweim, isen wada̱wag, bulumakaw astavalel waseg, peinan nag ivag a̱ban wanuwan bunatum. Singay gamag babaw.
42002008	Ven towen tamtakavateins aleis sip wanawoud boug waseg nimtakavates aleis.
42002009	Yowbad nataka̱yob mo isap wasigeis, Yowbad inakamnat imteil ven towen nisikes; mapuna ivag aspwa̱yat.
42002010	Anelos towen idibakes, ilana, “Awoum beivag amipwa̱yat, peinan basekeimiy mwa̱saw liva̱nen, simiyas meiveka gamag.
42002011	“Nagein gog, Deibid inaven waseg na̱tan vin bo ikop mtowen takatinabweimiy, daGuyaws Kelis.
42002012	“Igaw bukuba̱nes a̱pwaw nisumweilis anakweim nimmasis wada̱wag, bukukines mo bukukwakins mtowen Kelis.”
42002013	Ilivan ikous, nuwanaw mo inekes min-liba̱lab singay babaw, ikavasis Yowbad, ilansa,
42002014	“Singay tayakawanes Yowbad walba̱lab; O niwal watinow wasigeis tasiyas tasiwa̱youbs.”
42002015	Anelos tasiyas mo ilisawes, iyum ineis walba̱lab, tamtakavateins aleis mo illivans sisiyas, ilansa, “Kumeis, taneis Betelem, bitakines youd towen nikamat, peinan daGuyaws bo ikamtilakeids.”
42002016	Iliva̱nes ikous, nuwanaw ineis, iba̱nes Meliy son Yosep, sisiy a̱pwaw nimmasis wada̱wag.
