42014012	Peinan tanuwagan sagal nidow Yeisuw im silma̱nin sagal; o Yeisuw bo idibek, ilana, “Igaw bukusagal, awoum kudawes veiyom babaw, o taliwom o simwayas guyawaw mwasanin. Peinan tasiyas bisagals mo bidaweims yak mo bimapus.
42014013	-
42014014	“Tage ya̱koum bukusagal, kudawes tasiyas tasimavs, o tasiyas toupams sisiyas takagayals, o tasiyas toukwaws, mo bukumwa̱saw. Peinan tasiyas ta-ma̱wan bimapus. Igaw anatut tadidumwals beikits vayuwein mo maysan bukuban.”
42014015	Nisinis sagal waseg, son teitan iligen, mo idibek Yeisuw, ilana, “Kukin kalisiy beikams Yowbad nakabkaleiwag wanuwan, singay bimwa̱saws tasiyas!”
42014016	Iw to Yeisuw, ilana: Tamwey teitan inasagal avakaein, bidawes gamag babaw bimeis.
42014017	Kan ikatineg ikous, mo idibakes natouwats, ilana, “Kukines tasiyas nadawes, kulansa, ‘Kumeis, tamwey bo ikatineg kaeimiy, kumeis kukwams.’”
42014018	Tage asibabaw ipiyaves. Teitan ilana, “Bo agimwel pwepway kweitan, bo ban akin; adok awoum ban wasagal.”
42014019	Tayuwein ilana, “Bo agimwel bulumakaw sinawatan, va̱gan bibteilis plaw kweinim. Bo ban ayakwanes mwanay mwanay bibteilis; babiweis sinawatan mansiyas bulumakaw; adok awoum ban wasagal.”
42014020	Tatounun ilana, “Bo a̱vay soug gunakwav. Ta-ma̱wan baw.”
42014021	Natouwat iyum idibek natovek, ilana, “Bo ipiyaves, babaws.” Natovek iligen, ikavikun, idibek natouwat, ilana, “Nuwanaw kun ven babaw wasigeis kukines tasiyas tasimavs, toupams, toukwaws, takagayals, kudibakes bimeis ikams.”
42014022	Natouwat ikanow aygan, in ivag ma̱wan, mo iyum, idibek natovek, ilana, “Bo adawes tasiyas nimeis beikams, tage gamag nag mana̱nan.”
42014023	Iwa̱ge natovek, ilana, “Kun ked babaw wasigeis, kun-o wanawoud kuba̱nes gamag, kwabutus bimeis, ikams. Kadiloka gunbunatum bika̱lawt.
42014024	“Mounid adibakeim tasiyas wanamug nadawes nag beikams gunsagal.”
42014025	-
42014026	Siney Yeisuw singay babaw gamag ibukunis. Itouvin, idibakes, ilana, “Kukin kal yak bukumlavag gunavamul, kadiloka kupiyev tamam, inam, mukwav, nitum, budam, nimut, o mwamovam tatoneim, mo bukumlavag gunavamul. Kukin gog nag, bo nag.
42014027	“Kukin nag tatonen bikow anklos, ma̱wana bibkunig, mtowen nag gunavamul.
42014028	“Kal yak bukuwlul bunatum bunaveiyov, adok wanamug bukusin, kunuw maysan, kadilokeim? o nag?
42014029	-
42014030	“Kukin nag bukunuw maysan, adok kwativtow kakol, bo misinak. Peinan mumoney bo ikous. Tasiyas bikines mo bisiba̱weims, bilansa, ‘Taw towen biwlulay nabunatum, tage ta-ma̱wan biyakous.’
42014031	“E, kuninuways guyaw teitan siney natakanaviy bikanaviys wasigeis tayuwein guyaw siney natakanaviys; adok wanamug bisin binuway, nanon bilana, ‘Guyaw towen natakanaviys sinawey tawsan, o yey guntakanaviys sinawatan tawsan; adok kadilokeig batagagay wasigeis? o nag?’
42014032	“Kukin nanon adok nag kadilok, o tayuwein guyaw siney natakanaviy nimimeis kadiveiyov, adok mo bikayeb nagamag mwasanin bikines guyaw towen bilivans va̱gan bibwabwes kanaviy.
42014033	“E, kadiloka kupiyaves mivavag babaw mo bukumlavags gunavamul. Kukin gog nag, bo nag.
42014034	-
42014035	“Sol magat yayan, bwanabwein. Kukin gog nag, ta-ma̱wan bisabal. Sol towen kalbaleb nag bileb bag; nag ivag nawotet. Deisa talev. Yakamiy tigamiy sam bweina kuliganes.”
42015001	Bo ikatuyouns waseg Yeisuw tasiyas kalbaleb takaweins ta̱kis sisiyas takalbalebsa babaw, sivines kid biliganes aygan.
42015002	Tasiyas Palisiy sisiy takatimlakeins kaleiwag ikines, ivtokes livan, ilansa, “Taw towen sivinan takalbalebs, ikamkwams siney. Bo igak!”
42015003	-
42015004	Yeisuw ikakin-wan asilivan, ikabebay mamagina: “Tab teitan ya̱koum aleim sip lakatutan, na̱tan bikanig wanawoud, bukulana, ‘Bweina bikanig’? Adok nag. Adok bukulisawes asibabaw bisesus, bukunineiv ee... mo bukuban.
42015005	-
42015006	“Kuban, adok beimwan woum, bukukow kumey waven; e, bukuwak, kunukwes adok talawom, ‘A̱leig nikanig bo aban, kumeis bitamwa̱saws babaw ya̱kids.’
42015007	“Kuninuways gamag kalisiy toubweins nisesus nag aveiyag asisinap kalbaleb va̱gan bilavewas, o min-liba̱lab imwa̱saws pines tasiyas; tage kukin takalbaleb anmwa̱net bilavew ansinap, min-liba̱lab singaya bimwa̱saws, peinan ilavew ansinap kalbaleb.”
42015008	O peinan asilivan nilansa, “Taw towen sivinan takalbalebs,” Yeisuw sivyuwein mo ikabebay, ilana, “Tabta na̱tan vin nises, inaveigun sinawatan, kweitan bikanig, bilivan, ‘Bweina bikanig’? Adok nag. Adok bikow nawodam, inata̱neiv, bitanev nabunatum, binineiv ee... mo biban.
42015009	“Biban, adok mo bidawes taliven bilana, ‘Kumeis tamwa̱saws, peinan gunaveigun nikanig bo aban.’
42015010	“Gamag bo ma̱wan, kukin teitan gamag bilavew ansinap kalbaleb, Yowbad siney nataka̱yobs walba̱lab mo bimwa̱saws singay.”
42015011	Sivtounun Yeisuw ikabebay, ilana, “Tamwey teitan nitun tawaw asteiy.
42015012	“Digumasus idibek taman ilana, ‘Tamag, igaw bukukwanig gunkiyay mo bakow; nagein kukwaleiwag aveiyag tuwag bikow, aveiyag yey, o yey tut towen bakow.’ “Taman itam, ikaluweg, isek digumasus inavavag.
42015013	“Yam akweiy ikous, digumasus mo iyamiyis inavavag, maysan ikow, ilisow naven, inoun in kadiveiyov nen; ansinap kalbaleb waseg mo igimwal youd babaw ee... mo iyakous inamoney.
42015014	“Ikous namoney, mo ilivet tut kalbaleb ven towen waseg, kweis nag, kan nag, ikamet moun.
42015015	-
42015019	“Anamoun, inek tamwey teitan, ilana, ‘Tabta muwotet nises, yey bawtel, mamagina mutouwat yey?’ Tamwey towen itam, ilana, ‘Bwein, bwaloud aleig nisesus waven, kumtakavates aleig.’ Inoun, iwwotet ee... bo ivag anamoun, peinan nag kal bisek kan beikam. Singay anamoun, sivinan kid bwaloud kaeis beikam; mo idumwal nanon, ilana, ‘O takabala̱wein yey! Tamag wanven natouwat kaeis babaw, yey gog nag; kakita bakanig agumoun. Adok batamanaw banoun banek tamag balana: Tamag, agusinap kalbaleb, waseg Yowbad, o waseg yak. Adok bukupiyaveig natum yey, ne? Tabta bawtel muwotet, mamagina mutouwat yey?’
42015020	“E, mo itamanaw inoun ee... kakita bisap waven, taman ikin, ika̱lin nuwan, isawl, in iwliboub wa̱won, ivva̱lams son.
42015021	“Ivva̱lams ikous, digumasus ilana, ‘Tamag, agusinap kalbaleb, waseg Yowbad o waseg yak, adok bukupiyaveig natum yey.’
42015022	-
42015024	“Tage taman nag iligen, deisa idibakes natouwats, ilana, ‘Kusawls, kweim maynamnabwein kukwawes kumeyes, natug bisikam, ring kumeyes bisen wanaman, sandol kumeyes bivaligev wakaken. E, kuyousis mana̱wen bulumakaw natun ankaytub avakaein, kuweiys, takams tamwa̱saws, peinan natug neimat, nag gog bo imov; natug bo ikanig, nag gog bo aban.’ Mapuna isagals, imwa̱saws.
42015025	“Tage kunutaw igaw wa̱bag nises. Ikous nawotet im waven. Kadilakusan ven ikatiluteg kup waseg ikannuwels, isilasals.
42015026	“Idow taman natouwat teitan, inek, ikatugan waseg, ilana, ‘Aveiyag silma̱nin imwa̱saws?’
42015027	“Gwad towen ilana, ‘Peinan bwadam bo iyum neim, nises bwein, taman bo iyous a̱len namnabwein iweiy.’
42015028	“Kunutaw towen ikavikun, ipiyev sagal towen, isinal. Taman gog inek, igilagel, sivinan kid natun beitam.
42015029	-
42015030	“Nag gog, idibek taman, ilana, ‘Tut babaw akaninow aygam, nag kweitan tut asiplev amulivan, nag. Tage nag na̱tan a̱leig kakit bukusekeig bakasagal sigwey, nag. Natum gog towen muvavag babaw bo iyagey, isekes nakubukwabs naggeinawls wasigeis, ikous, iyum im, mo kuyous bulumakaw namnabwein kuweiy. Bo igak!’
42015031	-
42015032	“Taman gog ikatimop aygan, ilana, ‘Gwa, soug yak tasesun yam babaw. Aveiyag gunavavag yey, ma̱wana muvavag yak, peinan natug yak. Awoum kwavikun. Kadiloka tamwa̱saws, peinan bwadam bo imat, nag gog bo imov, tadoki bo ikanig, nag gog bo taba̱nes bo imov.’” Yeisuw ikabebay ma̱wan, peinan asilivan, “Mtowen sivinan tasiyas takalbalebs.”
42016001	Kabebay tasiyas ikous, kweitan isekes navamuls, ilana, “Guyaw teitan natouwat nawotet imtakavet navavag babaw. Gamag mwasanin ivtokays livan, idibakes natovek ilansa, ‘Mutouwat bo iyageg muvavag.’
42016002	“Natovek mo idow, im, ikatigan, ilana, ‘Aveiyag silawun liva̱neim tasiyas illivans? Kuyamen gunabuk. Bo bakayabeim, peinan muwotet kalbaleb.’
42016003	“Mtowen iyum in va̱gan bikow inabuk; nanon ilana, ‘Gunawotet beikous, peinan guntovek bo bikayabeig. Aveiyag bavag? Nag atawtoun va̱gan babgubag. Tage nag banitoug kag; agumwasin.
42016004	“‘Bo akakin, kweitan sinap bavag. Bavag ma̱wan mo guntovek bibob gunawotet, tage bisekeigs kag ba̱kam.’
42016005	“E, mo ivag ma̱wan. Idawes tasiyas nikawlavags waseg natovek, idibek teitan, ilana, ‘Kweivin mukwawlavag waseg guntovek?’
42016006	“Ilana, ‘Tagon, lakatutan botol.’ Iwa̱ge, ilana, ‘Mubuk towena. Nuwanaw kusin wa̱keb, kugulek lakatutan, kulel sinawanim.’ E, igulek towen, ilel gog sinawanim.
42016007	“Ikous, tayuwein im, idibek, ilana, ‘Kweivin mukwawlavag waseg guntovek?’ Ilana, ‘Wit, lakatutan gamwat.’ Iwa̱ge, ilana, ‘Mubuk towena; kugulek lakatutan, kulel go sinwanim sinwatoun.’ Mo igulek mo ilel ma̱wan. Imimeis, tatanok tatanok idibakes ma̱wan. Igulekwes, ileles mamagina iseibwis sikawlavag.
42016008	“Ikous, mo natovek iligen liva̱nen mtowen tasilponay, waseg niseib sikawlavag gamag babaw. Tage natovek bo ikaves natouwat towen, ilana, ‘Singay ansinap tawtoun.’” Yeisuw ilana, “Tut towen ven watinow gimgilis bo imugwas, peinan asisinap tawtoun. Yowbad nagamag asisinap igwey.
42016009	“Ven watinow wuliyougwan kalbaleb. Miwliyoug waseg, kadiloka kukwaveiyons simiyas wasigeis. Wankuyeim, beikous miwliyoug mo bukuba̱nes miven walba̱lab, bukusesus kusigagas.
42016010	“Kukin kal bitoukum wotet kakit waseg, ma̱wan avakaein waseg bitoukum. Kukin kal bisilponay wotet kakit waseg, ma̱wan avakaein waseg bisilponay.
42016011	“Ven watinow wuliyougwan kalbaleb. Kukin nag bukutoukum waseg mivavag ven watinow adok Yowbad nag bisekeim liba̱lab wuliyougwan.
42016012	“Kukin nag bukutoukum waseg soum navavag adok Yowbad nag bisekeim muvavag tatoneim.
42016013	“Nag kadilok gamag bikanow ages natovek asteiy, peinan bikamliw teitan, bisiwyoub tayuwein; o adok bitoukum teitan silma̱nin, bipiyev tayuwein. Ta-ma̱wan bitaninuway Yowbad anilivan son ven watinow wuliyougwan.”
42016014	Tasiyas Palisiy sivines simoney bikatimweisis bibabaw, iliganes Yeisuw anilivan towen, isiba̱wes.
42016015	Tage Yeisuw idibakes, ilana, “Peinan kuva̱ges amisinap ankakin beibwein wamtes gamag, tage Yowbad ikakin ninoumiy kalbaleb. Youd tasiyas sivinamiy ma̱wana babaw gamag sivines, tage Yowbad ikasigum youd tasiyas.
42016016	“Moses nakaleiwag kweiboug nises, o tasiyas palopit sigeiguy nileles nises Bukitab wanuwan. Kaleiwag towen ises ee... mo Yon isap, wankuyeim mo kageiguy liva̱nen Yowbad nakaleiwag bwanabwein, o gamag babaw itawtouns, sivines beisiws waseg.
42016017	“Tage Moses nakaleiwag nag beikous, nag. Kukin liba̱lab son ven watinow biyakous mo beikous kaleiwag siyas kakit, Moses nakaleiwag wanuwan.
42016018	“Kukin kal bipiyev nakwav mo beivay son nayuwein vin bo igeinawl, ikanavay mav. O nakwav nipiyev mo beivay son tayuwein taw, taw towen bo ikanavay mav.
42016019	“Teitan taw bo iguyaw avakaein, anakweim maynamnabwein, o kan bwanabwein ikamkwam yam katanok katanok.
42016020	-
42016021	“Tage tasimav teitan yagan La̱sal nimmasis guyaw wanakoukwed wadadan, won meivek sasok-wan. Mtowen tasimav sivinan beikam kan musamusan nikambweg guyaw nateibol waseg; o mansiyas awuk inekes ikanmwasis ansasok.
42016022	-
42016023	“Mtowen tasimav ikanig, min-liba̱lab mo ikawes inawes va̱gan bimwa̱saw Ebelam wanven waseg. Guyaw-vak ikanig, idibwanis, in wa̱Tum, igidaged kov waseg, imdamed won, itamnow matan, ikin Ebelam kadiveiyov son La̱sal, imwa̱saws.
42016024	“Iwak, ilana, ‘Tama, Ebelam, binok nuwam yey. Kwayeb La̱sal, bein isow didin wayvagam, beim, isen wamayeig, biyenom. Peinan woug singay asimkwen ma̱wana kov towen nigidaged.’
42016025	“Iw to Ebelam, ilana, ‘Gwa, adok kunuw ven watinow nukumov, nukumwa̱saw avakaein, tage La̱sal a̱ban igeg. Tut gog towen La̱sal immwa̱saw, tage yak igidaged woum.
42016026	“‘O kweitan youd kukin. Yakamey palatan, yakamiy palatan, o awasas avakaein wanuwein. Ta-ma̱wan bakakanapel bakaw; o nag bukwanpeles bukumeis.’
42016027	-
42016028	“Mtowen guyaw mo igilagel, ilana, ‘Tama, tab kadilok bukwayeb La̱sal bein tamag wanbunatum bikines budag asteinim, bidibakes, bilana, “Kuvna̱seimiy. Mata ge bukumeis ven towen kalbaleb.” ‘
42016029	“Iw to Ebelam, ilana, ‘Moses siney siyas palopits asilivan nises. Kadiloka biliganes livan towen.’
42016030	“Ilana, ‘Nag biliganes tasiyas. Tage kukin takanig teitan beiyum binekes bilivan wasigeis, mo bipiyaves asisinap kalbaleb.’
42016031	“Iwa̱ge Ebelam, ilana, ‘Kukin nag biliganes Moses siney palopits asilivan, mo takanig teitan beikit binekes, nag gog bisimounids anilivan waseg.’”
42017001	Wankuyeim mo idibakes navamuls, ilana, “Mounid gamag mwasanin biyakwanes sisiyas bikatsilakes silma̱nin asisinap kalbaleb, tage tasiyas takatsilakays mo bilivatus kalbaleb.
42017002	“Kadiloka dakul avakaein biyawanis takatsilakay wakayon bilaves bein wabwanit; mata ge bikatsilek gwad kakit ma̱wana gwad towen, va̱gan kid beivag ansinap kalbaleb.
42017003	“Kuvna̱seimiy. Kukin bwadam biyagageim, kwamtilek ansinap kalbaleb bikakin. Kukin bikanavin nanon, mo kuwid ansinap, kunumlev.
42017004	“Kukin katanok yam waseg siva̱nim sivay biyagageim mo siva̱nim sivay bigilagel, bilana, ‘Kuwid agusinap towen’; e, kadiloka kuwid.”
42017005	Gamag tasiyas takaweins anilivan mo idibakes siguyaw, ilansa, “Kulabem va̱gan bakasimounid beibwein.”
42017006	Iw to Yeisuw, ilana, “Kukin bukusimounids ma̱wan tipoul kaytul-nen, mo bukudibakes kay makaywen bukulansa, ‘Kugut gidawa̱lim, mo kunoun kun kutow wabwanit,’ e, mo bikanaway agamiy.
42017007	-
42017008	“Takinew mutouwat biwaway wa̱bag, o takinew bimtakavet mansiyas aleim wanawoud, ikous mo beiyum beim waven, adok nag bukulana, ‘Nuwanaw kum, kukwam.’ Nag. Peinan adok bukulana, ‘Kupa̱yiw kukwaliveinun kag, kusekeig; ba̱kam ba̱moum, ikous; mo kukwam, kumoum wankuyeim.’
42017009	“Mutouwat towen bikanaway aygam, adok nag bukulana, ‘Kalin nuwag avakaein ya̱koum.’ Nag.
42017010	“Yakamiy ma̱wan, bukuyakousis Yowbad nawotet nilivan, mo bukulansa, ‘Ya̱kids nag natouwats bwein ya̱kids. Bo misinak nilivan nitivag, bo deis.’”
42017011	Inounas, bineis kid Yelusalem, inoyes ked makadewen Samaliy palatan, Galiliy palatan.
42017012	-
42017013	Isap ven kweitan waseg, iwekey toulepel sinawatan, itowas, iwaks, ilansa, “Tamwey, Yeisuw, tabta binok nuwam yakamey?”
42017014	Yeisuw ikines, ilana, “Kunounas kuneis; siyas tanuwgwes lun bikineimiy.” Inounas binekes kid tanuwgwes lun, inounas wa̱ked mo ibweins.
42017015	-
42017016	Teitan ikin kaleivin bo ibwein, itouvin, aygan avakaein iya̱kawn Yowbad waseg, iyum inek Yeisuw, ikalivatouw kantukov wamatan, ilana, “Kalin nuwag ya̱koum avakaein.” Mtowen gum-Samaliy.
42017017	-
42017018	Iw to Yeisuw ilana, “Adok sinawatan yakamiy nukubweins, avanuy tasiyas teinim teivas? Tabta beiyum bimeis bikavasis Yowbad, peinan ibweins? o misinaka tobwag ven gimgeilin towen?”
42017019	Mo idibek mtowen ilana, “Kutamanaw, kunoun. Nukusimounid waseg yey, mapuna bo kubwein.”
42017020	-
42017021	Palisiy mwasanin inekes, ikatiga̱nes, ilansa, “Asinavin Yowbad nakaleiwag bisilamaw?” Iwa̱ge Yeisuw, ilana, “Nag bitakin kweitan mulin naman Yowbad mo bitakakin nakaleiwag isilamaw, nag. O gamag nag bilivans, bilansa, ‘Kukines a̱ne’ o ‘Towen-one’; nag. Peinan Yowbad nakaleiwag wanuwamiy nises.”
42017022	Mo idibakes navamul, ilana, “Igaw tut wanakoug, beivag sivinamiy bukukines Gimgilitoun yey gunakaleiwag kweitan yam waseg, tage nag bukukines.
42017023	“Gamag mwasanin bidibakeimiy, bilansa, ‘Kukin-one’ o ‘A̱ne.’ Tage awoum kuneis kukines; awoum kukikuns tasiyas; awoum.
42017024	“Peinan yam towen ba̱yum bam bukukineigs ma̱wana kavikawn bimteil liba̱lab palatadadan palatadadan.
42017025	“Youd towen wanakougwaw, tage wanamug a̱bag bigeg o peinan tut towen gimgilis bo bipiyaveigs.
42017026	“Gimgilitoun yey. Igaw ba̱yum bam mo gamag mwasanin bilivatus kalbaleb, ma̱wan kweiboug, inatut Now waseg, Gimgilitoun yey gunatut bo ma̱wan.
42017027	“Peinan Now inatut waseg ikamkwams, imwamoums, iveivays, ita̱mes nitsiyas silma̱nin beivays. Ma̱wana ee... kweitan yam mo Now isiw in wanawag wanuwan, mo ikweis avakaein, imukul ven, iwgweles gamag ikous.
42017028	-
42017029	“Lot-vak inatut ma̱wan, ikamkwams, imwamoums, iyyamayis siwliyoug, isipusops sibag, iwlulays sibunatum. Tage yam towen Lot ilisow Sodom mo kov son dikuda̱kul muyamuy ikalka̱louw ma̱wana kweis, ikatimates gamag babaw iyakous.
42017030	“Bo ma̱wan yam wanakoug waseg Gimgilitoun yey basap vayuwein ven watinow.
42017031	“Kukin kal biyeiwas wanpwa̱siw awoum beisiw vayuwein wanbunatum va̱gan bikow nawliyoug; awoum. O towen-vak wa̱bag awoum beiyum bein waven.
42017032	“Kuninuways Lot inakwav.
42017033	“Kukin sivinamiy bukwatinabweimiy mo mwamovamiy biyamkwaneimiy tage kukin biyamkwaneimiy mwamovamiy mo bukuba̱nes.
42017034	“Adibakeimiy kukin ba̱yum bam boug waseg, asteiy tawaw bimasis keb katanok waseg, teitan bakow; tayuwein bisiw.
42017035	“Vinay nay biwotets wit bikanimimayes, na̱tan bakow; nayuwein bisiw.”
42017037	Iweis tasiyas, ilansa, “Tamwey, avanuy?” Yeisuw idibakes, ilana, “Am-palawen takanig immasis mo bikatuyouns bimeis mansiyas bunibwan.”
42018001	Kweitan kabebay Yeisuw isekes va̱gan bisimkakins sinitoug waseg Yowbad. Mata ge beigweys.
42018002	Ilana, “Ven kweitan takaleiwag ansinap kalbaleb. Nag igoul Yowbad, o nag ivna̱ses gamags.
42018003	“Nakwab ven towen yam katanok katanok ininek mtowen takaleiwag, ilana, ‘Kumop ansinap gamag towen niyagageig.’
42018004	-
42018005	“Mtowen takaleiwag yam babaw nag iligen, ee... imwemway nen, mo ikawegweis won; nanon ilana, ‘Yey nag agoul Yowbad o nag avna̱ses gamags, tage bo ikawegweis woug, nakwab mana̱wen yam katanok katanok imimeim, mapuna bo bamop ansinap gamag towen niyageg, va̱gan beikous gunamouvit waseg mana̱wen vin. Kukin gog nag, adok bimimeim ee... bo bibilek woug!’”
42018006	-
42018008	Ikous ankabebay towen, mo Yeisuw idibakes, ilana, “Kuninuways anilivan takaleiwag towen kalbaleb. Ma̱wan Yowbad bimop asisinap tasiyas iyagages inagamag, peinan igilagels waseg Yowbad iboug ee... iyam. Nag bikabiyun, nag. Bo bimop asisinap kalbaleb. Tage kweitan tut bam Gimgilitoun yey, tabta baba̱nes mwasanin tasiyas tasimounids ven watinow?”
42018009	Gamag mwasinis idokes tatineis ididumwals o ikasigumis sisiyas. Mapuna Yeisuw idibakes kabebay towen, ilana,
42018010	“Tawaw asteiy ikatulags ineis Yowbad wanbunatun bunavakaein, silma̱nin nitoug. Teitan Palisiy, tayuwein takawein ta̱kis.
42018011	-
42018012	“Palisiy anmwa̱net itamanaw, initoug mamagina, ‘O Yowbad, kalin nuwag ya̱koum, peinan yey nag ma̱wana gamag babaw, takalbalebs tasiyas, takwekways tasiyas, tasilakods tasiyas, tassubwans tasiyas; o yey nag ma̱wana takawein ta̱kis towena. Wik katanok katanok a̱pos akweiy yam va̱gan batapwa̱loul beibwein. O gunwuliyoug babaw alog sinawatan, kalgutan asekeim yak.’
42018013	“Tage towen takawein ta̱kis itamanaw itow kadiveiyov, ikulul; nag itamnow matan bikin liba̱lab. Deisa iwaway vitakon, igeg nanon, ilana, ‘O Yowbad, binok nuwam takalbaleb yey!’
42018014	“Initoug ikous, iyum in wanven; mounid Yowbad idok taw towen tadidumwal, tage son mtowen Palisiy nag. Peinan kukin kal sivinan bimliguyaw mo beibus bein watinow, tage kukin kal biseib tatonen igaw mo biguyaw.”
42018015	Vinay bimeyes-vak nitsiyas va̱gan Yeisuw bikabkwen wous. Navamul ikines bo isilbwades kid.
42018016	Tage Yeisuw idawes bimeis, ilana, “Bweina gamagal bimeis waseg yey. Awoum kusilbwades. Yowbad nakaleiwag waseg, asibabaw ma̱wana tasiyas gamagal.”
42018017	“Mounid adibakeimiy kukin bukumlavags ma̱wana gamagal yakamiy, bukutams waseg Yowbad nakaleiwag mo bukusiws waseg. Kukin gog nag, bo nag.”
42018018	Takaleiwag teitan ikatigan Yeisuw, ilana, “Takatimlakay bwanabwein yak. Aveiyag bavag va̱gan mwamovag nag beikous?”
42018019	-
42018020	Yeisuw idibek, ilana, “Aveiyag wawun kudokeig toubwein yey? Toubwein anmwa̱net, mtowen Yowbad. Adok kukwakin Yowbad nakaleiwag, ‘Awoum kusubwan; awoum kuweiy gamag; awoum kuveinaw; awoum kuyaweid, teitan gamag liva̱nen; kuvna̱ses tamam, inam.’”
42018021	Iwa̱ge mtowen, ilana, “Igaw-o wagwa̱dig asilamaw avvag youd tasiyas, o nagein igawa avvalut waseg.”
42018022	Yeisuw iligen, mo idibek, ilana, “Kweitan sinap ika̱bwag waseg yak. Kuvgen muwliyoug babaw kuyakous, kusekes tasiyas tasimavs; awoum bimapus. Maysan igaw mo bukukow walba̱lab. E, kuvgen kuyakous, mo tasimav yak, kum kubkunig yey.”
42018023	Iligen livan towen, ipiyev; singay igeg nanon, peinan nawliyoug babaw, ikayus.
42018024	Yeisuw ikikin taw towen, ilana, “Singay keikay beisiws Yowbad inakaleiwag, tasiyas sivavag babaw.
42018025	“Mana̱wen kamel beisiw wakunun vas, wotet towen gagab, tage keikay tasiyas sivavag babaw beisiws Yowbad nakaleiwag wanuwan.”
42018026	Iliganes tasiyas, ilivans, ilansa, “Tage kalisiy beisiws?”
42018027	Iw to Yeisuw, ilana, “Gamag nag kadilokes wotet babaw, Yowbad anmwa̱net kadilok.”
42018028	Pita ikatugan, ilana, “Tage yakamey, bo nakalisow maven nakabkunim yak, aveiyag bakalivet?”
42018029	-
42018030	Iw to Yeisuw, ilana, “Mounid adibakeimiy kukin kal bilisow naven o nakwav o budan o taman o inan o nitun va̱gan bikanow Yowbad nakaleiwag, mo biban youd tasiyas, bikatimweis bibabaw ven watinow; ikous mo mwamovan biban, nag beikous.”
42018031	Navamul sinwatan asteiy tasiyas-wan idibakes, ilana, “Bo bitakatulags taneis Yelusalem, mo bikamat youd babaw tasiyas palopit kweiboug nilivnakes o nileles nises Bukitab waseg.
42018032	-
42018033	“Bo ilivnakes liva̱nen Gimgilitoun, teitan bisilkod, va̱gan ven tobwag gimgilis biyousis, bisiba̱wes, biyagages, bigusus, biwaweiys waseg vatul, bikatimates; yam kweitoun mo beikit vayuwein.”
42018034	Navamul nag ikakins youd tasiyas; mamagina bo isowm wasigeis. Nag ikakins silawun anilivan.
42018035	-
42018036	Inoun ee... kakita bisap Yelikow, toukwaw teitan nissin wadadan ked, ininitoug money wasigeis tasiyas inounas wa̱ked; iligen butus babaw gamag inounas, ilana, “Aveiyag?”
42018037	Idibakes, ilansa, “Gum-Nasalet towen Yeisuw bo neim-ay bo bein.”
42018038	Iwak, ilana, “Yeisuw, Deibid delen ya̱koum, binok nuwam yey!”
42018039	Tasiyas nimugwas Yeisuw waseg, ika̱nes toukwaw towen, ilansa, “Kukwa̱pay!” Tage singaya iwak ilana, “Yeisuw, Deibid delen ya̱koum, binok nuwam yey!”
42018040	-
42018041	Yeisuw iligen, itoun ilana, “Kumeyes taw towen.” Imeyes, isineikim; Yeisuw ikatigan; ilana, “Aveiyag sivinam bavag peinam?” Ilana, “Tamwey kuvag matag beilal, bakin.”
42018042	Iw to Yeisuw, ilana, “Bo ilal matam. Nukusimounid waseg yey, mapuna bo kubwein.”
42018043	Nuwanaw matan ilal, ikin-wan; ikikun Yeisuw, iyya̱kawn waseg Yowbad. Gamag babaw bo ikines, bo ikavasis Yowbad.
42019001	Isap Yelikow, ikatidumwal wavtakon ven, in.
42019002	Ven towen waseg taw yagan Sakiyus, takaweins ta̱kis sitovek, nawliyoug singay babaw.
42019003	Mtowen Sakiyus sivinan bikin kal mtowen Yeisuw. Ta-ma̱wan. Gamag singay babaw, o towen Sakiyus takayakus.
42019004	Mapuna isawl in wanakoug, imwen kay kaytan yagan sikamol va̱gan bikin Yeisuw, peinan beinoy beim ked towen waseg.
42019005	Yeisuw im, itoun, itamnow matan, iban Sakiyus, idibek, ilana, “Sakiyus, nuwanaw kubus kum, sivinag bamasis wambunatum nagein.”
42019006	Nuwanaw mo ibus, itam peinan bo anbwabwal towen; imwa̱saw silma̱nin.
42019007	Tasiyas gog nikines, ivtokays livan, ilansa, “Yeisuw bo inek mtowen takalbaleb wanbunatum.”
42019008	Tage Sakiyus idibek Yeisuw, ilana, “Guyaw, bo baliv gunwuliyoug, mwasanin basekes tasiyas tasimavs, mwasanin yey. O magat kweiboug basilponay gamags siwliyoug bakwey, bo bayamen mo bakatimweis siva̱toun, mamagina bo bimlavag siva̱vas basekes.”
42019009	-
42019010	Iw to Yeisuw, ilana, “Nagein Yowbad bo ikatinob bunatum towen, peinan taw towen Ebelam delen. Peinan Gimlilitoun yey gunawotet va̱gan banineiv takalbalebs, tasiyas mamagina sip bo nilasisulis ked, mo bakatinabwes.”
42019011	Iliganes anilivan towen, mo ankabebay isekes. Silawun kabebay peinan kakita bisap Yelusalem; o tasiyas gog idokes nuwanaw mo bikines Yowbad nakaleiwag. Tage ikakina nag nuwanaw Yowbad bisilamaw nakaleiwag.
42019012	Mapuna ikabebay, ilana, “Tamwey teitan in kadiveiyov ven va̱gan bimlavag takaleiwag avakaein, mo beiyum beim.
42019013	“Kakita binoun, idawes natouwats sinawatan, isekes simoney, sinawatan sinawatan, ilana, ‘Mimoney towen mamagina biwotet. Kuymiyises miwliyoug kweitan magin, kweitan magin, mamagina stow waseg gamag bigimwals, va̱gan mimoney mo kwatimweisis bibabaw. Kuvva̱ges ma̱wan ee... mo ba̱yum bam.’
42019014	“Tage nagamag bo ikamliwes, ikayabes gamag mwasanin wankuyeim, asilivan mamagina, ‘Kapiyev taw towen. Awoum bikaleiwag wasigeis yakamey.’
42019015	“Ilivans, bo nag. Taw towen imlavag takaleiwag avakaein. Iyum, in wanven, mo idawes natouwat bimeis, va̱gan bikin isimoney akweivin ikatimweisis.
42019016	“Teitan inek, ilana, ‘Guyaw, money nukusekeig sinawatan bo akatimweis imlavag lakatutan sinawatan.’
42019017	“Iwa̱ge natovek, ilana, ‘Bwanabwein! Bo kutoukum yak. Peinan nukutoukum waseg wotet kakit bo basekeim mukwaleiwag waseg sinawatan ven.’
42019018	“Tayuwein inek, ilana, ‘Guyaw, money nukusekeig sinawatan bo akatimweis imlavag sinawanim sinawatan.’
42019019	“Iwa̱ge natovek, ilana, ‘Ya̱koum-vak basekeim mukwaleiwag waseg kweinim ven.’
42019020	-
42019021	“Tatounun inek ilana, ‘Guyaw, mumoney towena. Bo asumweil asen, peinan bo aweneim, tayakeikay yak, peinan kuninineiv simwey sivavag bukukwey.’
42019022	-
42019023	“Iwa̱ge ilana, ‘Guntouwat kalbaleb yak. Amlivan toneim waseg bakatimlakeim amsinap kalbaleb. Kukwakin tayakeikay yey; aninineiv sigwey sivavag, akwekway. Aveiyag wawun nag kusen gunamoney wanuwan benk va̱gan ba̱yum bam mo bakow son intalest-nen bikatimweis bibabaw.’
42019024	“Mo idibakes tasiyas nitowas wadadan, ilana, ‘Kukow inamoney, kusek mtowen namoney lakatutan.’
42019025	“Ikatimapus siguyaw aygan, ilansa, ‘Towen namoney babaw, lakatutan.’
42019026	“Mounid gog adibakeimiy, kukin kalisiy sivavag, bikatimweisis bibabaw; tage kukin kal navavag nag, bo bikwayes aveiyag idok nises, mo bimlavag tasimav tatonen.
42019027	“Tasiyas gog nikamliweigs o nipiyaves gunakaleiwag, kumeyes kuweiys wamatag.”
42019028	Ilivan ikous, imug, ikatulag, in silma̱nin Yelusalem.
42019029	-
42019030	Inoun ee... koy yagan Oliv, kakita mo bisap ven Betipeig son Betaniy, mo ikayabes navamul asteiy, bineis waven, ilana, “Kuneis waven palatan nises, kusaps ven towen mo bukuba̱nes donkiy mwana̱tan, kayon niyawanis vatul; igaw naptabod, nag ikakin gamag bisinis watapwan. E, bukuba̱nes donkiy mana̱wen, kulikus, kumeyes.
42019031	“Kukin kal bikatiga̱neimiy, bilana, ‘Aveiyag wawun kulikus?’ mo kwatimapus aygan, kulansa, ‘Peinan tanuwagan sivinan.’”
42019032	Tasiyas nikayabes nineis, iba̱nes donkiy ma̱wan nilivnek.
42019033	Bilikus donkiy mana̱wen, natuwa̱vek ikatiga̱nes, ilansa, “Aveiyag wawun kulikus alem mana̱wen?”
42019034	Iweis tasiyas, ilansa, “Tanuwagan sivinan.”
42019035	Ilikus, inawes Yeisuw waseg, iyaves asikweim watapwan; Yeisuw isin.
42019036	Mwasanin iyeves asikweim wa̱ked, Yeisuw mo inoun.
42019037	-
42019038	Kakita biwloubus koy towen Oliv, inavamul asibabaw bo imwa̱saws, ikavasis Yowbad, peinan bo ikines nawotet tawtoun. Ages avakaein ilansa, “Kalin nuwem Guyaw ya̱koum; nukum, Yowbad yagan waseg. Niwal son kamnat avakaein, wanakaew, walba̱lab.”
42019039	Palisiy mwasanin wanuwan babaw gamag mo idibakes Yeisuw, ilansa, “Takatimlakay yak. Kusilbwed asilivan muvamul.”
42019040	Iw to Yeisuw, ilana, “Magat tasiyas bika̱pays, mo dakul siyas biwkuwaks.”
42019041	-
42019042	Kakita bisap Yelusalem, ikin wunovek, iva̱lam peinan, ilana, “Magat nagein bukukwakins miked silma̱nin niwal. Tage bo isowm; mata ge bukukines.
42019043	-
42019044	“Peinan igaw kweitan tut abamiy bigeg singay. Tasiyas ikamliweimiy bituyes pwepway bimlavag koy watoulan miven, o bidiliwunis watibwelon miven, va̱gan bikalituwanis boul biweis, biwaweimiy, bilaveimiy bukuneis wapwepway, simiyas nitimiyas; mibunatum bigulekwes beikous. Nag kweitan dakul bisesun wakaban. E, binuwakeimiy ma̱wan, peinan Yowbad bo ilakwaneimiy; nag gog, nag kuwtusis, nag kukwakins.”
42019045	-
42019046	Mo isiw in wanuwan Yowbad nabunatum ikikayabes tasiyas taggimwals, idibakes, ilana, “Yowbad anilivan mamagina: Gunbunatum silma̱nin nitoug, tage nukuva̱ges kid buntuman veinaw.”
42019047	-
42019048	Yam katanok katanok ikatimlakay Yowbad wanbunatum. Tanuwgwes lun sisiyas takatimlakeins kaleiwag, sisiyas tammwayas Yudiy sivines kid beiweiys Yeisuw. Ta-ma̱wan binuwakes beiweiys, peinan gamag babaw sivines anilivan.
42020001	Yam kweitan Yeisuw ikatimlakes gamag Yowbad wanbunatum, o igeiguy livan bwanabwein, mo inekes Yeisuw tasiyas tanuwgwes lun sisiyas takatimlakeins kaleiwag, sisiyas tasiyas tammwayas.
42020002	Inekes Yeisuw, ilansa, “Aw-kaleiwag waseg kuwotet ma̱wan? o kal isekeim mukwaleiwag towen?”
42020003	-
42020004	Iw to Yeisuw, ilana, “Kweitan youd bakatugan wasigeis yakamiy. Kudibakeigs. Yon inakaleiwag waseg nibapta̱yses gamags, Yowbad isek nakaleiwag? o nag? gamag mwasanin isekes nakaleiwag?”
42020005	-
42020006	Sisiyas illivans, ilansa, “Kukin bitalivans ‘Yowbad isek,’ mo bikatimop aygads bilana, ‘Aveiyag wawun kupiyaves?’ Tage kukin bitalivans, ‘Gamag isekes’ mo gamag biwaweids, peinan idokes Yon palopit teitan.”
42020007	Mapuna ikatimapus Yeisuw anilivan, ilansa, “Yakamey nag kakakin kal isek Yon nakaleiwag.”
42020008	Iw to Yeisuw, ilana, “Yey-vak nag badibakeimiy kal nisekeig gunakaleiwag silma̱nin wotet towen.”
42020009	Mo isekes nakabebay towen, ilana, “Teitan tamwey isop bigulen gleip, isekes gamag mwasanin siwotet va̱gan bimtakavates, mo inoun in kweitan ven, isik tut kadiveiyov.
42020010	“Tutan gleip bimwanoug ikayeb natouwat bikow bag anagin, bimey, mo beikam, tage tamtakavateins bag bo kayuses anagin, iwaweiys tamwey natouwat towen ikous, mo ikayabes. Makava inoun, iyum.
42020011	“Wankuyeim tamwey ikayeb tayuwein natouwat, iwaweiys-vak mtowen, iyagages, ivag anmwasin seikwan. Ikous mo ikayabes. Makava iyum.
42020012	“Wankuyeim tamwey ikayeb tatounun, ibasis mtowen sikayal waseg, ikines bwayan kayal wa̱won, mo ilaves in watoulan ven.
42020013	“Tanuwagan bag nag ikakin seik ama̱wan biwkek, mo ilana, ‘O, bo bakayeb natug bwanabwein; tasiyas bigoulus, bisekes anagin bimey.’
42020014	“Inoun in natun, kakita binekes, tamtakavateins bag iwtusis, ilansa, ‘Natun mtowen. Tamwey bikanig mo nakiyay bikow, bag towen. Bo bitaweiys mo takawes dakiyays ya̱kids.’
42020015	“E, ituts, iwekes, iyousis, inawes watoulan bag ikatimates. Tanuwagan bag igaw mo beim, aveiyag binuwakes tasiyas?
42020016	“Adok beim biwaweiys biyakous gamag tasiyas, mo binineiv gamag mwasanin, bisekes siwotet bimtakavates inabag.” Iliganes anilivan towen; ilansa, “Awoum.”
42020017	Tage Yeisuw ikikines tasiyas, ilana, “Silawun agulivan towen Bukitab waseg nileles mamagina: ‘Wululay towen tawteleins bunatum nipiyaves, tage bo imlavag anmwamwan bunatum.’
42020018	“Wululay towen yey. Kukin kal bikalivatow wakunuwatan wululay towen mo bibilek won; tage wululay towen bikalouw wakunuwatan gamag mo bikanimimey.”
42020019	Tut towen tasiyas takatimlakeins kaleiwag sisiyas tanuwgwes lun sivines kid biyousis Yeisuw, peinan ikakins Yeisuw nakabebay silawun mamagina asisinap tatineis. Sivines kid biyousis Yeisuw. Ta-ma̱wan, peinan iwenes gamag babaw.
42020020	Deisa ikaymates Yeisuw, o ikayabes sitouwat mwasanin, askakin mamagina tasimounids tage tayyaweids; bikatiliganes Yeisuw anilivan va̱gan biliganes silawun ya̱tal, waseg biyateles Yeisuw wamatan takaleiwag avakaein, ven Yudiy waseg. Takaleiwag mo biligen ya̱tal, bikaluweg.
42020021	Tasiyas inekes Yeisuw ilansa, “Takatimlakay yak, kakakin amlivan bwein o mukwatimlakay bwein, o nag kuwenes gamag mwasanin o mukwatimlakay katanok-wan gamag babaw wasigeis. Peinan Yowbad inaked kwatimlakem mounid.
42020022	“E, tab kadilok bitapa̱yin Sisal nata̱kis? o nag?”
42020023	-
42020024	Tage Yeisuw ikakin asisinap, idibakes ilana, “Money dakul kusekeig kweitan, bakin.” Isekes mo ilana, “Kal kululuwan nileles? o kal yagan nileles waseg?” Ilansa, “Sisal.”
42020025	Iwa̱ge Yeisuw, ilana, “Kadiloka Sisal navavag bitasekes Sisal; o Yowbad navavag bitasekes Yowbad.”
42020026	Peinan tasiyas iyokons; bo nag. Ta-ma̱wan biba̱nes aveiyag kalbaleb Yeisuw bilivan wamtes gamag babaw va̱gan biyateles. Iliganes gog Yeisuw nakatumap, bo isom ninous, isesusa ikka̱pays.
42020027	Ikous asilivan tasiyas, mo Sadusiy mwasanin mo inekes. Gamag tasiyas Sadusiy idokes gamag ya̱kids bitakanigs, nag bitakits vayuwein.
42020028	Tasiyas ikatiga̱nes Yeisuw, ilansa, “Takatimlakay yak. Moses nilel dakaleiwags va̱gan kukin kal taw bikanig, nakwav sam, tage natun nag, takanig bwadan o tuwan mo beivay son nakwab, mo bikop natun bimlavag takanig natun.
42020029	-
42020031	“Taw teitan siney budan teinim tatanok, ivay son nakwav, ikanig, natun nag. Isiken ivay son nakwab, mo ikanig, natun nag. Isiken ivay son nakwab, ikanig, natun nag. Ma̱wana ma̱wana ee... tasiyas teinim teiy ivays sisiy vin mana̱wen ikanka̱nigs ikous, nitus nag.
42020032	“Ikous, mo vin ikanig.
42020033	“Igaw beikits vayuwein, kal nakwav mana̱wen? Peinan sikwev asibabaw.”
42020034	-
42020036	Yeisuw ikatimop asilivan, ilana, “Ven watinow gimgilis nibokeimiy kuveivays, tage tasiyas Yowbad idok asisinap kadilok beikits vayuwein silma̱nin tut wanakoug, tasiyas gog nag iveivays o nag ibokes, nag. Ta-ma̱wan bikanigs vayuwein, peinan imlavags min-liba̱lab tasiyas. Peinan ikits vayuwein bo imlavags Yowbad nitun tasiyas.
42020037	-
42020038	“Takanka̱nigs ikits vayuwein. Moses ikatimlakeids ma̱wan. Bukitab bitavin kweiboug liva̱nen Moses iligen Yowbad aygan wanuwan kaligweg makaywen nigidaged kov, peinan Moses idok Yowbad mamagina Ebelam naYowbad, Aysak naYowbad, Yekob naYowbad. Nag takanig tasiyas. Yowbad tamwamovs gamag siYowbad; nag takanig siYowbad. Yowbad waseg babaw tamwamovs.”
42020039	Iweis tasiyas takatimlakeins kaleiwag ilansa, “Mounid, takatimlakay ya̱koum amlivan bwein.”
42020040	Asilivan babaw ikatimop bwein, mapuna iwenes vayuwein bikatiga̱nes.
42020041	Yeisuw mo ikatiga̱nes tasiyas, ilana, “Ama̱wan gamag bidokes Kelis Deibid tabun?
42020042	-
42020043	“Deibid anilivan, nilel, nises buk yagan Sam waseg: ‘DaGuyaws idibek gunguyaw, ilana: Kusin wagunka̱tay va̱gan bava̱ges tasiyas astameiliw yak, mo bimlavags mamagina mukwabtatet, bukuvnivans wakunuwtes.’
42020044	“E, kuninuways Deibid idok Kelis inaguyaw. Kukin Kelis meinoy neim Deibid waseg, ama̱wan bivkek bikativin bimlavag naguyaw?” Yeisuw ikatiga̱nes, ta-ma̱wan bikatimapus anilivan.
42020045	-
42020046	Yeisuw mo iguyes tasiyas inavamul, o gamag babaw niliganes, ilana, “Kadiloka kupiyaves tasiyas takatimlakeins kaleiwag asisinap, sivines kid asikweim vayvayov, o sivines gamag bikakoks binounas wamtes, o tapwa̱loul waseg sivines keb wanakaew, o sivines bimliguyaws sagal waseg.
42020047	“Tage ikukwayes nakwabs sivavag, mo ikululs initougs aveiyov, va̱gan gamag bisimounids, bidokes asisinap bwein. Nag gog, kalbaleb. Igaw Yowbad bimop asisinap. Singay kalbaleb bilivatus.”
42021001	Yeisuw itamnow matan, ikines guyawaw mwasanin imulouls Yowbad wanbunatum.
42021002	Wankuyeim mo ikin nakwab nasimav imuloul akweiy toya.
42021003	-
42021004	Ikin ikous, mo ilivan ilana, “Mounid adibakeimiy nakwab mana̱wen namuloul bo itamap wasigeis tasiyas asibabaw. Peinan tasiyas simoney babaw, imulouls ikous, tamkwalan nises; tage mana̱wen namoney misinaka kweiy toya, imuloul ikous, nag aveiyag nises bigimwal kan.”
42021005	Gamag mwasanin ilivans Yowbad nabunatum liva̱nen, peinan bo ikawyamis dakul bwana̱bweins, o gamag sisiwa̱youb wasigeis. Yeisuw iligen asilivan, ilana,
42021006	“Youd tasiyas nukukines, igaw kweitan tut mo bigulekwes biyakousis. Nag kweitan dakul bisesuna wakaban.”
42021007	Iweis tasiyas, ilansa, “Livan towen nukulivan, avei-tut waseg mo bivag ma̱wan? Ama̱wan bakakakin kakita bo bigulekwes?”
42021008	Ilana, “Awoum gamag bikatidavimiy. Tawaw babaw bisaps yagag waseg bilansa, ‘Yey mtowen yey’; o adok bilansa, ‘Anayam bo neim.’ Awoum kubwa̱kuns wasigeis tasiyas.
42021009	“Igaw bukuliganes bulagan naviy o bulagan kawpwanaw; awoum beivag amipwa̱yat. Sinap tasiyas wanamug, tage tut nakabiyokous wankuyeim.”
42021010	Mo idibakes, ilana, “Ven avakaein bikanaviys wasigeis ven avakaein. King siney nagamag bikanaviys wasigeis kweitan king siney nagamag.
42021011	“O nik binkunik avakaein. O ven mwasanin bikamates moun, o katoun bisap; ven mwasanin gimgilis bimta̱mats. O gamag biwenes singay peinan bikines walba̱lab mulin naman Yowbad.
42021012	“Youd tasiyas kalbaleb tut wanakoug singay, tage watapwan tut gamag biyousimiy biyagageimiy, biyateleimiy sinagog waseg, o bisena̱miy wa̱deil; o peinan gungamag yakamiy bo biyateleimiy wamtes tasiyas king, o takaleiwags kawka̱veks wamtes.
42021013	“Igaw tutan biyateleimiy, mo kwamteles liva̱neig yey.
42021014	“Awoum ninoumiy bibabaw. Awoum ninoumiy kulansa, ‘Ama̱wan bakakatimop asilivan?’
42021015	“Peinan yey basekeimiy amilivan, o amisinap, o bukutawtouns wasigeis tasiyas niyateleimiy. Nag kadilokes bikatimapus amilivan, nag.
42021016	“Timimiyas bisilkodeimiy. E, inmiyas, tuwmiyas, budimiyas, tawlimiyas o veimiyas bisilkodeimiy, mo bikatimateimiy yakamiy mwasanin.
42021017	“Asibabaw bikamliweimiy, peinan gungamag yakamiy.
42021018	“Tage nag biyagageimiy. Nag bigutus walitanok kunumiy.
42021019	“Kukin bukwaptuleimiy mo bukuyamoveimiy.
42021020	“Tage igaw bukukines takanaviy asibod babaw bidiliwunis miven Yelusalem, mo bukukwakins kakita bigulekwes.
42021021	“Yakamiy magat bukusikes Yudiy, kadiloka kusawls kuneis wa̱koy; o yakamiy waven kadiloka kuneis wanawoud; o yakamiy wa̱bag awoum kumeis waven.
42021022	“Tut towen waseg Yowbad bo bimop gamag asisinap, mamagina bo bikamat sinap babaw nilivnek Bukitab waseg.
42021023	“Tut towen siyas takakuda̱poms bilivatus kalbaleb, o tasiyas nisasus nitsiyas. Peinan ven watinow gimgilis abes singay bigeg, o Yowbad bikawkunes gamag tasiyas.
42021024	“Gamag tasiyas bimta̱mats naviy waseg; o tobwag gamag bimeis bigulekwes ven towen Yelusalem, bitokes min-Yelusalem binawes ven babaw wasigeis; o tobwag gamag tasiyas mo bivva̱nis Yelusalem pwepway-nen ee... tobwag gamag tasiyas situt mo biyakous.
42021025	“Gamag bikines mulin naman Yowbad bivag ka̱las waseg, o tibukon waseg, o wutun wasigeis, biyagages. O ven watinow, kaysay singay bika̱wot avakaein, mapuna ven babaw gimgilis biliganes, beivag ninous babaw. Ta-ma̱wan bikakins, bikatinabwes.
42021026	“Tawaw bo bisoumats, aspwa̱yat, bininuways ven watinow bo biyageg. Peinan liba̱lab tatonen bo bigulek.
42021027	“Ikous, mo bukukineigs Gimgilitoun yey bo bam, lov waseg, son guntawtoun o yakawanag avakaein.
42021028	“Igaw bisilamaws youd tasiyas, bweina bukutamnawes kayoumiy, bukukines takatinabweimiy bo beim.”
42021029	-
42021030	Nakabebay kweitan isekes mamagina: “Kukines yaveinun siney amweilok babaw, biya̱sus yageivein kweivaw mo bukukwakins wuwal bo beim.
42021031	“E, ma̱wan bukukines sinap tasiyas bisipsaps, mo bukukwakins Yowbad nakaleiwag bo bisap.
42021032	“Mounid adibakeimiy tut towen gimgilis bisesus ee... mo sinap tasiyas bisipsaps.
42021033	“Liba̱lab son ven watinow beiyakous, tage agulivan nag biyakous, nag.
42021034	“Kuvna̱seimiy. Awoum ge ninoumiy bibula̱bol peinan kuninuways kaeimiy, o amiyoubwein, o amiwiskiy, o youd katanok katanok ven watinow waseg, mo Yowbad anayam bisibluteimiy, mamagina sik bikwaneimiy.
42021035	“Peinan bo bisiblutes gamag ven watinow wadaban pwepway.
42021036	“Tage yakamiy, kadiloka kukwaymates tut babaw, kuninitougs va̱gan Yowbad bilabeimiy bikimtuweimiy, mata ge bikwaneimiy youd siyas kalbaleb, wankuyeim mo bukutamanaws yey Gimgilitoun yey wamatag.”
42021037	Yam katanok katanok ikatimlakes gamag Yowbad wanbunatum, o boug waseg inoun in wa̱koy yagan Oliv, imasis.
42021038	Ga̱boug katanok katanok gamag babaw mo ikattuyouns imimeis Yowbad wanbunatum va̱gan biliganes aygan.
42022001	Yam mwasanin ikous mo bisagals, Kaltuwon Sigeilin. Sagal towen nag ikams bled son yist tage makava bled ikams.
42022002	Tasiyas tanuwgwes lun sisiyas takatimlakeins kaleiwag iyokons ama̱wan beiweiys Yeisuw bikatimates. Ta-ma̱wan, peinan iwenes gamag babaw.
42022003	Seitan nanon mo isiw wanuwan Yudas, yagan Iskaliyot, Yeisuw navamul teitan. Navamul babiweis sinawatan asteiy.
42022004	Seitan nanon isiw Yudas wananon; Yudas isap, inoun, inekes tasiyas tanuwgwes lun sisiyas tulals, sisiy illivans, ama̱wan bisilkod Yeisuw va̱gan tasiyas mo biyousis.
42022005	Tasiyas iliganes anilivan, imwa̱saws, ilivans money kid bisekes Yudas, maysan nawotet towen.
42022006	Mtowen Yudas itam, iyokon ama̱wan bisilkod Yeisuw. Sivinan gamag babaw bigayays, mo Yeisuw biba̱nes anmwa̱net, biyousis.
42022007	Yudas ikayamat ee... anayam waseg ikams makava bled, o beiweiys aleis la̱miy Yowbad wanbunatum, silma̱nin Kaltuwon Sigeilin.
42022008	Yam towen Yeisuw mo ikayabes Pita son Yon bineis waven, ilana, “Kuneis kuva̱ges Kaltuwon Sigeilin; bitakams ya̱kids.”
42022009	Iweis tasiyas, ilansa, “Avanuy bakavag kan?”
42022010	-
42022011	Ilana, “Bukunounas, bukusaps waven, taw teitan ikokew kunasoup bilivatumiy, mo bein, beisiw wabunatum. Kwabkunis, kudibakes tanuwagan bunatum, kulansa, ‘Datakatimlakays ilana: Avanuy bwabwal yakamey mabunatum waseg bakakamkwam Kaltuwon Sigeilin, sigwey gunavamul?’
42022012	“Kulivans ma̱wan mo bikamtilakeimiy bunavakaein wanakaew wanbunatum nises, son kabanen. Towen waseg kuva̱ges kads.”
42022013	Iliganes, ineis, iba̱nes ma̱wana nilivnek; mo iva̱ges kan silma̱nin sagal towen beikams.
42022014	Anatut beikams, Yeisuw isinis siney tasiyas takaweins anilivan.
42022015	Idibakes, ilana, “Singay sivinag sigwey yakamiy bitakams sagal towen, peinan bo balivet mamayuy.
42022016	“Nag vayuwein ba̱kam sagal towen oko anatut sagal towen wuta̱lan beikous Yowbad nakabkaleiwag waseg.”
42022017	-
42022018	Ilivan ikous, mo ikow kwa̱vig, ikalin nuwan waseg Yowbad ikous, ilana, “Kukwawes kwa̱vig towen kumoums tatanok tatanok yakamiy, peinan igaw nag ba̱moum gleip sipinen ee... Yowbad nakaleiwag mo bisilamaw.”
42022019	-
42022021	Wankuyeim mo ikow bled; ikalin nuwan ikous, ikivis, ivvagein, isekes, ilana, “Woug towen, tage mtowen tasilkodeig sidayas nitakamkwams.
42022022	“Peinan Gimgilitoun yey gunaked Yowbad bo ikaluweg. Ked towen ba̱noy ban, tage mtowen tasilkodeig mo bilivet kalbaleb.”
42022023	Navamul tasiyas mo illivans sisiyas wasigeis, idokes kavel bisilkod Yeisuw.
42022024	Ikous, tasiyas-wan kamniman kweitan iva̱ges, peinan idokes kal bimlavag astamumug.
42022025	Yeisuw mo idibakes, ilana, “Ven tasiyas igaw dadub siking ikalawages tasiyas, o ilansa, ‘Amatakaleiwag ilabemas.’
42022026	“Tage yakamiy awoum ma̱wana tasiyas. Kadilok amitamumug bimlavag ma̱wana gwad, o mitovek ma̱wana mitouwat.
42022027	“Kal imug? Towen isin wa̱keb ikamkwam? O adok towen natouwat isek kan ikam? Nag, towen isin wa̱keb tamumug. Tage yey wasigeis yakamiy, ma̱wana mitouwat yey.
42022028	-
42022030	“Sigwey yakamiy nukulabeigs gunamouvit waseg. Mapuna bakaluweg abamiy beibwein tut wanakougwaw silma̱nin. Tamag bo ikaluweg a̱bag o gunakabkaleiwag bwanabwein, ma̱wan-vak akaluweg abamiy bwein, sigwey yakamiy mo bitakams bitamoums gunakabkaleiwag waseg, o bukusinis wamikabkaleiwag mamagina guyawun Yisleil yakamiy, bukwaleiwags wasigeis asikum sinawatan kweiy.
42022031	“Ya̱koum Saymon kuligen agulivan. Seitan bo sivinan bikaweimiy va̱gan biyakwaneimiy ma̱wan tata̱yins wit iwaweiys mo anagin iba̱nes.
42022032	“Tage bo anitoug waseg Yowbad va̱gan bukusimounid beibwein; awoum kukwalouw. Ikous, mo bikanavin nanoun ikous, kadiloka kulabes budam bitawtouns.”
42022033	Iw to Pita, ilana, “Tamwey, kukin bilaveims bukun wa̱deil o bikatimateims, soug yak bitases.”
42022034	Yeisuw ilana, “Adibakeim Pita, nagein bukwaya̱neig siva̱toun mo beigel kolkolek.”
42022035	Yeisuw idibakes navamul, ilana, “Kweiboug akayabeimiy, kuta̱vins ven babaw, amikaw nag, kunamiy nag, amisandol nag, tabta aveiyag ika̱bwag wasigeis yakamiy?” Ilansa, “Nag.”
42022036	Idibakes, ilana, “Tut gog towen kal sam anakaw, bweina bikow, kwanan ma̱wan. O kukin kal nag ivag napulut, bweina biyamiyis anpwa̱lum, maysan bikow mo bigimwel napulut.
42022037	“Adibakeimiy, bo bikamat liva̱neig nilivnek Bukitab waseg mamagina, ‘Mtowen siney takalbalebs idokes ma̱wana tasiyas.’ Peinan liva̱neig nilivnek, bo bikamat ma̱wan.”
42022038	Iweis tasiyas, ilansa, “Tamwey, kukin pulut siyas akweiy.” Yeisuw ilana, “Bo deis!”
42022039	Ilisow ven, inoun in koy yagan Oliv ma̱wan angulagul yam babaw. Navamul ikabwa̱kuns waseg.
42022040	Isaps ven towen nimsikes-yay, idibakes, ilana, “Kunitougs waseg Yowbad. Mata ge Seitan biyakwaneimiy.”
42022041	-
42022042	Ilisow navamuls, inay-o tana̱ban-o, mo ibasin kitatun, initoug, ilana, “Tamag, magat sivinam, bukukow agkwa̱vig kwaviwen; awoum ba̱moum, singay yayan. Tage awoum nanoug yey. Nanoum yak kuvag ma̱wan.”
42022043	Initoug ikous, mo Yeisuw ikin wamatan gum-liba̱lab bo ileb, ikimtuw.
42022044	Singay Yeisuw nanon igeg, ikulul, initoug avakaein, anpulikas avakaein mamagina buya̱vin iwta̱wout wawepway.
42022045	Initoug ikous, itamanaw, inekes navamul bo imasis, peinan ninous igeg.
42022046	Iba̱nes, idibakes, ilana, “Aveiyag wawun kummasis? Kukits, kunitougs; mata ge Seitan biyakwaneimiy.”
42022047	Igaw ilivan, gamag babaw isaps. Taw towen yagan Yudas, Yeisuw navamul teitan, bo imgwayes tasiyas babaw. Isineikik inek Yeisuw, bimulouls son.
42022048	Yeisuw ilana, “Yudas, bukumuloul waseg Gimgilitoun yey va̱gan bukusilkodeig? Oo-ne!”
42022049	Tasiyas nitomos walasin Yeisuw ikakins gamag babaw biyousis Yeisuw, ilansa, “Tabta bakawaweiys tasiyas mapulut waseg?”
42022050	Ilivans ikous, mo teitan itamnow napulut tanmunum iweiy teitan tanuwgwes lun sitovek natouwat, ibob teigan.
42022051	Iwa̱ge Yeisuw, ilana, “Deisa!” mo ikabkwen teigan, ivag ibwein.
42022052	-
42022053	Yeisuw mo idibakes tasiyas tanuwgwes lun sisiyas tulals tasiyas nimtakavates Yowbad nabunatum, sisiyas tammwayas, peinan bo nimeis biyousis Yeisuw; ilana, “Bo nukumeis, mipulut minew kukokews, bukuyousigs ma̱wana tavveinaw yey? Yam katanok katanok sigwey yakamiy nitasesus Yowbad wanbunatum, nag kuyousigs. Nagein gog bukuyousigs, peinan imitut dadub kaleiwag waseg.”
42022054	Ituts, iwekes, iyousis Yeisuw, inawes tanuwgwes lun sitovek wanbunatum. Pita ikikun kadiveiyov.
42022055	Tawaw tasiyas ivla̱kes sikov tanuwgwes lun sitovek wanven, isinis wadadan kov. Pita siney tasiyas isinis.
42022056	Pita isin, kov imteil magin, na̱tan nakubukwab ikin bo ikabunik, iwtus, ilana, “Bo akin taw towen son Yeisuw.”
42022057	Pita ikayan, ilana, “Nag! Nag akakin taw towen.”
42022058	Isesus ee... teitan gamag ikin Pita, ilana, “Ya̱koum Yeisuw nagamag yak, ne?” Iwa̱ge Pita, ilana, “Yey nag.”
42022059	Isesus ee... imwemway nen, tatounun anilivan tawtoun, ilana, “Mounid taw towen son Yeisuw nisesus, peinan gum-Galiliy.”
42022060	Iwa̱ge Pita, ilana, “Nag! Nag akakin aveiyag kulivan.” Igawa illivan, bo igel kolkolek.
42022061	Yeisuw mo itouvin ikin Pita wamatan. Pita inuw Yeisuw anilivan mamagina: “Nagein bukwaya̱neig siva̱toun mo beigel kolkolek.”
42022062	Pita inuw Yeisuw anilivan, isap in watoulan ven, iva̱lam, singay igeg nanon.
42022063	Tasiyas niyousis Yeisuw mo isiba̱wes, iwaweiys.
42022064	Kweim waseg ilumwes matan, ikatiga̱nes, ilansa, “Kulivnek ma̱wana palopit ya̱koum. Kal to iweim?”
42022065	Asilivan babaw ikika̱nes Yeisuw, itawyages.
42022066	-
42022069	Iyam ga̱boug, tammwayas katuyouns imimeis, tasiyas tanuwgwes lun sisiyas takatimlakeins kaleiwag. Itokes Yeisuw inawes silma̱nin ya̱tal, ilansa, “Kukin ya̱koum Kelis ya̱koum, kadiloka kudibakem ma̱wan.” Iw to Yeisuw ilana, “Kukin badibakeimiy, nag bukusimounids. O kukin bakatiga̱neimiy, nag bukwatimapus agulivan. Tage nagein Gimgilitoun yey mo bassin Yowbad wanaka̱tay, va̱gan bakaleiwag.”
42022070	Iweis tasiyas, ilansa, “Tage ya̱koum Yowbad Natun, ne?” Yeisuw idibakes, ilana, “Bo nukulivans ma̱wan.”
42022071	Tasiyas mo ilivans, ilansa, “Nag sivinads gamag bikamtilakeids ansinap kalbaleb, peinan nitaliganes anilivan kalbaleb, tatonena ikamumwan.”
42023001	-
42023002	Iliganes anilivan, tasiyas babaw itamanaws, itokes Yeisuw, inawes Paylat waseg; mo iyateles, ilansa, “Yakamey min-Yudiy yakamey, o taw towen bimgwayem ked kalbaleb waseg. Nakaligen anilivan, ilana, ‘Awoum kutams Sisal nata̱kis waseg.’ Peinan ilana, ‘Yey Kelis, king yey.’”
42023003	Paylat ikatugan, ilana, “Ya̱koum min-Yudiy siking ya̱koum, ne?” Iwa̱ge Yeisuw, ilana, “Nukulivan ma̱wan.”
42023004	Paylat mo idibakes tanuwgwes lun situwa̱veks sisiyas gamag babaw, ilana, “Nag kweitan aban ansinap kalbaleb.”
42023005	Singay gog illivans, ilansa, “Bo ikabiyun gabman nakaleiwag. Ikatimlakes gamag ma̱wan. Bo isilamaw Galiliy o ven babaw Yudiy ikous, mo im ven towen, waseg anilivan towen kalbaleb.”
42023006	Paylat iligen asilivan, ilana, “Tage taw towen gum-Galiliy, ne?”
42023007	Ilansa, “Oo!” Paylat ilana, “Elod takaleiwag ven Galiliy waseg, kadiloka kunawes binek Elod; mtowen bikaleiwag.” Tut gog towen Elod nises Yelusalem. Paylat ikayeb Yeisuw, binek Elod va̱gan bikaleiwag.
42023008	Elod ikin Yeisuw neim, imwa̱saw, peinan tut kadiveiyov sivinan bikin Yeisuw. Bo iligen bulagan Yeisuw, tage sivinan bikin kweitan nawotet tawtoun.
42023009	Ikatitugwan waseg Yeisuw ee... bo nag. Nag ikatimop anilivan.
42023010	Tasiyas tanuwgwes lun sisiyas takatimlakeins kaleiwag itomos, singay iyateles Yeisuw, asilivan tawtouna singay.
42023011	Elod siney natakanaviy iyagages Yeisuw peinan ikasigumis, o issiba̱wes. Ikous, mo isekes Yeisuw anakweim mwaynamnabwein bisikam, peinan isiba̱wes. Ikous mo Elod ikayeb beiyum binek Paylat.
42023012	Yam towen Elod imwas son Paylat, peinan kweiboug kavikun son.
42023013	-
42023014	Paylat mo idawes bimeis tasiyas tanuwgwes lun, sisiyas takalleiwags, sisiyas min-Yudiy babaw. Imeis mo idibakes, ilana, “Nukumeyes taw towen, kuyateles, kulansa, ‘Imgwayem ked kalbaleb waseg, va̱gan bakakabiyun gabman nawotet.’ Wamtamiy bo nakatigan, nag kweitan ansinap kalbaleb aban ma̱wan nukuliva̱nes, nag.
42023015	-
42023016	“Wankuyeim mo akayeb inek Elod, o Elod nag kweitan iban ansinap kalbaleb, nag; mo ikayeb vayuwein iyamnavaw; o nag kaban ansinap kalbaleb. Nag ivag silawun bitakatimet gamag towen. Misinaka bawaweiy vatul waseg mo balik binoun.”
42023018	Iweis min-Yudiy tasiyas, iwaks, ilansa, “Awoum kulik taw towen, kwatimet-wan! Kulik Bala̱bas beim.”
42023019	Mtowen Bala̱bas nises wa̱deil peinan bo ikabutus gamag ven towen waseg mo ikanaviys wasigeis gabman natakanaviy, o bo iweiy gamag mwasanin.
42023020	Vayuwein Paylat mo iliwon, idibakes tasiyas, sivinan kid bilik Yeisuw, binoun.
42023021	Tasiyas gog iwkuwaks, ilansa, “Kwatikavates waklos beimat.”
42023022	Sivtounun idibakes, ilana, “Aveiyag wawun bitaweiy? Aveiyag ansinap kalbaleb? Nag aban ansinap kalbaleb va̱gan bakatimet. Misinaka bawaweiy mo balik binoun.”
42023023	-
42023024	Tasiyas gog min-Yudiy singaya iwkuwaks, sivines kid bikatimates Yeisuw. Avakaein ages iwkuwaks ee... bo itawtoun asilivan; Paylat bo iwnatout, mo itam.
42023025	Ilik taw towen nikabutus gamag silma̱nin naviy waseg gabman, tawa̱yin gamags mtowen Bala̱bas. Bo ilik, peinan gamag sivines. Tage Yeisuw itam silma̱nin ninous tasiyas biva̱ges.
42023026	Itokes Yeisuw, inawes, iyousis gum-Saylin mwana meinoy wanawoud neim, isekes Yeisuw anklos, tatonena ikew. Yeisuw imug in, gum-Saylin mtowen wankuyeim.
42023027	Gamag singay babaw ibukunis, o vinay mwasanin ivva̱lams-wan, peinan beiweiys Yeisuw.
42023028	-
42023029	Yeisuw itouvin idibakes tasiyas ilana, “Vinay-nen Yelusalem yakamiy, awoum kuva̱lams peinan beiweigs, kuva̱lams pinamiy simiyas nitimiyas. Peinan tut kalbaleb bukulivatus, mo gamag bilansa, ‘Tasiyas vinakal bwein, ta-ivag nitsiyas, nag ikakuda̱poms, nag ivsasus pwa̱pwaws.’
42023030	“Tut towen waseg gamag bidibakes koy, bilansa, ‘Kugiyeil kum kudibwanim’; peinan biwenes Yowbad. E, tut singay kalbaleb bukulivatus.
42023031	“Yey toubwein mamagina kay mwamov, bo iyagageigs yey, o yakamiy ma̱wana kaligweg nimta̱mats tasiyas bo biyagageimiy singay.”
42023032	Tasiyas takanaviy bikatimates-vak takalbalebs asteiy. Sisiy Yeisuw inawes bikatikavates wasklos.
42023033	Inawes ineis ven yagan “Busabwes,” mo ikatikavates naman kaken wanklos waseg, mo kativtawes klos akiwen, Yeisuw bikayagweg ee... beimat. Takalbalebs ma̱wan inuwakes, teitan wanaka̱tay, tayuwein wankimaw.
42023034	Yeisuw ikayagweg wanklos, initoug waseg Yowbad, ilana, “Tamag, kuwid asisimap kalbaleb, kunumlev. Peinan sikalbaleb niva̱ges nag ikakins.” Mo ikalawages anakweim; makava ilaves kweitan youd bikines kalisiy bikawes asikweim tatanok tatanok tasiyas.
42023035	Gamag babaw itowas ikikines, tage astakaleiwags isiba̱wes Yeisuw, ilansa, “Bo ikatinob gamag mwasanin; bweina bikatinob tatonen, magat mtowen Yowbad angamag Kelis.”
42023036	-
42023037	Tasiyas takanaviys-vak isiba̱wes, imimeis bisekes wayn yayan, ilansa, “Kukin ya̱koum min-Yudiy siking, kadilok kwatinabweim tatoneim.”
42023038	Anklos wakunuwatan bo ileles silawun neiweiys, mamagina: “Mtowen min-Yudiy siking.”
42023039	Takalbaleb teitan nikayagweg wanklos, iyeg Yeisuw, ilana, “Ya̱koum Kelis ne? Kwatinabweids simey ya̱koum.”
42023040	-
42023041	Tage son ikan, ilana, “Adok nag kugoul Yowbad, peinan neiweim bukumat ma̱wana taw towen. Ya̱kid aditeiy kadiloka bitamat peinan adsinap kalbaleb; tage taw towen nag ivag ansinap kalbaleb.”
42023042	Mo idibek Yeisuw, ilana, “Yeisuw, igaw bukusilamaw mukwaleiwag, kadiloka bukunuweig yey.”
42023043	Iw to Yeisuw, ilana, “Mounid adibakeim nagein bitasin ven bwanabwein waseg, yey soug yak.”
42023044	-
42023045	Bo yanay mo iladadub wadaban pwepway; ka̱las nag imiteil ven ee... itageg ka̱las mo ikamnat vayuwein. Maynawen kweim mwaynavakaein nisilbwed palakakit Yowbad wanbunatum mo iksigeb, ivag mwayney.
42023046	Yeisuw mo iwak, aygan avakaein, ilana, “Tamag, kululuwag kukow.” Ilivan ikous, mo ikanig.
42023047	Takalikay towen nikakin mo iya̱kawn waseg Yowbad, ilana, “Mounid taw towen tadidumwal.”
42023048	Gamag babaw nikatuyouns ikikines ikous, mo iyums ineis wasiven; iwaways wavtakous, peinan ninous igeg.
42023049	Yeisuw taliven nitowas ikikines, sisiyas vinay tasiyas nibukunis Yeisuw Galiliy waseg mo nimeis Yelusalem.
42023050	Gum-Alimatiy teitan yagan Yosep, inaven Alimatiy wawnuwan Yudiy. Mtowen Konsel teitan, ansinap bwein, didumwal.
42023051	Nag itam va̱gan bikatimates Yeisuw, bikayus kid; bo nag. Mtowen ikayamat Yowbad nakaleiwag asina̱vin beim.
42023052	Mtowen Yosep inek Paylat, initoug won Yeisuw silma̱nin bikow binow bidibwen.
42023053	Itam Paylat. Mtowen Yosep in mo inibwis Yeisuw, ikawes inawes, isumweilis kweim pwapwa̱kaw, isenas wanuwan alawag, mamagina takunumwan nitateiys koy dakul waseg. Takanigs nag idibwanis kweiboug wanuwan alawag towen, peinan kweivaw mwana nitateiys, mo itakus Yeisuw alawag towen waseg.
42023054	Yam towen ikatunags silma̱nin sagal nubweig, bo beiyam nubweig Sa̱dad, min-Yudiy tasiyas siSa̱bat.
42023055	Vinay-nen Galiliy siyas nibukunis Yeisuw nimeis Yelusalem, bo ikikunis Yosep, ikines ama̱wan inuwek, Yeisuw isen wakalawag, mo iyums, ikatinages tagon simasim va̱gan won Yeisuw biptumis. SiSa̱bat iyeiwas, peinan Moses nakaleiwag ma̱wan.
42024001	Iyam nen ga̱boug, kweivaw wik isilamaw. Walalayis vinay tasiyas ilakwanes alawagan. Tagon simasim to niva̱ges nisemos, bo ikawes inawes Yeisuw biptumis.
42024002	Dakul towen nisenas Yeisuw alawagan wadon nikatibwades bo iba̱nes niyatipines nises wadadan.
42024003	Isiws ineis wanuwan iwekes makawa-wan. Nag iba̱nes Yeisuw.
42024004	Bo isunasun ninous, peinan alawag makaw; bo itamanaws wadides tawaw asteiy asikweim mamagina kavikawn, ikaligwen mites.
42024005	-
42024007	Vinay aspwa̱yat, ikululs avakaein, migis kakita binek pwepway. Tawaw idibakes, ilansa, “Aveiyag wawun kunineivs towen tamwamov, takanig siven waseg? Kuninuways igaw simiy waGaliliy anilivan, ilana, ‘Teitan gamag bisilkodeig Gimgilitoun yey, va̱gan tasiyas takalbalebs bikatimateigs waklos. Kweitoun yam mo ba̱kit vayuwein.’”
42024008	-
42024009	Ilivans ikous, mo inuwes Yeisuw anilivan mamagin, mo ilisawes alawag, iyums, asilivan babaw idibakes Yeisuw navamul sinawatan tatanok sisiyas tasiyas babaw.
42024010	-
42024011	Vinay tasiyas yiges Meliy Magdal, Yowan, Yemes inan yagan Meliy, sisiyas vinay mwasanin. Vinay tasiyas asilivan idibakes tasiyas takaweins Yeisuw anilivan. Tage nag isimounids, idokes asilivan mamagina kwa̱neib.
42024013	Yam towen asteiy inounas bineis ven yagan Emeyus. Kukin bitanoy Yelusalem biten Emeyus katanok veit.
42024014	Tasiyas asteiy inounas illivans sinap tasiyas nikamat Yelusalem waseg.
42024015	-
42024016	Igaw illivans asteiy, Yeisuw mo inekes, asteitoun inounas, tage mites nag kadilok biwtusis Yeisuw.
42024017	Yeisuw idibakes, ilana, “Aveiyag kuliva̱nes amiteiy nukuninounas?” Ilivan ikous, itounis tasiyas; bo igeg ninous.
42024018	Teitan yagan Kliyopas, ikatimop anilivan, ilana, “Adok kweivaw gamag ya̱koum nukum Yelusalem, nag kukwakin aveiyag niva̱ges tut towen. Peinan gamag babaw bo ikakins.”
42024019	-
42024020	Iwa̱ge Yeisuw, ilana, “Aveiyag?” Ilansa, “Liva̱nen gum-Nasalet yagan Yeisuw. Mtowen palopit nawotet tawtoun, anilivan tawtoun, wamatan Yowbad, wamtes-vak gamag babaw. Tage tasiyas imalun tanuwgwes sisiyas amatakaleiwags bo ipiyaves, iyateles; isekes mina-Lom wasigeis va̱gan bikatimates waklos.
42024021	“Yakamey kadok mtowen bikatinabwem, min-Yisleil yakamey. E, bo iweiys ikous, sinovan. Akweiy yam bo nein wankuyeim.
42024022	-
42024023	“Sinap kweitan mo kaligen, waseg isom ninom. Peinan simayas vinay mwasanin walalayis nagein ilakwanes alawagan, tage nag iba̱nes Yeisuw; iyums, ilansa, ‘Nakakin mamagina min-liba̱lab, asilivan ilansa, “Yeisuw bo imov.” ‘
42024024	“Simayas mwasanin mo ineis wakalawag, iwekes makaw, ma̱wan vinay asilivan, tage nag ikines Yeisuw.”
42024025	Iw to Yeisuw, idibakes, ilana, “Takabala̱wein yakamiy, bo ibol ninoumiy, peinan nag kusimounids kweiboug palopits asilivan!
42024026	“Kadiloka bigeg a̱ban Kelis, ma̱wana nukuliva̱nes; ikous mo bikow yakawanan avakaein.”
42024027	Mo ikatimlakes liva̱nen tatonen Bukitab waseg. Isilamaw waseg Moses nakaleiwag o tasiyas palopit sikalelel o Bukitab babaw ikatimlakes ikous.
42024028	Inounas, ikkatimlakes ee... kakita bisaps wasiven. Yeisuw gog bilisawes binoun.
42024029	Tasiyas gog kayuses, ilansa, “Kum wamabunatum kumasis, peinan bo ikwayav.” Isimkines mo itam; siney isiws wasibunatum.
42024030	Isiws wabunatum, isinis beikams; mo ikow bled, anilivan bwanabwein isek, ikivis, isekes beikams.
42024031	Mamagina bo ilal mites, peinan iwtusis Yeisuw; ikous, mo imtikiniges tasiyas.
42024032	Asteiy ilivans, ilansa, “Mounid bo imwan woud, nikatimlakeid wa̱ked mo takakin Bukitab.”
42024033	-
42024034	Nuwanaw itamanaws, iyums ineis Yelusalem; iba̱nes navamul sinawatan tatanok katuyouns nisesus sisiyas gamag mwasanin. Navamul asilivan mamagina, “DaGuyaws bo ikit, inek Saymon, mo ikin.”
42024035	Tasiyas asteiy mo ikamteles asisinap wa̱ked, peinan Yeisuw inekes, sisiy beikams, ikivis bled, mo iwtusis.
42024036	-
42024037	Iliva̱nes ma̱wan, Yeisuw mo itoun wanuwein tasiyas, isiblutes. Aspwa̱yat; idokes tobwag, mamagina a̱luw.
42024038	-
42024039	Idibakes, ilana, “Awoum kuweneigs! Awoum ninoumiy bibabaw! Yey! Kukines namag, kakeig; yeya toneig. Kwabkwanes woug, kukines yeya toneig. A̱luw nag ivag viniyon son tatuwan ma̱wana nukukineigs yey.”
42024041	Singaya imwa̱saws, nag isimounids, peinan ninous babaw, mo idibakes, ilana, “Tabta kan nises ba̱kam.”
42024042	-
42024043	Iba̱nes in sulusul, isekes; ikam wamtes.
42024044	Mo idibakes, ilana, “Agulivan towen nasekeimiy kweiboug sigwey yakamiy tasesus, peinan liva̱neig nises Moses nakaleiwag waseg, o liva̱neig nises tasiyas palopit sikalelel waseg, o liva̱neig nises wous tasiyas sam wasigeis; e, kadiloka liva̱neig babaw bikamat.”
42024045	Mo ikatiboug nuwes bikakins Bukitab.
42024046	-
42024047	Idibakes, ilana, “Bukitab waseg nileles mamagina: kadiloka bigeg a̱ban Kelis, beimat, yam kweitoun mo beikit vayuwein, mo liva̱nen Kelis bigeiguys ven babaw va̱gan gamag bilaves asisinap kalbaleb, mo Yowbad biwid binumlev. E, bisilamaws Yelusalem mo bineis ven babaw.
42024048	“Yakamiy takaweins livan towen.
42024049	“Tamag nikatigik kululuwan teitan bilabeimiy. Yey ban mo bakayeb towen biwekeimiy. Kadiloka kusesusa ven towen ee... Yowbad natawtoun mo biwekeimiy.”
42024050	Anilivan ikous, imgwayes inounas ineis Beta̱niy, itamnow naman, anilivan bwanabwein isekes.
42024051	Igawa illivan mo ilisawes, imwen in walba̱lab.
42024052	Iyums tasiyas, ineis Yelusalem, imwa̱saws seikwan.
42024053	Tut babaw nisesus Yowbad wanbunatum, iya̱kawns waseg.
43001001	Wanamug gamag yagan Livan nises. Gamag towen yagan Livan waseg Yowbad nises. Gamag towen yagan Livan son Yowbad katanok-wan.
43001002	Gamag towen yagan Livan son Yowbad wanamug nisesus.
43001003	Gamag towen yagan Livan youda babaw ibubun. Peinan Livan towen waseg, mo Yowbad nibun youd meivek-wan.
43001004	Mtowen taymovein youda babaw; mwamovan towen magina gamag ya̱kids dakamnats.
43001005	Kamnat towen imteil ven dadub waseg. Dadub nag iyakous kamnat towen. Igawa nises.
43001006	Yowbad nikayeb gamag teitan, tabibapta̱ysein gamags, yagan Yon.
43001007	Yon neim; nawotet bikamtilakeids mo bitakines gamag towen ansinap kamnat, va̱gan kid babaw gamag mo bitasimounids waseg.
43001008	Yon nag kamnat tatonen; misinaka ikamtilakeids bitakines mtowen kamnat tatonen.
43001009	Mtowen kamnat mounid, immiteil wasigeis gamag tatanok tatanok. E, mtowen bo neim ven watinow.
43001010	Im watinow, ven towen nibubun; tage ven watinow nag ikakins mtowen.
43001011	Inekes inagamag, tage bo ipiyaves.
43001012	Mwasanin gog bo itams waseg mtowen mo ita̱mes tasiyas, va̱gan bimlavags Yowbad nitun tasiyas, peinan isimounids mtowen Mesay waseg.
43001013	Nag ikopwes tasiyas, gamag buyvis waseg; nag. Nag ikopwes tasiyas peinan gamag sivines. Nag ikopwes tasiyas gamag sikaleiwag waseg; nag. Yowbad nakaleiwag waseg.
43001014	Livan towen im watinow, imlavag gimgilitoun, nisik davanuys. Nakakin mtowen singay takamnat, mamagina Taman Natun tatonen, singaya isiwa̱youb, ansinap mounid waseg.
43001015	Yon nikatimlakem, niwkuwak, ilana, “Mtowen liva̱nen nalivan: ‘Igaw watibweloug teitan beim, bimug waseg yey. Yey ba̱bus, peinan tutan gunakabsilamaw waseg, mtowen igawa nises.’
43001016	“Mtowen guyaw avakaein; singaya ivvagein issekeids; nasiwa̱youb ikatitimweis bo ivakaein.
43001017	“Moses bo isekeids nakaleiwag; tage Yeisuw Kelis isiwyoubuds ansinap mounid waseg.
43001018	“Ta-kweitan tut gamag ikin Yowbad, nag. Tage Yowbad nipwa̱kit Natun tatonen; mtowen nikatimlakeids Taman, mo takines.”
43001019	Wankuyeim gamag mwasanin inekes Yon ikatugans waseg, mo ikatimop asilivan. Peinan min-Yudiy tammwayas tasiyas misikes Yelusalem ikayabes tanuwgwes lun, sisiyas mwasanin Livay delen nimtakavates Yowbad nabunatum. Ikayabes tasiyas, inekes Yon, ikatugans waseg, ilansa, “Kal ya̱koum?”
43001020	Yon anilivan kamnat isek, ilana, “Yey nag Takatuneib Kelis, nag.”
43001021	Mo ikatiga̱nes, ilansa, “Kal yak? Ilaytiy adok?” Ilana, “Nag.” Ilansa, “Adok ya̱koum palopit towen nakakayyamat?” Ilana, “Nag.”
43001022	Mo idibakes, ilansa, “Kal yak? Liva̱neim aveiyag bukulivan, va̱gan bakanow bakasekes tasiyas nikayabemas nakam?”
43001023	Iw to Yon, ilana, “Yey tawkuwak wanawoud va̱gan bukukidumwa̱lus daGuyaws inaked, ma̱wan palopit Isaya nilivnek.”
43001024	Tasiyas Palisiy misikes Yelusalem, nikayabes gamag tasiyas nimeis ikatugans waseg Yon.
43001025	E, vayuwein tasiyas mo ikatiga̱nes, ilansa, “Kukin ya̱koum nag Kelis ya̱koum, nag Ilaytiy ya̱koum, nag palopit towen ya̱koum, aveiyag wawun kubapta̱yses gamags?”
43001026	-
43001027	Yon ikatimop asilivan, ilana, “Yey abaptays yevagam waseg. Tage wanuwein yakamiy teitan nises, nag kukwakins kavel; watibweloug mtowen beim, tage nag kadilokeig bakulul wamatan va̱gan kid bakablev nasandol, peinan mtowen singay iguyaw.”
43001028	Ilivan ma̱wan Betaniy waseg, ven towen palata-dadan Yoldan. Ven towen waseg Yon nibapta̱yses gamags.
43001029	Neiyam-nen Yon ikin Yeisuw im, ilana, “Kukines Yowbad a̱len la̱miy mtowen lun bulukwan, beimat silma̱nids ya̱kids, va̱gan biwidids adsinaps kalbaleb waseg.
43001030	“Mtowen liva̱nen kweiboug nalivan, ‘Watibweloug teitan beim, mtowen bimug. Yey ba̱bus, peinan tutan gunakabsilamaw, towen igawa nises.’
43001031	“E, yey nag bakakin kavel towen, tage nam abapta̱yseimiy min-Yisleil yakamiy yevagam waseg, va̱gan bukukwakins guyaw towen.”
43001032	-
43001034	Wankuyeim liva̱nen Yeisuw Yon mo ilivan; ilana, “Akin Kululuwan Yowbad ibus walba̱lab im, magin ma̱wana bwabun, iton Yeisuw wakunun. O yey nag bakakin towen, tage towen nikayabeig nam silma̱nin babaptays yevagam waseg, towen nidibakeig, ‘Kukin kal Kululuwag beibus biton wakunun, mtowen tabapta̱ysein gamags Kululuwag Bwanabwein waseg.’ Yey bo akin, to adibakeimiy mtowen Yowbad Natun tatonen.”
43001035	Neiyam-nen Yon mo itamanaws sen inavamul asteiy, itowas.
43001036	Yon ikin Yeisuw ininoun, ilana, “Kukines Yowbad a̱len.”
43001037	Navamul asteiy iliganes, mo ikabwa̱kuns Yeisuw waseg.
43001038	Yeisuw itouvin, ikines tasiyas ikabwa̱kuns waseg, mo ilana, “Aveiyag sivinamiy?” Tasiyas gog, ilansa “O matovek, avanuy mukusik?” (Aga-Muyuw “matovek”, ages gog tasiyas “Labay”.)
43001039	Ilana, “Kumeis taneis mo bukukines.” Siney mo ineis, ikines nakabmasis, ikaypuls sisiy, asibabaw imasis ven towen, peinan bo ikwayav.
43001040	Yam towen asteiy tasiyas niliganes Yon anilivan, ikabwa̱kuns Yeisuw waseg. Teitan yagan Andiluw inuw tuwan yagan Saymon Pita nises.
43001041	Nuwanaw in inineiv tuwan; iban mo ilana, “Saymon, bo kaban towen Mesay.” (Takativini gog yagan “Mesay” bein aga-Gilis “Kelis”.)
43001042	Andiluw mo itok tuwan inekes Yeisuw. Yeisuw ikabunik, mo ilana, “Ya̱koum Saymon, Yon natun ya̱koum; badokeim Pita.” (Takativini gog bein aga-Muyuw, “Dakul”.)
43001043	Neiyam-nen Yeisuw sivinan bein Galiliy. In Galiliy mo iban Pilip, idibek, ilana, “Kwabkunig yey.”
43001044	Andiluw son Pita siven Beteseid. To Pilip naven katanok-wan Beteseid.
43001045	Pilip inek Nataniyel ilana, “Bo kaban Mesay; Moses nakaleiwag waseg nilel ilivnek mtowen beim bikatinabweids, o tasiyas palopits nileles ilivnakes liva̱nen towen waseg; mtowen gum-Nasalet, yagan Yeisuw, taman yagan Yosep.”
43001046	Nataniyel ilana, “Adok na-ikadilok youd bwanabwein beim ven to Nasalet waseg. Adok nag.” Pilip ilana, “Kum, kukin.”
43001047	Ineis; Yeisuw mo ikin Nataniyel imimeim, ilana, “Kukines taw towen ansinap bwein, nag bikatidev son, peinan gum-Yisleil mounid.”
43001048	Nataniyel iligen anilivan, mo ilana, “Ama̱wan nukukwakin yey?” Yeisuw ikatimop anilivan, ilana, “Igaw Pilip bidaweim bukum, bo akineim mukusik yaveinun wangwanan.”
43001049	Nataniyel ilana, “O guntovek, mounid ya̱koum Yowbad Natun ya̱koum; min-Yisleil ya̱kids imaking ya̱koum.”
43001050	-
43001051	Yeisuw ikatimop anilivan, ilana, “Tayyaweid yak! Peinan adibakeim, alana, ‘Bo akineim yaveinun wangwanan’ mo kusimounid. Sinap towen kakit; igaw tawtoun bukukin. Mounid adibakeim igaw bukukin liba̱lab bikaliyow, Yowbad nataka̱yobs mo bimnamwens o bibweibus Mesay Gimgilitoun yey waseg.”
43002001	Yam akweiy ikous, mina-Ken mwasanin mo isagals, veivay silma̱nin. Ken wawnuwan ven avakaein Galiliy. Yeisuw inan in Ken silma̱nin sagal towen.
43002002	Bo idawes-vak Yeisuw, sen navamul, ineis sagal towen silma̱nin.
43002003	Issagals ee... wayn bo ikous. Yeisuw inan mo idibek, ilana, “Asiwayn bo ikous.”
43002004	Iw to Yeisuw, ilana, “Adok mukwaleiwag towen; yey gunakaleiwag igaw.”
43002005	Yeisuw inan mo idibakes tanuwagan sagal navamuls, ilana, “Aveiyag Yeisuw bidibakeimiy, kadiloka bukuwteles.”
43002006	Kunasoup nisesus kunanim kunatan, silma̱nin min-Yudiy biwidis nimes, kikeis; peinan asisinap ma̱wan. Kunasoup kavka̱vek, vakanes mamagina gamag vakaeinan.
43002007	Yeisuw idibakes, ilana, “Kuvgwagwes kunasoup, yevagam waseg; mo ivgwagwes, in, ika̱lawt.”
43002008	Yeisuw mo ilana, “Kunasoup waseg kukilis, kukwawes kunawes tanawagan sagal waseg,” mo iwteles ma̱wan.
43002009	-
43002010	Tanuwagan sagal ikamkwen yevagam towen bo imlavag wayn; nag bikakin avanuy meinoy neim, tage tasiyas takilins yevagam ikakins; tanuwagan sagal mo idow taveivay va̱gan beim bilivans son. Ilana, “Gamag babaw sagal nakabsilamaw waseg isekes wayn singaya bwein, imwamoums ee... iyakousis, wankuyeim mo isekes kalamwey wayn; tage ya̱koum amsinap kweitan, wayn bwanabwein kwayus, sagal nakabiyokous waseg mo kusekem ka̱moum.”
43002011	Nakabsilamaw mulin naman Yeisuw nivag towen, ven Ken wawnuwan Galiliy, waseg ikatimlakes natawtoun, navamul mo isimounids waseg.
43002012	Sagal towen ikous, mo iyum ineis Kapaneyum son inan, siney budan, o navamul. Nag biveiyov tut nisesus Kapaneyum.
43002013	Min-Yudiy kakita bo bisagals, sagal towen yagan Kaltuwon. Mapun Yeisuw in Yelusalem.
43002014	Isap Yowbad wanbunatum iba̱nes tasiyas tanuwgwes bulumakaw, o sip, o bwabun, nimeyes aleis va̱gan gamag babaw mo bigimwals wasigeis; sisiyas tasiyas takaweins money va̱gan bikatimapus dakul silma̱nin muloul Yowbad wanbunatum.
43002015	Yeisuw ikow vatul, ivkek inanew va̱gan biwaway, mo ikawsapes, babaw isawls ineis watoulan. Ikawsapes aleis, ineis watoulan. Simoney itigabaw ininein wapwepway; siteibol ikatitan, ikalka̱louw ikanta̱nays.
43002016	Idibakes tanuwgwes bwabun, ilana, “Kukwawes, kunawes watoulan. Awoum kuva̱ges Tamag nabunatum magina abgimwal.”
43002017	Navamul ikikines, mo inuwes Bukitab nilivnek mamagina, “Bo iseiw nuwag mubunatum.”
43002018	Min-Yudiy mo ikatiga̱nes Yeisuw, ilansa, “Namam mulin aveiyag bukwatimlakem va̱gan bakakakin mukwaleiwag, wotet towen silma̱nin?”
43002019	Yeisuw ikatimop asilivan, ilana, “Bukugulekwes bunatum towen, yam kweitoun mo bawlulavaw.”
43002020	Min-Yudiy ilansa, “Bweilim sinawavas kweinim katanok iwlules Yowbad nabunatum towen. Adok nag kadilokeim bukuwlulavaw kweitoun yam waseg.”
43002021	Tage Yeisuw nag ilivan liva̱nen Yowbad nabunatum, ikabebay silma̱nin won tatonen.
43002022	Igaw tut wankuyeim mo ikanig, ikit vayuwein; ikous, navamul mo inuwes anilivan towen, mo isimounids Bukitab waseg, o isimounids Yeisuw anilivan waseg.
43002023	Igaw nises Yelusalem, sagal towen Kaltuwon waseg, babaw gamag ikikines naman mulin mo isimounids waseg.
43002024	-
43002025	Tage Yeisuw nag isimounid wasigeis tasiyas, peinan ikakina gamag babaw asisinap. Nag kadilok teitan bikatimlek sinapun gamag, peinan ikakina gamag ninous.
43003001	Palisiy teitan yagan Nikodimos, guyawun ven Yudiy.
43003002	Mtowen inek Yeisuw, boug waseg, ilana. “Tamwey, kakakin Yowbad nikayabeim nukum kwatimlakem yakamey, peinan namam mulin kuvag mamagina Yowbad nawotet. Kukin nag Yowbad soum bilabeim, nag bukuwtel ma̱wan.”
43003003	Yeisuw ilana, “Mounid anukweim, magat nag bikopweim vayuwein, nag bukukin Yowbad nakaleiwag, nag.”
43003004	Iw to Nikodimos, ilana, “Adok nag kal bikopweig vayuwein! Ta-ma̱wan inag bikopweig vayuwein, peinan yey bo avakaein.”
43003005	Yeisuw ilana, “Yowbad Kululuwan kadilokena bikopweim! Mounid anukweim, kukin Kululuwan Yowbad nag bikopweim yevagam waseg, ta-ma̱wan bukusiw wanuwan Yowbad nakaleiwag. Tage kukin Yowbad Kululuwan bikopweim, bweina bukusiw wanuwan nakaleiwag.
43003006	“Gimgeilin inan bikop gimgeilin-wan; tage Kululuwan Yowbad bikop bo kululuwan-wan.
43003007	“Awoum bisunasun nanoum agulivan towen, ‘Kadiloka bikopweimiy vayuwein.’
43003008	“Yag ampalawen sivinan beitow, butkawan bukuligen, tage nag kukwakin avanuy meinoy neim, o bein avanuy. Ma̱wana tasiyas Yowbad Kululuwan ikopwes.”
43003009	Nikodimos ikatimop anilivan, ilana, “Ama̱wan youd tasiyas?”
43003010	-
43003011	Yeisuw idibek, “Adok min-Yisleil wasigeis, ya̱koum takatimlakein gamags, ya̱koum; tage nag kukwakin youd siyas, ne? Mounid anukweim, aveiyag nakakakin youd siyas kanukweimiy, o yakamiy gog nag kusimounids.
43003012	“Peinan ta-kusimounids agulivan, sinapun ven watinow waseg, ta-ma̱wan bakatimlakeimiy sinapun liba̱lab!
43003013	“Nag kadilok gamag beimwen bein walba̱lab. Misinak Gimgilitoun yey, bo alisow gunaven liba̱lab, a̱bus am watinow, kadilokeig ba̱yum ban walba̱lab.
43003014	-
43003015	“Kweiboug wanawoud, Moses itamnow mwatet tanmunum, ma̱wan magin igaw mo bitamnaweigs yey, Gimgilitoun yey, va̱gan kal yak bukusimounid waseg yey mo bukuban mwamovam bises bisigeg.
43003016	“Singay Yowbad isiwyoubus ven watinow gimgilis. Natun gog anmwa̱net bo itam, bo isek va̱gan bikatinabwes gamag. Kukin kal bisimounid towen waseg nag bigeg, nag; mwamovan son bises bisigeg.
43003017	“Yowbad ikayeb natun neim ven watinow nag silma̱nin biyateles gamag babaw, nag; nikayeb neim va̱gan kid bikatinabwes gamag.
43003018	“Kukin kal bisimounid waseg Yowbad Natun, nag biya̱tal; nag. Tapiyaveins gog Yowbad Natun siya̱tal nises, peinan nag isimounids waseg Yowbad Natun anmwa̱net-wan, o peinan yagan ipiyaves.
43003019	“Silawun ya̱tal towen, peinan kamnat bo isap im ven watinow; tage gamag ipiyaves, sivines kid dadub, peinan siwotet kalbaleb.
43003020	“Takalbalebs ipiyaves gog kamnat; nag bimeis kamnat waseg, peinan bo bimteil asisinap kalbaleb.
43003021	“Towen gog nawotet mounid bo bimek kamnat waseg, mo bimteil nawotet bwanabwein, niwwtel Yowbad waseg.”
43003022	Wankuyeim Yeisuw sen navamul mo ineis wawnuwan ven Yudiy; misikes ven towen, ibibapta̱yses gamag.
43003023	Yon gog misik ibibapta̱yses gamag ven yagan Aynon, walasin Selim, peinan ven towen yevagam avakaein nises. Gamags imimeis mo ibapta̱yses.
43003024	Nag iyousis Yon va̱gan beisiw wa̱deil. Igaw.
43003025	Yon navamul mwasanin mo ikamnimans sisiy gum-Yudiy teitan, idokes kalisiy sivka̱kay bwein va̱gan biwid gamag sikalbaleb.
43003026	Mapuna inekes Yon, ilansa, “Tamwey, taw towen nukwatimlakem, kulana, ‘Yowbad a̱len towen,’ kweiboug soum nukusesus ven towen niweiw, Yoldan nimeim; tut towen bo neim ibapta̱yses gamags, o gamag babaw ininekes.”
43003027	Yon ilana, “Tanuwagan liba̱lab takaleiwag inasiwa̱youb wasigeis ya̱kids va̱gan bitamwa̱saws. Towen anmwa̱net takaleiwag.
43003028	“Yakamiy nukuliganes agulivan mamagina, ‘Yey nag Mesay Kelis; nag. Misinaka Yowbad nikayabeig amgwey mtowen Kelis.’
43003029	“Mtowen, imwa̱saw ma̱wana taveivay, peinan taveivay ikow inakwav. Veiyon-vak imwa̱saw peinan ikin taveivay ikow inakwav. Yey ma̱wana veiyon towen, aligen aygan, amwa̱saw avakaein, mtowen Yeisuw silma̱nin.
43003030	“Butun mtowen bo bivakaein; yey gog bo ba̱bus.”
43003031	-
43003032	Mtowen meinoy neim walba̱lab, singay imug. Tage min-pwepway ya̱kids mitanoys nitameis pwepway waseg, tallivans kid liva̱nen ven watinow. Mtowen meinoy neim walba̱lab singay imug; aveiyag wamatan nikin, o teigan waseg niligen, mo ikatimlakeids; tage babaw gamag ipiyaves anilivan.
43003033	Kukin kal bo biligen anilivan, bisimounid, mamagina bo ikamtel Yowbad ansinap mounid.
43003034	Mtowen Yowbad nikayeb neim, ikatimlakeids Yowbad ansinap, peinan singaya ikatpel Kululuwan isek towen.
43003035	Taman Yowbad sivinan Natun, youda babaw nisiwa̱youb waseg.
43003036	Kukin kal bisimounid waseg Natun, mwamovan bises bisigeg; togo tapiyavein Natun nag biban mwamovan, peinan Yowbad bikavvikun waseg.
43004001	-
43004003	Tasiyas Palisiy iliganes liva̱nen Yeisuw peinan ibapta̱yses gamag babaw mo imlavags navamul; o iliganes liva̱nen Yon ibapta̱yses gamag nag ibabaw; tage Yeisuw nag ibaptays, navamul gog ibapta̱yses gamags. Yeisuw ikakin ninous tasiyas Palisiy, mapuna ilisow Yoldan, inoun, vayuwein mo in Galiliy.
43004004	Ked towen waseg kadiloka bikanapel Samaliy mo bein Galiliy.
43004005	Isap gog min-Samaliy wasiven yagan Saykal, walasin pwepway towen Yekob nisek natun Yosep pwa̱mug-o.
43004006	Yevagam towen kweiboug Yekob ikaviyeil. Yeisuw ininoun wa̱ked ee... mo isap, bo isoumat; isin wadadan yevagam.
43004007	-
43004008	Navamul ineis waven bigimwals kan. Bo ya̱nay. Nen-Samaliy mo im beikil soup. Yeisuw idibek, ilana, “Soup kumey, ba̱moum.”
43004009	Vin mana̱wen mo ilana, “Adok ya̱koum gum-Yudiy ya̱koum. Aveiyag wawun kunitoug soup waseg vinen-Samaliy yey?” (Peinan min-Yudiy isisina̱les min-Samaliy.)
43004010	Yeisuw ikatimop anilivan, ilana, “Magat bukukwakin Yowbad nasiwa̱youb, o magat bukukwakin kavel yey anitoug yevagam waseg yak, adok mo bukunitoug waseg yey va̱gan kid basekeim soup mwamov silma̱nin.”
43004011	-
43004012	Vin idibek, ilana, “Ta-kweitan mukwayagweg nises. Ta-ma̱wan bukukil amsoup to kadiveiyov. Avanuy bukukil mo bukusekeig soup mwamov silma̱nin? Datoveks Yekob kweiboug guyaw avakaein, nikaviyeil yevagam towen, imwamoum, alen imwamoums, nitun tibun imwamoums ee... igawa kamwamoum yakamey. Tabta ya̱koum bukumgwey tamwey towen Yekob?”
43004013	-
43004014	Yeisuw ilana, “Kalisiy beimoums soup towen, igaw vayuwein mo beivag asidak. Tage kukin kal beimoum soup towen yey basek, nag vayuwein beivag anadak; nag. Soup towen basek bimlavag mamagina yuwyeiwl bibwabwab wanuwan, silma̱nin mwamovan nag beikous.”
43004015	Vin mana̱wen ilana, “O guyaw, soup towen kumey ba̱moum, va̱gan beikous agudak; awoum ge bamimeim bakilikil agusoup.”
43004016	Yeisuw ilana, “Kun kudibek mumwan, kumeis amiteiy.”
43004017	-
43004018	Vin mana̱wen ikatimop anilivan, ilana, “Ta-ivag gunamwan.” Yeisuw ilana, “Mounid amlivan. ‘Ta-ivag gunamwan.’ Adok mumwa̱nas asteinim; towen gog soum kusesus nag mumwan tonen, to amlivan mounid-wan.”
43004019	-
43004020	Vin mana̱wen ilana, “O guyaw, akakin ya̱koum palopit ya̱koum. Tammwayas bo ikululs wamatan Yowbad koy towen waseg; min-Yudiy yakamiy kulansa, ‘Kadilokeids bitakululs Yelusalem waseg.’”
43004021	Yeisuw ilana, “Kadiloka kusimounid agulivan towen. Igaw nag bitakulul wamatan Yowbad koy towen waseg, o Yelusalem waseg, peinan kweivaw kaleiwag bo bisap.
43004022	“Yakamiy nag kukwakins aveiyag towen kukululs wamatan. Yakamey kakakin, peinan wawun katuneib nises wasigeis min-Yudiy yakamey.
43004023	“Igaw kweivaw sinap bisilamaw. Mounid bo isilamaw tut towen waseg, peinan tasiyas ikululs mounid wamatan Yowbad, kululuwes waseg bikululs, sitapwa̱loul mounid. Peinan Tamads sivinan sinap towen, waseg gamag bitapwa̱louls bwein.
43004024	“Yowbad kululuwan mav. Tasiyas gog sivines bikululs wamatan Yowbad, kadiloka kululuwes waseg bikululs, mounid-wan; awoum bikululs mav.”
43004025	Vin mana̱wen mo idibek, ilana, “Akakin igaw Mesay beim, mtowen gamag mwasanin idokes Kelis. Igaw beim, mo bikatimlakeids youda babaw.”
43004026	Yeisuw ilana, “Mesay yey, mtowen nukulivans soum.”
43004027	Ilivan ma̱wan ikous, navamul mo iyums imeis; bo isunasun ninous peinan Yeisuw ilivans son kuda̱vin; (peinan min-Yudiy idokes nag kadilok taw bilivans son vin watapwan ven); tage nag teitan ilana, “Aveiyag sivinam?” o nag teitan ilana, “Aveiyag wawun kullivans soum mana̱wen vin?” nag. Ikika̱pays-wan.
43004028	-
43004029	Vin gog mana̱wen bo ilisow nakunasoup, inoun in waven, idibakes gamags; ilana, “Kumeis taneis kukines gamag teitan nidibakeig agusinap babaw kweiboug navvag. Tabta mtowen Kelis?”
43004030	Iliganes, mo ilisawes ven towen, inounas kid binekes Yeisuw.
43004031	Tage navamul bo nisimkakins waseg Yeisuw va̱gan kid beikam kan to nimeyes.
43004032	Togo Yeisuw ilana, “Yey kag nises. Yakamiy nag kukwakins.”
43004033	Tasiyas ilansa, “Tabta kal-tan kan isek ikam?”
43004034	Yeisuw ilana, “Yey kag nises. Bo bakanow Yowbad aygan, aveiyag sivinan, mo bayakous nawotet. To silma̱nin nikayabeig nam. Agusinap towen kag-wan.
43004035	-
43004036	“Adok yakamiy kulansa, ‘Kweivas tibukon mo bitata̱yoys kan.’ Tage kukin bikiplal mitamiy mo bukukines kan bo iyebwel, peinan bo imatuw. Tatayaweins kan ikawes maysan wotet, o ita̱yoys anagin towen, gamag mwamoves nag beikous. Mapuna mo bimwa̱saws tasiyas tasapweins kan sisiyas tasiyas tatayaweins kan.
43004037	“Livan towen mounid-wan, mamagina, ‘Tasapwein kan kweitan; tatayawein kan kweitan.’
43004038	“Yey akayabeimiy va̱gan bukuta̱yoys bag towen. Mwasanin gamag niwteles bag, yakamiy nag; misinaka kuta̱yoys-wan; tage bo niwteles nanawan.”
43004039	Ven towen Samaliy gimgilis babaw mo isimounids Yeisuw waseg, peinan vin anilivan, “Nidibakeig agusinap babaw kweiboug navvag.”
43004040	-
43004042	Min-Samaliy tasiyas mo inekes Yeisuw, ilansa, “Kum kuyeiwas wamaven, amabwabwal ya̱koum.” Itam. Siney tasiyas nisesus akweiy yam, iliganes anilivan. Iliganes, singay babaw mo isimounids waseg; idibakes vin mana̱wen, ilansa, “Kaligen amlivan, kakit kasimounid; tage tut towen yakameyan-wan nakaligen anilivan, mo kakakin mounid mtowen takatinabweids ven watinow gimgilis ya̱kids.”
