58002017	Kadiloka bimlavag gamag ma̱wana budan ya̱kids, mo imlavag tanuwgwes-lun sitovek, inok nuwan ya̱kids, o itoukum waseg Yowbad nawotet, mamagina iluns son Yowbad o iwid adsinaps kalbaleb, mo Yowbad ikalin nuwan ya̱kids.
58002018	Ven watinow Yeisuw a̱ban igeg, Seitan iyakwen, bo nag; mapuna ikadilok bilabeids ya̱kids, avei-tut Seitan biyakwaneids.
58003001	E sigwey, Yowbad inagamag yakamiy o yey; peinan bo idaweids ya̱kids silma̱nin liba̱lab. Kadiloka taninuways mtowen Yeisuw, peinan Yowbad nikayeb neim, mamagina tanuwagan lun, datapwa̱louls waseg.
58003002	Ma̱wan Moses kweiboug itoukum Yowbad inabunatum waseg, e, Yeisuw-vak ma̱wan, itoukum inawotet to Yowbad nisek.
58003003	Moses yakawanan kalamwey-nen, tage Yeisuw yakawanan singay avakaein, ma̱wana yakawanan tawtelein bunatum. Tage bunatum yakawanan kalamwey kakit, ma̱wan Moses yakawanan.
58003004	(Bunatum katanok katanok tawteleins nisesus, tage tawtelein youd babaw Yowbad.)
58003005	Yowbad nabunatum waseg, natouwat Moses kweiboug itoukum nawotet babaw waseg, mamagina takatimlakay, ilana, “Igaw Yowbad mo bikaleiwag ma̱wan, ma̱wan.”
58003006	Tage Kelis, inabunatum waseg, bo itoukum mamagina Natun. Ya̱kids inabunatum ya̱kids; magat bitakapwapouts silma̱nin youd siyas bwanabwein nilivnek.
58003007	E, kuninuways Kululuwan Bwanabwein ilivan mamagina: “Nagein gog, avei-tut bukuligen aygan,
58003008	Awoum bikeikay ninoumiy ma̱wana tasiyas kweiboug niyakwaneigs wanawoud, mo ipiyaves gunakaleiwag.
58003009	Peinan timmiyas iyakwaneigs, o ikines gunawotet tawtoun, bweilim sinawavas waseg.
58003010	Tage gamag tasiyas bo ivasiganigs, mo alana, ‘Tut babaw itapleileiys mav. Nag ikakins gunaked.’
58003011	Kapasal nuwag, mo akawtunes, alana, ‘Tasiyas nag kadilok beisiws gunakabyeiwas waseg, nag.’”
58003012	O sigwey, kuvna̱ses amisinap beibwein. Awoum beivag ninoumiy kalbaleb, waseg bukupiyaves Tamwamov towen Yowbad, mo bukukwalouws waseg.
58003013	E, tut nagein, bweina kuggeiguys simsimiyas wasigeis yam katanok katanok, mata ge sinap kalbaleb bikatidavimiy mo bikeikay ninoumiy.
58003014	Mounid bitamsamwas Kelis waseg. Magat bitavvaluts idanamis waseg, ma̱wana wanmugwana nitanmises. Kukin gog nag, bo bitadeivs.
58003015	Liva̱nen nises mamagina: “Nagein gog, avei-tut bukuliganes aygan, awoum bikeikay ninoumiy, ma̱wana tasiyas kweiboug nipiyaves Yowbad.”
58003016	Kuninuways tasiyas nivasiganis Yowbad, peinan ipiyaves aygan, mtasiyas Moses nitokes ilisawes Yidipt, mo inounas siney.
58003017	Bo ivasiganis Yowbad sinawavas bweilim, mtasiyas takalbalebs; mo ikanka̱nigs wanawoud.
58003018	E, Yowbad bo isek anilivan mounid mamagina: “Nag baspuyeimiy wamikabyeiwas waseg, nag.” Anilivan ma̱wan, peinan singaya ikapidabs waseg.
58003019	E, taninuways. Tasiyas nag kadilok beisiws sikabyeiwas waseg, peinan nag isimounids.
58004001	Kadiloka bitagoulus Yowbad. Anilivan nises waseg bitasiws dakabyeiwas waseg. Awoum biyamkwaneimiy mwasanin yakamiy.
58004002	Anilivan bwanabwein bo isekeids ma̱wana tasiyas. Tasiyas bo ikatiliganes, tage anilivan nag ilabes, peinan nag isimounids waseg.
58004003	-
58004004	Ya̱kids gog nitasimounids waseg Yowbad bo bitasiws idakabyeiwas waseg. Tasiyas nag. Anilivan silma̱nin tasiyas kweiboug mamagina: “Kapasal nuwag, atabudabod, alana, ‘Tasiyas nag beisiws sikabyeiwas waseg, nag.’” Kweiboug Yowbad ibun ven babaw ikous, mo iyakous nawotet towen. E, liva̱nen nises mamagina: “Yam kweinim katanok, Yowbad nawotet bo ikous, kwayuwein yam mo iyeiwas.”
58004005	-
58004006	Taninuways livan towen: “Tasiyas nag beisiws sikabyeiwas waseg, nag.” Gamag mwasanin beisiws waseg, tasiyas nag. Peinan nikatiliganes anilivan bwanabwein, tage nag isimounids.
58004007	E, kweiboug Yowbad nikatigik kweitan yam. Bweilim babaw wankuyeim mo ikatipel ansinap isek Deibid, ilivan ma̱wan: “Nagein gog, avei-tut igaw bukuliganes aygan, Awoum bikeikay ninoumiy.”
58004008	Kukin Yosuw bisekes sikabyeiwas, wankuyeim Yowbad nag bikatigik kweitan yam. Tage Yosuw nag isekes, nag.
58004009	E, dakabyeiwas igaw nises waseg Yowbad, mamagina Sabat, inagamag igaw mo beisiws waseg.
58004010	Kukin bitasiws mo bitayeiwas dawotets waseg, ma̱wan Yowbad kweiboug niyeiwas inawotet waseg.
58004011	Kadiloka bitatoukums va̱gan bitasiws waseg. Awoum teitan bisiplev aygan mo bikalouw ma̱wana tasiyas kweiboug.
58004012	E, Yowbad Tamwamov anilivan tawtoun, singay kakat. Tage seis babeit; Yowbad anilivan kakat, peinan ibas wanuwads, ita̱vid adtuvas waseg, kululuwad son mwamovad bein palatan, kaleivid son tatuwad bein palatan, o ikakina dakanuways, aveiyag sivinads.
58004013	Nag kadilok aveiyag bitasowm wamatan. Adsinaps babaw bo ikinbunik, datakaleiwags towen.
58004014	Datoveks mamagina lun tanuwagan, Yowbad Natun, Yeisuw, bo nein walba̱lab peinads, kadiloka bitatoukums datapwa̱louls waseg, silma̱nin mtowen.
58004015	Tanuwgwes lun mwasanin nag inok nuwes ya̱kids adsinaps igwey. Tage Yeisuw ikakin a̱bads, ikakin-vak adsinaps ven watinow. Kweiboug ven watinow, Seitan bo iyakwen Yeisuw nakabiyokon babaw waseg, ma̱wan iyakwaneids ya̱kids. Seitan iyyokon bo nag. Nag ivag ansinap kalbaleb.
58004016	Mapuna takapwapouts bitanekes datakaleiwags Yeisuw mo bisiwyoubuds. E, avei-tut a̱bads bigeg mo binok nuwan ya̱kids, va̱gan bilabeids.
58005001	Gamag ya̱kids, tasiyas tanuwgwes idaluns ikawes siwotet peinads gamag ya̱kids, mamagina dasiwa̱youbs ikawes, isekes Yowbad, waseg bitaluns; peinan adsinaps kalbaleb.
58005002	Tasiyas tanuwgwes idaluns bikagma̱nums wasigeis tasiyas toubols sisiyas tasiyas talasisulins ked, peinan tanuwgwes idaluns igwey asisinap tatineis.
58005003	E, peinan tougweys, tanuwgwes lun tasiyas, o asisinap kalbaleb, kadiloka bilineiluns waseg Yowbad; o bilineiluns waseg Yowbad pines babaw gamag.
58005004	Tanuwagan lun nag tonena bikow nawotet towen, nag. Peinan Yowbad bidow silma̱nin wotet towen. Ma̱wan kweiboug Elon nidow.
58005005	Kelis-vak nag tatonen iyamwen va̱gan bimlavag tanuwagan lun, nag. Yowbad gog bo isek nawotet towen. Anilivan mamagina: “Ya̱koum Natug, nagein bo kumlavag Natug.”
58005006	Kweitan-vak anilivan mamagina: “Bukusigeg tanuwagan lun ya̱koum, ma̱wan tanuwagan lun towen Melkisidek.”
58005007	Misiya̱mun Yeisuw imlavag gimgeilin ven watinow, mo ininitoug igilagel Yowbad waseg, iwkuwak ivva̱lam. Sivinan kid Yowbad bikatinob kanig waseg. Yowbad mo iligen, peinan Natun bo igoul.
58005008	Towen Yowbad Natun, tage gamag iyagages, ikanow aygan Taman, mo ikakin ked towen keikay.
58005009	E, youd babaw waseg ikanaway Taman aygan, mo imlavag takatinabweids ya̱kids. Kukin bitakanawes aygan towen bo bitasesus bwein, tasigagas.
58005010	Peinan Yowbad bo isek nawotet tanuwagan lun, ma̱wan Melkisedek kweiboug.
58005011	Sinap towen liva̱nen avakaein badibakeimiy, tage keikay, peinan ikawegweis woumiy.
58005012	Tut towen waseg kadiloka bukumtakavates gamag mwasanin. Nag gog. Singay tatagouwaw yakamiy. Kadiloka bakakamtilakeimiy vayuwein mo bukukwakins silawun Yowbad anilivan. Igawa kumwamoums sus. Ta-ma̱wan kan bukukwams.
58005013	Yakamiy kusasus ma̱wan tasiyas a̱pwaw. Nag kukwakins liva̱nen sinap didumwal.
58005014	Igaw bukuwkuva̱kaeins mo bukukwams kan, mamagina amisinap bimatuw, ninoumiy biwotet, mo bukukwakins aveiyag bwein, aveiyag kalbaleb.
58006001	-
58006002	Liva̱nen Kelis nukuliganes kweiboug, adok kukwakins; sivinag bitalisawes, bisiw; mo bitaninuways sinap mamatuw Kelis waseg. Sinapun Kelis kakolan-nen awoum bitawgawos bitakelays vayuwein. Kakolan bunatum mamagina: bitapiyev kweiboug sinap kalbaleb, bitasimounid waseg Yowbad, bitakakin sinapun ka̱kay silma̱nin sinap kweivaw, o datuwa̱veks nimes bisenas wa̱woud, o liva̱nen bitakanigs mo bitakits vayuwein, o mapun sinap kalbaleb mamyuyan nag beikous.
58006003	E, kukin Yowbad nanon ma̱wan, mo bitalisawes sinap tasiyas, taninuways sinap mamatuw.
58006004	-
58006006	Kalisiy siva̱tan bikamnat ninous, bikamkwanes liba̱lab anagin, bisimkwanes Kululuwan Bwanabwein, o Yowbad anilivan biliganes, bidokes bwein, o bikakinsa Yowbad nakaleiwag nimimeim son natawtoun; wankuyeim mo bipiyaves, ta-ma̱wan bitaguyes tasiyas va̱gan bikanavin vayuwein ninous. Peinan tatineisa iweiys Yowbad Natun waklos, ikasigumis.
58006007	Kuninuways pwepway. Tut babaw iksikweis isiw wanuwan pwepway, isob kaeis tasiyas nisapwes; mo Yowbad bikalin nuwan waseg.
58006008	Kukin gog awuyow beisob son doudiw, bo bigak. Kakita biyageg pwepway towen; o awuyow bigob kov, peinan awuyow bo ika̱lawt.
58006009	Kalin nuwag yakamiy. Agulivan tawtoun; tage adok yakamiy amisinap bwein, mapun Yowbad mo bikatinabweimiy.
58006010	Inakaleiwag bwein. Nag binumlev miwotet bwein, o misiwa̱youb silma̱nin Yowbad, peinan nukulabes tasiyas tayakelesiys, o igawa nukuvva̱ges ma̱wan.
58006011	Sivinag bukutoukums ma̱wan, tatanok tatanok yakamiy, aveiyag nukunmises mo tut babaw bukubba̱nes minamis anagin.
58006012	Awoum bukugweys yakamiy tage kukwawes amasinap, mamagina bukusimounids o bukwaptuleimiy ma̱wana yakamey, mo bitaba̱nes anagin towen Yowbad nilivnek.
58006013	Kweiboug Yowbad anilivan tonen nilivnek, isek Ebelam, itabudaboda yagan tatonen waseg, peinan tavakaein tonen, ilivan mamagina:
58006014	“Mounid bo balabeim, bakatimweis mubod bibabaw.”
58006015	Wankuyeim Ebelam ikaptulena oko mo iban anagin livan towen.
58006016	Gamag ya̱kids tatabudabods waseg yagan towen tamumug, o kukin bitakamnimans, teitan gamag mo bitabudabod va̱gan anilivan bikamounid.
58006017	Yowbad ma̱wan, sivinan bikamtilakeids anilivan mounid aveiyag igaw mo bisekeids, o peinan nag beivag nanon kweitan, mapun bo itabudabod.
58006018	E, mo takakins akweiy youd bisesuna bisigeg. Ta-ma̱wan Yowbad biyaweid waseg, anilivan son tabudabod. Mapun bitanmises bwein anilivan waseg. Ya̱kids nitasawls silma̱nin Yowbad bikatinabweids. Mapuna tatawtouns va̱gan bitayousis youd towen nisen wamatads o tanamis waseg.
58006019	-
58006020	Danamis towen ma̱wana kululuwads analon, moumouvit, tawtoun. Waseg ikaliyow kweim towen nisilbwed palakakit Yowbad nabunatum tatonen. Bunatum towen Yeisuw bo iginisiw, nimug peinads, inek Yowbad. Bo imlavag tanuwagan lun va̱gan bisesuna bisigeg, ma̱wan Melkisedek kweiboug.
58007001	Towen Melkisedek, min-Salem siking, tanuwagan lun Yowbad waseg. Melkisedek kweiboug ilivet Ebelam neiyum neim naviy waseg. Ebelam bo iwaweiys king babaw ikous, mo ilouvats son Melkisedek. Melkisedek isek anilivan bwanabwein waseg Ebelam.
58007002	Ebelam mo ilog nawliyoug sinawatan lag. Kalgutan isek mtowen Melkisedek. Melkisedek inawotet avakaein, sinap didumwal guyawun, takativin yagan bein aga-Muyuw waseg, “Sinap didumwal.” Kwayuwein inawotet guyaw towen mamagina niwal, peinan naven yagan Salem, bitakativin bein aga-Muyuw, “Niwal.”
58007003	Nag ivag taman o inan o delen, nag. Mwamovan tonen, nag ivag nakabsilamaw o nakabiyokous, tage ma̱wana Yowbad Natun, bo isigeg tanuwagan lun mtowen.
58007004	Singay guyaw avakaein towen, mapuna tabuds Ebelam bo ilog nawliyoug nikwey naviy wanuwan, ilog sinawatan; kalgutan isek mtowen Melkisedek.
58007005	Tasiyas gog Livay tibun, siwotet-vak tanuwgwes lun, o sikaleiwag nises. Peinan gamag ya̱kids talagus dawliyougs sinawatan, kalgutan tasekes Livay tibun. Tasiyas o ya̱kids katanoka dal, peinan tabuds anmwa̱net Ebelam.
58007006	To go Melkisedek delen kweitan, tage Ebelam isek nawliyoug kalgutan. Ikous, Melkisedek mo isek anilivan bwanabwein waseg Ebelam. Mtowen Ebelam Yowbad nilivnek nasiwa̱youb waseg.
58007007	Kal imug? mtowen tallivan? o adok mtowen nisek anilivan bwanabwein waseg? Mounid tallivan imug. Mapuna takakins Melkisedek naguyaw waseg ikalisow Ebelam naguyaw.
58007008	Tut towen dawliyougs talagus sinawatan mo kalgutan tasekes gamag tasiyas tanuwgwes lun, tage mitiya̱mun towen kalgutan bo ikow mtowen Melkisedek, niliva̱nes mtowen tamwamov. Tut towen tanuwgwes lun imta̱mats, tage mtowen tamwamov.
58007009	-
58007010	E, nagein tasekes kalgutan mo ikawes tasiyas Livay tibun, tage mitiya̱mun towen Livay tabun Ebelam bo isek kalgutan mo ikow Melkisedek, mamagina Livay isek Melkisedek waseg, peinan igaw tabun Ebelam wa̱won nises.
58007011	Tasiyas Livay tibun ikatimlakes min-Yisleil mo ikakins Yowbad nakaleiwag, tage nag ikidumwal asisinap biyakous. Peinan ika̱bwag sikaleiwag tasiyas, kadiloka teivaw teitan lun tanuwagan beim mo bikidumwa̱luds. Tanuwagan lun towen ma̱wana Melkisedek, nag ma̱wan Elon siney tibun.
58007012	Kukin bikatilow tanuwagan lun, kadiloka bikatilow-vak kaleiwag, kweivaw bisen.
58007013	Kweivaw tanuwagan lun anakum kweitan, Yud. Kweiboug nag ivag tanuwagan lun kum Yud waseg.
58007014	Mounid takakins daGuyaws anakum Yud. Mtowen kweivaw tanuwagan lun. Kweiboug Moses nag ikaluweg min-Yudiy siwotet mamagina tanuwgwes lun, nag.
58007015	Bo ikamnat, mo takakins kweivaw tanuwagan lun, mamagina Melkisedek. Mtowen Yeisuw.
58007016	Yeisuw nag imlavag tanuwagan lun peinan inaven o delen tanuwgwes lun, nag. Yeisuw mwamovan nag beikous; waseg bo ikadilok wotet towen.
58007017	Liva̱nen Yeisuw nises mamagina: “Yak bukusigeg tanuwagan lun ya̱koum, ma̱wan tanuwagan lun mtowen Melkisedek.”
58007018	-
58007019	Kweiboug kaleiwag bo isem peinan igwey, o peinan Moses nakaleiwag nag kadilok bikidumwa̱luds. Tage kweivaw kaleiwag waseg mo bitanmises Yowbad beibwein mo bitasineikiks bitanekes Yowbad.
58007020	Yowbad bo itabudabod waseg nakaleiwag towen.
58007021	Nag itabudabod wasigeis tanuwgwes lun tasiyas kweiboug, tage itabudabod waseg Yeisuw mamagina: “DaGuyaws bo itabudabod. Nanon nag bikanavin, nag. Peinan yak bukusigeg tanuwagan lun ya̱koum.”
58007022	Mapuna takakins mounid, Yeisuw inakaleiwag kweivaw bo ilisow kaleiwag kweiboug.
58007023	Kweiboug tanuwgwes lun singay babaw. Imta̱mats. Ta-ma̱wan bisesus bisigagays.
58007024	Tage Yeisuw tanuwagan lun nag beikous, peinan bises bisigeg.
58007025	Mapun Yeisuw tut nag beikous ikadiloka bikatinabweids ya̱kids kalisiy tanmiseins mtowen, mo bitanekes Yowbad. Peinan tut babaw nises tantougin Yowbad peinads ya̱kids.
58007026	Towen bo ikadilok tanuwagan lun peinads. Ansinap kamnat, bwanabwein, gimagim. Nag ma̱wan takalbalebs ya̱kids. Yowbad bo iyamwen in walba̱lab.
58007027	Kweiboug tanuwgwes lun bo iwaweiys lun bulukwan yam katanok katanok, peinan asisinap tatineis kalbaleb, o pines babaw gamag asisinap kalbaleb. Yeisuw gog sivtanoka itam won tatonen, mo iweiys lun bulukwan towen. Bo misinak.
58007028	Moses nakaleiwag waseg, tanuwgwes lun tougweys gamags. Tage wankuyeim Yowbad itabudabod, mo ikaluweg Natun, imlavag tanuwagan lun, ansinap kamnat tut nag beikous.
58008001	-
58008002	Silawun agulivan ma̱wan: Tanuwagan lun avakaein datoveks Yeisuw nisin Yowbad nakabkaleiwag wanaka̱tay walba̱lab; iwwotet Yowbad nabunatum mounid waseg. Gamag nag iwlules; Yowbad niwlul.
58008003	Tanuwgwes lun babaw siwotet isiwa̱youbs o iluns waseg Yowbad. Towen-vak, kadiloka kweitan youd bisek Yowbad.
58008004	Kukin bises ven watinow, gamag nag bisekes nawotet mamagina tanuwagan lun; peinan tanuwgwes lun nisesus, igawa ivvaluts Moses nakaleiwag waseg.
58008005	Tasiyas sibunatum mamagina Yowbad nabunatum walba̱lab, peinan itakayasis. Kweiboug Moses sivinan biwlul kid Yowbad nabunatum, Yowbad mo idibek, ilana, “Kadiloka kuvakaes youd babaw ma̱wan magin ankakin towen nakatimlakeim wa̱koy.”
58008006	Tage Kelis nakaleiwag bo ilisow Moses nakaleiwag. O nawotet-vak, ilisow tasiyas siwotet. Peinan sinap towen Yowbad nilivnek, singaya imug.
58008007	Kukin nag kweitan abkalouw bises waseg kaleiwag kweiboug, nag beivag sivinan kwayuwein.
58008008	Tage bo ikakin-wan asisinap bo ika̱bwag, ilana: “MiGuyaw yey agulivan ma̱wan: Igaw tut wanakougwaw mo basek kweivaw kaleiwag wasigeis min-Yisleil sisiy min-Yud.
58008009	Nag ma̱wan kaleiwag towen nasekes tibsiyas, misumkwey natokes, namgwayes, mo ilisawes Yidipt. Tage bo ipiyaves gunakaleiwag towen, mapuna akamgwayes.” Yowbad anilivan ma̱wan.
58008010	E, ilana, “Tut towen beikous mo basekes min-Yisleil sikaleiwag kweivaw. Gunakaleiwag basein waninous o balel wakates mo bamlavag siYowbad, o tasiyas gungamag.
58008011	Nag bikamtilakes sisiyas o budisiyas bilansa, ‘Kadiloka kukwakins Yowbad,’ nag. Peinan asibabaw bikakinsa yey Yowbad. Tasiyas toul sisiyas guyawaw bikakinsa yey.
58008012	Asisinap kalbaleb waseg bo binok nuwag, banumlev, mo beikous.”
58008013	Liva̱nen kaleiwag kweivaw bo isek, mapuna ipiyev kweiboug kaleiwag. Kaleiwag kweiboug inawotet bo ikous. Kakita bikanig.
58009001	Kweiboug kaleiwag waseg liva̱nen tapwa̱loul kweitan kweitan, son liva̱nen buntuman tapwa̱loul ven watinow.
58009002	Bunatum kweim-wan waseg niwlules, maynatan watoulan, mwayniyuwein wanuwan isilbwed bunkakit. Bunvakaein gog abwodam wadadan teibol kweitan. Teibol waseg nisenas bled wamatan Yowbad. Bunatum towen yagan ‘Bunatum Bwaboum.’
58009003	Mwayniyuwein kweim isilbwed buniyuwen bunatum yagan ‘Singay Bwaboum.’
58009004	Wanuwan bunatum towen abeilun won goul-wan nises, waseg igabus gewuw, manisin singay bwein. Yowbad nadidawag, nises bunatum towen, goul watoulan palanim palatanok isumweilisa ikous. Wanuwan nadidawag towen Yowbad nakaleiwag nilel dakul waseg, son mana mwasanin wanuwan abmavin. Abmavin gog towen goul-wan, son Elon nakaytuk, kweiboug niya̱sus yageivein.
58009005	Wakunuwatan didawag towen mamagina anelos askakin kamnat, ingwanis didawag. Bunatum liva̱nen nag kadilok bitalivan bitayakous tut towen.
58009006	Youd tasiyas ikatinages ikous, tasiyas tanuwgwes lun mo isousiws Bunatum Bwaboum iwwotets.
58009007	Tage buniyuwen bunatum misinaka tanuwgwes lun sitovek, bweilim katanok katanok mo sivtanok beisiw. Tutan beisiw mo bikow buyav, beisiw. Mo beilun Yowbad waseg peinan ansinap kalbaleb, o pines babaw gamag.
58009008	Bunatum towen waseg Yowbad Kululuwan ikatimlakeids sinap kweitan. Igaw Bunatum Bwaboum nises, ta-ma̱wan bitasiw wanuwan Bunatum Singay Bwaboum.
58009009	-
58009010	Taninuways kabebay, waseg bunatum towen silma̱nin gudwouvaws ya̱kids. Kaleiwag kweiboug o bunatum kweiboug waseg isiwyoubus Yowbad o iluns waseg Yowbad, tage nag kadilok bikidumwal ninous tasiyas sitapwa̱loul ma̱wan. Misinaka bikambuvisis asisinap aveiyag igeg waseg kan bwaboum o soup bwaboum, o ka̱kay sinapun, o wouds kaleiwag-nen. Kaleiwag tasiyas kweiboug nisenas, nisesus ee... tutan bikatilow sinap, mo isen kweivaw.
58009011	-
58009012	Peinan Kelis bo isap, mtowen tanuwagan lun silma̱nin damwa̱saws tut towen. E, datapwa̱louls buntuman, gamag mwasanin nag iwlules ven watinow, tage singay avakaein, bwanabwein. Kelis bo isiw bunawen Bunatum Bwaboum, sivtanok neisiw bo misinak; bo ikow buya̱vin tatonen. Nag buyvis mansiyas bulumakaw nitun o mansiyas gout. Tage ikow buya̱vin tatonen, waseg iyamiyis kululuwads, va̱gan tut babaw bitasesus bwein.
58009013	-
58009014	Kukin woud bikibik peinan takabkwen aveiyag bwaboum, igaw bisiwlikeid buyvis gout o bulumakaw waseg son bulumakaw kuda̱vin pulikov-nen, mo bigimagim woud. Tage singay Kelis buya̱vin biwid nanoud bigimagim, mo sinap bwaboum bitapiyev; o bitakanow aygan Tamwamov Yowbad. E, Kululuwan Bwanabwein tut babaw bo isigeg, mtowen bo ileb Kelis mo itam won tonen kamnat mamagina lun bulukwan, silma̱nin Yowbad, va̱gan biwid adsinaps kalbaleb.
58009015	Mamagina bo isekeids kweivaw kaleiwag, waseg bitanekes Yowbad. Waseg bidaweids mo bisekeids mwamovads nag beikous, ma̱wana nilivnek. Bo nitasiplaves kweiboug kaleiwag mapuna bitakanigs; togo bo ikanig peinads, mo ikatinabweids.
58009016	Kavel takanig igaw mwamov bilel nakaleiwag silma̱nin nakiyay, mo bikanig wankuyeim, taliven bivinis mo bibkunis nakaleiwag.
58009017	Igaw mwamov, nag bikanawes. Tage bikanig, mo bitawtoun kaleiwag towen nikanlev.
58009018	Taninuways kaleiwag kweiboug. Aleis iweiys imta̱mats, buyvis ikawes isiwlikes buk son gamag tasiyas silma̱nin kaleiwag towen bitawtoun.
58009019	E, Moses nakaleiwag babaw bo ikamtilakes tasiyas ikous, ikow buyvis bulumakaw nitsiyas son buyvis mansiyas gout, son yevagam. Mo ikow sip wunuwunun bwabwel son kaligweg yagan yisop, isow buyav, ikow, mo ikatsap wasigeis buk towen son gamags.
58009020	Igawa isusow, ilana, “Buyav towen silma̱nin Yowbad nakaleiwag nidibakeimiy.”
58009021	Ma̱wan mo isow Bunatum Bwaboum son kwavsiyas kwa̱vig silma̱nin tapwa̱loul.
58009022	Kweiboug kaleiwag singay ikatkiles waseg buyav; youd babaw bikibik biva̱ges bwein. Kukin buyav nag biwta̱wout, ta-ma̱wan biwid sinap kalbaleb beikous.
58009023	Liba̱lab wuliyougwan itakayasis ivkasis watinow mo iwidis buyav waseg, tage youd tasiyas walba̱lab iwidis kweitan lun waseg. Lun towen singaya bwein.
58009024	Kelis nag isiw Bunatum Bwaboum towen ven watinow, nag; tage bunatum bunawen nitakayasis mamagina bunatum mounid; tage bo isiw liba̱lab tonen waseg. E, nises wamatan Yowbad tut towen peinads ya̱kids.
58009025	Nag tut babaw Kelis won bitatama-wan bimta̱mat, nag. Sivtanok bo misinak. Tanuwgwes lun sitovek isousiw wanuwan Bunatum Singay Bwaboum bweilim katanok katanok, ikokew buyav (tage nag buya̱vin tatonen, nag).
58009026	Kukin Kelis tuta babaw bimta̱mat peinads, adok kweiboug Yowbad nibun ven watinow mo bisilamaw, bweilim katanok katanok bimta̱mat, ee... adok tut nagein bo ma̱wan-wan. Tage sivtanoka bo isap, nakabiyokous tut, nagein waseg, itam won tonen, imat va̱gan bikow adsinaps kalbaleb, binow, bilavew. Mo beikous.
58009027	Yowbad bo ikaliwageids gamag ya̱kids sivtanoka bitakanigs mo bikatkin adsinaps, aveiyag bwein, aveiyag kalbaleb.
58009028	Kelis ma̱wan sivtanoka imat mamagina lun bulukwan va̱gan bikow adsinaps kalbaleb, babaw ya̱kids. Igaw sivyuwein mo bisap, nag va̱gan biwid sinap kalbaleb, tage bikatinabweids ya̱kids, magat biseiw nuwads nakabeiyum towen waseg.
58010001	Moses nakaleiwag waseg nag mwa̱saw tatonen. Mwa̱saw towen waseg igaw tut wanakougwaw, tage Moses nakaleiwag waseg, yagada mwa̱saw. Moses nakaleiwag waseg iwaweiys lun bulukwan bweilim katanok katanok, pines gamag tasiyas ikanawes nakaleiwag, va̱gan binekes Yowbad; tage nag kadilok bivag asisinap beibwein.
58010002	-
58010003	Kukin bivag asisinap beibwein mo biyakousis mansiyas lun bulukwan, tage nag asisinap ibwein, mapuna ivvaluts bweilim katanok katanok waseg. Kukin lun towen biwid gamag tasiyas sikalbaleb, mo beikous asimwasin. Tage lun towen waseg bweilim katanok katanok ininuways; asimwasin, peinan asisinap kalbaleb nises.
58010004	Mapuna ilneiluns waseg mansiyas bulumakaw o gouts buyvis, tage nag kadilok biwidis sinap kalbaleb.
58010005	Wankuyeim Kelis neim ven watinow, ilana, “Nag sivinan lun o aveiyag gamag bisekeims, nag. Tage woug nukusekeig.
58010006	Nag sivinan lun bulukwan bitagob beikous, o bitasekeim peinan adsinap kalbaleb; nag.
58010007	Mapun alana, ‘O Yowbad, kukineig nam bawtel muwotet, aveiyag sivinam. Ma̱wan liva̱neig nilel Bukitab sinbilibil waseg.’”
58010008	Peinan lelel wakunuwatan, ilana, “Nag ikalin nuwam lun, o nag sivinam siwa̱youb silma̱nin lun, o nag sivinam lun bulukwan bigabus beikous, o nag sivinam lun silma̱nin sinap kalbaleb, nag!” (Moses nakaleiwag waseg nisekes lun tasiyas.)
58010009	Mapuna Yeisuw ilana, “Kukineig nam bawtel muwotet, aveiyag sivinam.” Mamagina bo igidem kweiboug kaleiwag, va̱gan bisein kweivaw.
58010010	Yowbad nanon ma̱wan, mo Yeisuw Kelis itam won mamagina lun bulukwan, sivtanoka imat, bo misinak. Iva̱geids mo tabweins, angamag ya̱kids.
58010011	Lun tanuwgwes tatanok tatanok itamanaws iwwotets yam katanok katanok, ivvalutsa lun Yowbad waseg; tage nag kadilok biwid gamag asisinap kalbaleb.
58010012	-
58010013	Kelis gog sivtanoka ilun peinan adsinaps kalbaleb, bo kadilok lun towen silma̱nin bweilima babaw bisim bisigeg. Ilun ikous mo isin Yowbad wanaka̱tay; ikayamat ee... igaw Yowbad mo biva̱ges tasiyas astameiliw towen mo beibus bimlavags mamagina nakabtatet.
58010014	E, sivtanoka ilun; bo kadilok lun towen silma̱nin bweilim babaw bisim bisigeg. Lun towen waseg ivag adsinaps ibwein, angamag ya̱kids.
58010015	Kululuwan Bwanabwein, towen-vak idibakeids; anilivan ma̱wan:
58010016	“Yowbad ilana, ‘Yam tasiyas beikous, mo basek gunakaleiwag towen wasigeis tasiyas. Basen gunakaleiwag wakateis, O balel gunakaleiwag waninous.’”
58010017	Wankuyeim mo ilana: “Nag vayuwein banuway asisinap kalbaleb.”
58010018	Peinan biwid adsinaps kalbaleb binumlev, mapuna mo biyakous lun silma̱nin sinap kalbaleb.
58010019	E sigwey, Yeisuw buya̱vin neiwout peinads, mapuna takapwapouts mo bitasiws wanuwan Yowbad nabunatum.
58010020	Ked towen kweivaw, mwamov silma̱nin. Tut kweiboug, kweim nisilbwed Yowbad nabunatum. Yeisuw bo ikaliyow va̱gan bitasiws ya̱kids, peinan won iyagages peinads.
58010021	Tanuwagan lun towen datoveks avakaein, ikaleiwag Yowbad nabunatum waseg.
58010022	Bweina bitaskakins waseg, adsinaps didumwal, o bitasimounids va̱gan bitakapwapouts, mo beikous adpwa̱yats waseg towen. Mamagina bisiwlik nanouds mo beikous dakanuways kalbaleb, o biwid wouds yevagam gimagim waseg.
58010023	Bitayyousis liva̱nen idanamis silma̱nin mwa̱saw. Awoum bitagweys. Towen nilivnek idamwa̱saws bo bitoukum silma̱nin.
58010024	Kadiloka bitalabeids meiveka ya̱kids, mo bitasiwa̱youbs babaw ya̱kids, o bitawotets bwein.
58010025	Mwasanin nag ikatikunouks silma̱nin tapwa̱loul. Awoum bitapiyaves katikunouk ma̱wan tasiyas. Tage bitalabeids meiveka ya̱kids. E, igaw bitakines Yeisuw kakita beiyum beim, mo bitaguyeids va̱gan bitalabeids meiveka ya̱kids.
58010026	Kukin bitakakins Yowbad sinapun wankuyeim mo tatoneids bitava̱ges adsinaps kalbaleb. Bo bigak! Nag kwayuwein lun nises silma̱nin adsinaps kalbaleb.
58010027	Tage kadiloka bitawenes Yowbad igaw bikatimop, son kov tawtoun, waseg bigabus tasiyas astameiliw Yowbad.
58010028	Kukin kal isiplev Moses nakaleiwag, asteiy o asteitoun ikamteles ansinap kalbaleb, nag inok nuwes, mo iweiys imat.
58010029	Tage singay takalbaleb towen kavel bipiyev Yowbad Natun, o biyageg nakaleiwag. Kaleiwag towen buya̱vin biwidids, va̱gan beibwein adsinaps. Tage takalbaleb towen bo bikamliw Kululuwan towen nililabeids. Yowbad singay bimop ansinap gamag towen.
58010030	Takakinsa Yowbad, peinan anilivan mamagina: “Yey bamop asisinap kalbaleb; gunawotet towen.” Liva̱nen kweitan mamagina: “DaGuyaws igaw bikatukin nagamag asisinap, aveiyag bwein, aveiyag kalbaleb.”
58010031	Yowbad tamwamov bikaleiwag mo bimop adsinaps kalbaleb. Singaya bitawenes!
58010032	-
58010033	Kuninuways tut kweiboug, ninoumiy bo ikamnat waseg sinapun Yeisuw, wankuyeim abamiy mo igeg singay, tage kwaptuleimiy-wan. Bo iyyageimiy o iyagageimiy wavtakon ven o simiyas bo ma̱wan.
58010034	E, bo inok nuwamiy tasiyas nisenas wa̱deil peinan Yeisuw angamag tasiyas. Gamag mwasanin niyagages miven, miwliyoug babaw ikawes ikous, tage bo nukumwa̱saws-wan peinan nukukwakins miven bwanabwein walba̱lab nises isigeg.
58010035	Awoum kid bukunumlaves minamis, peinan igaw maysamiy mo bukulivatus avakaein.
58010036	Kadiloka bukuvvaluts waseg miwotet aveiyag Yowbad sivinan, kuvvaluts ee... mo bukuba̱nes youd towen nilivnek.
58010037	Anilivan mamagina: “Igaw tut kadiyakus, gamag towen nimimeim mo bisap. Nag biyouviy.
58010038	Kavel gungamag towen tadidumwal, bo beimov peinan isimounid. Kukin gog bikakiws won, nag bikalin nuwag waseg gamag towen; apiyev.”
58010039	Tage ya̱kids nag ma̱wana tasiyas ikakiws wous, mo biyagages beikous. Ya̱kids kweitan. Ya̱kids tasimounids ya̱kids, va̱gan kululuwads bises bwein.
58011001	Kukin bitasimounid aveiyag bitaban mo bitanamis, mapuna takakin-wan. Tut towen nag bitakin youd tasiyas, tage tasimounids peinan takakinsa nisesus.
58011002	Butus tammwayas bo taliganes, peinan isimounids waseg Yowbad.
58011003	Tasimounids mo takakins peinan ven babaw Yowbad nibun, anilivan waseg. Mamagina ikow youd tasiyas nag bitakin, waseg mo ibun youd babaw nitakin.
58011004	Kweiboug Eibel isimounid, mo ilun Yowbad waseg, Yowbad bo ikalin nuwan Eibel inalun waseg, tage tuwan inalun Yowbad nag ikalin nuwan. Mapuna Yowbad idok Eibel tadidumwal. Bo ikanig Eibel; tage liva̱nen mtowen nawotet igawa ikatimlakeids, peinan tasimounid towen.
58011005	Inok-vak isimounid, Yowbad mo ikow inow. Nag ikanig. Nag biba̱nes mtowen ven watinow, nag; peinan Yowbad bo ikow inow. Kweiboug Inok nises ven watinow, iliva̱nes kid Yowbad ikalin nuwan waseg.
58011006	Kukin nag bitasimounid, ta-ma̱wan Yowbad bikalin nuwan wasigeis ya̱kids. Kukin kal binek Yowbad, bikakin-wan Yowbad mounid nises o bisimounid-vak Yowbad bisiwyoubus tasiyas ininekes.
58011007	Kweiboug Yowbad ikatimlek Now mo ikakin aveiyag igaw mo bivag. Now nag ikin youd tasiyas. Igaw-wan, tage bo isimounid, ivkaes inawag, waseg ikatinob angamag. Now ansinap didumwal, waseg ikamtel gamag babaw asisinap kalbaleb, mo iyous ansinap didumwal, peinan isimounid.
58011008	Wankuyeim Ebelam isimounid Yowbad aygan, mo ikanaway, ilisow naven, inoun in silma̱nin ven kweivaw Yowbad nikatigik inaven. E, inoun in, tage nag ikakin avanuy bein.
58011009	Isimounid, mapuna isiwas ven towen Yowbad nikatigik siven, siney Aysak, Yekob. Mamagina bwabwal tasiyas. Sibunatum man kaleivin. E, Yowbad bo ilivnek siven tasiyas Ebelam natun son tabun, ma̱wana nikatigik Ebelam inaven.
58011010	Ebelam bo inamis igaw beisiw ven tawtoun waseg, ven towen Yowbad nibun.
58011011	Nakwav Sela bo ivnavek, tage isimounid, mo itawtoun won, isum, peinan ikakin towen nilivnek igaw mo bitoukum ma̱wana nilivnek.
58011012	E taninuways. Tatanok gamag Ebelam anbweilim bo ikous, mo ivag tibun singaya babaw, ma̱wana wutun o alekel babiweis.
58011013	Tammwayas tasiyas isimounids ee... ikanka̱nigs. Nag iba̱nes youd towen Yowbad nilivnek. Tage bo ikines kadiveiyov, ikalin nuwes peinan. Idokes tatineis sikabgobwaw mamagina bwabwal tasiyas igaw ven watinow nisesus.
58011014	Kukin kalisiy ninous ma̱wan mo binineivs siven tatineis.
58011015	Kukin bininuways-wan ven towen nilisawes mo biba̱nes siked va̱gan beiyums.
58011016	Tage sivines kid kweivaw ven bwanabwein, walba̱lab nises. Mapuna Yowbad nag ivag anmwasin, peinan idokes siYowbad. E, bo ikatineg siven.
58011017	-
58011019	Kweiboug Yowbad niyakwen Ebelam, tage isimounid bwein, itam natun anmwa̱net, beiweiy mamagina lun bulukwan kid. Liva̱nen towen Aysak, Yowbad nilivnek, ilana, “Aysak waseg babun deleim ya̱koum.” Tage Ebelam bo isimounid, itam natun towen. Idok Yowbad kadiloka biyakit takanig; mamagina kabebay waseg natun Aysak beimat, Yowbad mo biyakit vayuwein bisek Ebelam. E, Ebelam isimounid mo Yowbad ileb natun mwamovan silma̱nin.
58011020	Wankuyeim Aysak isimounid mo ilivnek sikabmwa̱saw Yekob son Isaw.
58011021	Wankuyeim Yekob kakita beimat, isimounid, anilivan bwein mo ikatigik pines Yosep nitun tawaw asteiy, igawa geg ikkulul wakunuwatan nakaytuk.
58011022	Wankuyeim Yosep, bo ikous anbweilim, mo ilivan liva̱nen taliven min-Yisleil peinan bilisawes Yidipt beiyums, ilana, “Tatuwag kukow, kunow, kudibwen wadiven.”
58011023	Wankuyeim Moses inan nikop natun, isimounids son namwan mo isowmes kweitoun tibukon, peinan ikakinsa a̱pwaw tamnabwein, o nag iwenes king inakaleiwag.
58011024	-
58011025	Wankuyeim Moses ivakaein, isimounid waseg Yowbad, nanon ilana, “Awoum gamag ninous bilansa, ‘Adok inan mana̱wen Pelow natun’; awoum.” Sivinan gog abes bigeg siney Yowbad nagamag. Nag sivinan bimwa̱saw tut kayakus waseg sinap kalbaleb.
58011026	Nanon ilana, “Awoum bakow Yidipt wuliyougwan. Bweina biyagageigs peinan Kelis angamag yey. Towen waseg igaw mo bamwa̱saw, mamagina maysan gunawotet.”
58011027	E, isimounid mo itokes min-Yisleil ilisawes Yidipt. Nag iwen king towen nikawkun. Ivvalut-wan. Mamagina bo ikin Yowbad, tage matan nag ikin, tage bo isimounida-wan.
58011028	Isimounid mo isagal, Kaltuwon sigeilin. La̱miy buya̱vin iwlik. Awoum ge towen tawayin gamags beisiw wasibunatum beiweiys kunutaws.
58011029	Asibabaw isimounids mo ikallituwanis Yol Bwabwel, mamagina pwepway nibunab nikalituwanis. Wankuyeim min-Yidipt iyokons, bo nag; mo iwgweles.
58011030	Wankuyeim tasiyas nisiwunis ven yagan Yelikow yam kweinim kweiy waseg, isimounids, isiwunis ven towen, boul palatan palatan mo ikalivatow.
58011031	Wankuyeim nakubukwab ma̱nawen Leyab nisimounid ilabes Yosuw nagamag tasiyas asteiy takinwunins ven, mana̱wen Leyab nag iweiys; tage tasiyas takapidabs iwaweiysa ikous.
58011032	Ta-ma̱wan bitakavtagis yiges asibabaw tasiyas tasimounids, peinan singay babaw. Gidiyon, Ba̱lak, Samson, Yepitak, Deibid, Samwel o tasiyas palopits.
58011033	-
58011034	Tasiyas isimounids mo naviy waseg itawtouns wasigeis ven kawka̱veks, ikaleiwags asisinap didumwal waseg, iba̱nes youd tasiyas Yowbad nilivnek, iva̱ges mo ituk ninous mansiyas la̱yon; nag igades; kov singay avakaein isiwmates; ikatinabwes tatineis naviy waseg; tougweys tasiyas mo itawtouns; itawtouns naviy waseg; ikawsapes takanaviys tasiyas nivvatays wasigeis.
58011035	Vinay mwasanin asigamag bo ikits kanig waseg. Tasiyas takalbalebs ivvasiganis Yowbad nagamag mwasanin, ivvalutsa bo nag, peinan isimounids. Kukin bipiyaves Yowbad, mo beikous takalbalebs siwaway wasigeis. Nag gog, isimounids-wan. Igaw bimta̱mats, sivines beikits vayuwein mwa̱saw avakaein waseg.
58011036	Bo isiba̱wes Yowbad inagamags mwasanin, mwasanin iwaweiys vatul waseg, mwasanin iyawanis nimes o kikeis vatul waseg, mwananin isenas wanuwan deil.
58011037	Mwasanin iwaweiys dakul waseg. Mwasanin ita̱vis paley; mwasanin iwaweiys pulut tanmunun waseg. Yowbad nagamag mwasanin asikweim kulivis mansiyas sip o gouts, ininounasa-wan, ta-ivag siven, abes igeg peinan gamag niybilebes.
58011038	Ven watinow nag ibunakes, peinan kalbaleb. Gamag babaw ikamliwes, mapuna inounas ineis nawoud makaw waseg; mwasanin ineis wa̱koy; sibunatum mwasanin leg o mwasanin takunumwan.
58011039	Butus asibabaw tasiyas bo taliganes, peinan isimounids waseg Yowbad. Tage nag iba̱nes youd towen nilivnek.
58011040	Peinan youd towen bwanabwein Yowbad ikakin igaw mo bisekeids ya̱kids. Sidayas tasiyas mo bitalivatus youd babaw bwanabwein.
58012001	Taninuways asibabaw tasiyas kweiboug, isimounids bwein. Kadiloka ya̱kids bitatoukums va̱gan bitasawls bwein, ked towen waseg. Kwanad moumouvit bitalev. Sinap kalbaleb bitapiyev peinan mouvitan isilbwadeid. E, kadiloka bitatoukums bitasawls bwein dakeds towen wamatads.
58012002	Yeisuw takinbunikes, mtowen datamumugs peinan isimounid bwein, mamagina absilamaw son abiyokous mtowen. Kweiboug Yeisuw nises ven watinow, nanon nag inek liba̱lab mwa̱saw-nen, tage bo ikakin igaw tut wanakougwaw mo bimwa̱saw. Mapuna itam klos mamyuyan-nen, musinan klos ikaptul; ikous, Yowbad mo isek a̱ban wanaka̱tay, inakabkaleiwag waseg.
58012003	E, taninuways Yeisuw. Takalbalebs singaya ikamliwes, tage nag ipiyev inawotet towen. Yakamiy ma̱wan, awoum bikawegweis woumiy. Awoum bukusoumats, awoum.
58012004	Yakamiy nukuvvatays waseg sinap kalbaleb, tage nag kweitan bwabwagan kuba̱nes wawoumiy, nag kukwanigs ma̱wan Yeisuw, nag.
58012005	Adok kunumlaves inageiguy towen nidokeimiy nitun tonen, liva̱nen nises mamagina: “Natug yak, kukin daGuyaws biyadumwa̱lum, awoum kupiyev. Kukin new bikow beiweim, awoum beivag ampwa̱yat.
58012006	Kukin daGuyaws sivinan ya̱kids, mo biyadumwa̱luds. O kukin bita̱meid nitun ya̱kid, mo bikow nanew beiweid.”
58012007	Kukin abamiy bigeg, bweina kutoukums, peinan iyadumwa̱lumiy. Yowbad idokeimiy nitun yakamiy. Peinan timdayas tasiyas bo iyadumwa̱luds nitsiyas ya̱kids.
58012008	E, babaw ya̱kids ma̱wan. Kukin tamam nag biyadumwa̱lum, adok nag natun tonen ya̱koum. Adok tobwag gamag natun ya̱koum.
58012009	E taninuways, timdayas ven watinow biyadumwa̱luds mo bitagoulus tasiyas. Ikadiloka bitagoulus beibwein Tamads walba̱lab, peinan kululuwads nises waseg towen. E, bitagoulus towen mo bitamovs.
58012010	Timdayas ven watinow tut kayakus waseg, kukin beitam ninous mo biyadumwa̱luds, tage Yowbad iyadumwa̱luds va̱gan bikatimweis adsinaps kamnat, mamagina ansinap tonen kamnat.
58012011	Tut towen waseg biyadumwa̱luds mo bigidaged wouds; tage nag bikalin nuwads waseg. Igaw gog tut wanakougwaw anagids mo bitaba̱nes, mamagina adsinaps didumwal son niwal. Kukin bika̱kin matads peinan a̱bads igeg tut towen, igaw wanakougwaw mo bitaba̱nes anagids.
58012012	-
58012013	Kadiloka bukutawtouns, miked bukuva̱ges va̱gan bukusawls beibwein, mo tasiyas takagayals nag bikalouws, tage beibwein kikeis tasiyas mo bitawtouns.
58012014	Kutoukums va̱gan simiyas biba̱nes niwal wasigeis yakamiy. Kutoukums va̱gan amisinap bikamnat. Kukin gog nag, nag bukukines daGuyaws.
58012015	Kuvna̱seimiy. Yowbad nasiwa̱youb awoum biyamkwen kavel wasigeis yakamiy. Awoum mwasanin bikameiliws mo biyagageimiy babaw yakamiy; ma̱wan nugwed bitatom kan mo biyageg.
58012016	Awoum ge teitan bikanavay mav. Awoum teitan bipiyev sinapun Yowbad, ma̱wan Isaw kweiboug, peinan nigimwal kan, sivtanok ikam, mo taman kiyayan isek bwadan, maysan kan.
58012017	Kukwakins tut wankuyeim Isaw mo ivag sivinan nakiyay towen; nag gog. Ta-ma̱wan. Isaw singay sivinan bikatilow ansinap, ivva̱lam silma̱nin, tage nag kweitan ked iban.
58012018	-
58012019	Davanuys nitameis kweivaw. Nag ma̱wana ven towen nitassikes, nag ma̱wana kov nigidaged, nag ma̱wana dadub son libgagay o bwaw, o bwa̱gig aygan, o aygan towen tasiyas niliganes mo ilansa, “Awoum vayuwein aygan bisekeids ma̱wan.”
58012020	Peinan bo iwenes Yowbad anilivan mamagina: “Awoum gamag o aleimiy bimeis wa̱koy. Kukin aleimiy na̱tan beim, kuweiys dakul waseg, beimat.”
58012021	E, youd towen nikines, singay ivag aspwa̱yat. Moses-vak ilana, “Itatat woug, agpwa̱yat.”
58012022	-
58012024	Ya̱kids gog nitameis koy yagan Sayon, Yowbad Tamwamov inaven, Yelusalem walba̱lab. Min-liba̱lab singay babaw katuyouns nimeis silma̱nin sagal avakaein, sisiyas Yowbad angamag babaw niginsaps, yiges bo ilel walba̱lab, sisiy takalawagein youd babaw, mtowen Yowbad, siney kululuwes-wan tasiyas tadidumwals bo niva̱ges bwein asisinap tasiyas, sisiy Yeisuw, mtowen nilivkaes kweivaw kaleiwag, buya̱vin tonen waseg isiwyoubuds, mamagina isiwlikeids va̱gan bitanekes Yowbad. Nag ma̱wana buya̱vin Eibel kweiboug.
58012025	Kuvna̱seimiy. Awoum ge bukupiyaves mtowen nidibakeimiy. Kweiboug gamag mwasanin ipiyaves towen niguyeids ven watinow, mo ilivatus kalbaleb. Magat bitapiyaves mtowen walba̱lab niguyeids, singaya kalbaleb bitalivatus.
58012026	Kweiboug aygan ivag mo igewn ven watinow. Tage nagein ilivnek mamagina: “Sivyuwein bavag mo beigewns ven watinow son liba̱lab.”
58012027	Ilana, “Sivyuwein,” peinan beigewn mo beikous ven tasiyas, peinan nibunis. Tage youd mwasanin ta-ma̱wan beigewns mo bisesus bisigagas.
58012028	Kadiloka bikalin nuwads, peinan davanuys kweivaw singay tawtoun; ta-ma̱wan beigewn. Takaleiwag ven towen Yowbad. Adsinaps bwein waseg mo bitayakawanes, bitagoulus, bitavna̱ses beibwein.
58012029	Peinan daGuyaws mamagina kov ikika̱yeil.
58013001	Awoum kupiyaves siwa̱youb simiyas wasigeis.
58013002	Awoum kupiyaves amibwabwal. Kweiboug mwasanin itams asibwabwal wasigeis; nag ikakins min-liba̱lab tasiyas.
58013003	Kuninuways tawlimiyas wa̱deil nisesus, kulabes, mamagina ya̱koum simwey tasiyas kusesus. Kuninuways tasiyas abes igeg, peinan igaw gimgeilin ven watinow ya̱koum.
58013004	Babaw yakamiy, kadiloka kuvays beibwein. Awoum kusubwans, peinan igaw Yowbad bikatimop asisinap tasiyas taggeinawls peinan ikanavays mav.
58013005	Awoum bimwamon matam silma̱nin money. Aveiyag nises waseg ya̱koum bo kadilok. Awoum bukunineivs vayuwein. Peinan Yowbad anilivan mamagina: “Nag balisaweim. Nag bapiyaveim, nag.”
58013006	Mapuna takapwapouts talansa, “GunGuyaw ilabeig. Kukin gamag ama̱wan binuwakeigs, nag beivag agpwa̱yat, nag.”
58013007	Kuninuways asisinap mitamumugwas tasiyas nikamtilakeimiy liva̱nen Yowbad. Kuninuways asisinap anagin bwanabwein, peinan nisimounids. E, kuva̱ges ma̱wana tasiyas.
58013008	Yeisuw Kelis ansinap katanok-wan, kweiboug, nagein, o igaw tut wanakougwaw. Ansinap katanok-wan.
58013009	Kukin takatimlakays tobwag bimeis, asisinap kweitan, awoum kuliganes ages. Tasiyas idokes bikatimlakeids sinapun kan kweitan kweitan, tage asisinap nag ilabes tasiyas. Misinaka Yowbad nasiwa̱youb bikimtuw kululuwads.
58013010	Dakabeiluns nises. Tanuwgwes lun ven watinow nag kadilok beikams waseg dakabeiluns ya̱kids.
58013011	Towen tanuwgwes lun sitovek ikokew buyvis man mansiyas neiweiys o neiluns waseg Yowbad, peinan adsinaps kalbaleb. Ikow buyvis, isiw Yowbad wanbunatum wanuwan. Ikous, wous mansiyas man mo igabus watoulan ven. E, taninuways mansiyas man.
58013012	Yeisuw-vak ma̱wan neiweiys awkwedan ven watoulan, mamagina lun bulukwan buya̱vin iwidids angamag ya̱kids.
58013013	Mapuna bitanekes Yeisuw watoulan ven. Gamag mwasanin mo bikasigumids ya̱kids ma̱wana towen, Yeisuw.
58013014	Wadaban pwepway davanuys nag bises bisigeg, tage tanineivs davanuys, tut wanakougwaw silma̱nin.
58013015	Yeisuw bilabeids, va̱gan bitatams waseg Yowbad, mamagina bitaluns waseg. Ma̱wan mo bitakavvasis Yowbad beibwein. E, ya̱kids nitatams yagan waseg, wadouds waseg mo bitasiwyoubus Yowbad.
58013016	Awoum kupiyaves siwa̱youb. Mivavag waseg kusiwyoubus simiyas. Yowbad mo bikalin nuwan waseg, ma̱wana lun.
58013017	Kwanawes ages mituwa̱veks, o kutams sikaleiwag waseg. Tasiyas siwotet imtakavates kululuwamiy. Igaw Yowbad bikatiga̱nes siwotet silma̱nin. Kadiloka bukutams sikaleiwag waseg mo bimwa̱saws tasiyas; kukin gog bukukwa̱bwags yakamiy mo bigeg ninous tasiyas.
58013018	Kunitougs pinem yakamey. Kakakin bwein mawotet kamnat. Sivinem amasinap beibwein youd babaw wasigeis.
58013019	Singay sivinag bukunitougs peinag, va̱gan nuwanaw mo baw.
58013020	-
58013021	Yowbad waseg niwal nises. DaGuyaws Yeisuw neimat, tage Yowbad bo iyakit. Inakeleiwag towen bises bisigeg. Buya̱vin waseg ikatinabweids o imtakavateids bwein, ma̱wana alen sip ya̱kids. Yowbad bweina bisekeimiy youd babaw bwein va̱gan bukuwteles ma̱wana towen sivinan. Yeisuw Kelis talabein Taman mo iwgow nanouds ma̱wana nanon towen. E, mo bitaya̱kawns waseg Kelis tut nag beikous. Eimen.
58013022	Sigwey, milet towen kakit neiw. Let towen waseg bo aguyeimiy. Awoum bigeg ninoumiy. Bweina kwaptuleimiy.
58013023	Liva̱nen bwadads Timotiy bo kuliganes, peinan bo ilik wa̱deil, isap. Kukin nuwanaw beim, mo bakaw, bakalakwaneimiy.
58013024	Amalivan siwa̱yaoub kusekes tasiyas mituwa̱veks sisiyas tasiyas tayekelesiys. Gamag tasiyas meinoy nimeis Ita̱liy asilivan siwa̱youb wasigeis yakamiy.
58013025	DaGuyaws bisiwyoubumiy amibabaw-wan. Eimen.
59001001	Kalin nuwag min-Yisleil yakamiy, amikum sinawatan akweiy, nukusikes ven babaw, ven kweitan kweitan wasigeis; gunalet neiw, kuvinis. Yey Yowbad natouwat, o daGuyaws Yeisuw Kelis natouwat yey, yagag Yemes.
59001002	Sigwey yakamiy, igaw bukulouvats mikabiyokon kweitan kweitan waseg, kadiloka kumwa̱saws silma̱nin.
59001003	Yowbad inakaleiwag ma̱wan. Kukin abamiy bigeg, kadiloka kusimounids beibwein waseg Yowbad mo bukwapatuls o bukutawtouns.
59001004	Kadiloka bukwapatuleimiy beibwein, sinap bwein mo bukukwawes beikous. Nag aveiyag bika̱bwag wasigeis yakamiy, nag.
59001005	Kal yak sinapun Yowbad nag kukwakin bwein, kadiloka kunitoug waseg Yowbad mo bisekeim, peinan singay tasiwa̱youb Yowbad. Mtowen nag bika̱neim, nag.
59001006	-
59001008	Kukin bukunitoug waseg Yowbad kadiloka bukunmis bwein. Kukin nag bukunamis bwein nag aveiyag bukuban, peinan nanoum akweiy. Kukin kal ivag nanon akweiy, ansinap mamagina kaysay wa̱yol ikivakuv ee... mo bika̱wot beim wakawalaw mo beikous. DaGuyaws nakaleiwag bo ma̱wan, nag aveiyag bisek taw towen, nag; peinan nanon babaw isisawl palatan palatan, nag aveiyag biban, nag.
59001009	Kadiloka bwadads tasimav teitan bimwa̱saw peinan Yowbad biyamwen.
59001010	-
59001011	Tage kadilok tasiyas guyawaw bimwa̱saws peinan biyabus; mamagina awuyow la̱lan bikalayag, beikous. Peinan igaw beivag ka̱las avakaein, mo beiyag awuyow, la̱lan bikalka̱louws, sikamnabwein beikous. E, guyawaw ma̱wan, igaw biwwotets-wan, nuwanaw mo bimta̱mats.
59001012	Kal yak mukwabiyokon waseg bukusesun-wan kwaptuleim, mo bukuma̱saw kid. Yowbad bisekeim mula̱lan, mamagina mwamovam. Ya̱kids tasiwyoubus Yowbad, anilivan mounid bo bisekeids mwamovads.
59001013	Igaw mukwabiyokon waseg, awoum bukulivan, “Yowbad isimkineig”; awoum. Nag kal bisimkin Yowbad sinap kalbaleb silma̱nin; o Yowbad nag bisimkineid sinap kalbaleb silma̱nin, nag.
59001014	Tage nanoud tatoneid bisimkineid, igaw mo biseiw nuwad sinap kalbaleb silma̱nin.
59001015	Kukin nanoud waseg sinap kalbaleb, sinap towen bivakaein; nakabiyokous waseg bikop natun, yagan kanig.
59001016	Sigwey bwanabwein yakamiy, awoum teitan bikatidavimiy.
59001017	Tamads walba̱lab ansinap kamnat, mtowen issiwyoubuds youd babaw bwanabwein o sinap babaw bwanabwein. Nag teitan gamag bisiwyoubuds bwanabwein, nag. Yowbad anmwa̱net tut babaw ansinap katanok-wan, bwanabwein, kamnat.
59001018	Anilivan mounid waseg bo iva̱geids, va̱gan bitamugwas Yowbad inakabwabub waseg; peinan nanon bo ma̱wan.
59001019	-
59001020	Sigwey bwanabwein yakamiy, kunages sinap towen. Nuwanaw kuliganes livan bwein, tage kadilok kuyouviys silma̱nin amilivan sona mikavikun. Ta-bukuwteles Yowbad nawotet mikavikun waseg, nag.
59001021	Kupiyaves geg sinap bikibik, son sinap babaw kalbaleb; kutams bwein waseg liva̱nen Kelis. Livan towen mo beisiw waninoumiy, bikatinabwes kululuwamiy silma̱nin Yowbad.
59001022	Livan towen awoum bukuliganesa mav, mogo bukwatidavimiy tatineimiy. Kadiloka kukwanawes livan towen.
59001023	-
59001024	Kukin kal binganega mav, mtowen mamagina gamag kavel ikin magin gilas waseg. Ikin ikous, inoun, mo inumlev ankakin ama̱wan. Tasiyas nuwanaw binumlaves kaleiwag bwein.
59001025	Tage kal yak bukukinbunik Yowbad nakaleiwag bwanabwein, waseg bilikuds mo taneis wamnat; o bukuvvalut waseg kaleiwag towen, mo bukumwa̱saw mukwawotet waseg. Kadiloka bukwanow livan towen; awoum kwatlutega mav, adok mo bukunumlev kid.
59001026	Kukin kal idok itapwa̱loul ibwein, tage nuwanaw wadon, bo ikatidavina tonen; itapwa̱loul mav.
59001027	Tapwa̱loul bwanabwein o kamnat silma̱nin Tamads Yowbad, mamagina bitalabes tasiyas gumakey o nakwabs, peinan abes igeg; o bitapiyaves ven watinow sinapun.
59002001	Sigwey yakamiy, daGuyaws Yeisuw Kelis ansinap kamnat. Magat bukusimounids waseg Yeisuw, awoum bukwasigumis gamag mwasanin, o kuvna̱ses sisiy; awoum.
59002002	-
59002004	Kukin gamag asteiy bimeis wasinagog, wamitapwa̱loul, teitan anakweim maynamnabwein, antuwetuw wanaman goul-wan; teitan gog tasimav, anakweim sigsa̱gob, kukin bukuvna̱ses towen anakweim maynamnabwein, o kulansa, “Kum, kusin wanakaew wa̱keb,” o kukin bukudibakes towen tasimav, kulana, “Kun, kusin watinow,” adok peinan kwasigumis towen tasimav, kukwatukins gamag wasigeis; bo kalbaleb amisinap towen.
59002005	Sigwey bwanabwein yakamiy kunages agulivan. Yowbad sivinan tasiyas tasimavs va̱gan bisimounids bwein waseg Yowbad. Anilivan mounid bo isekes, peinan isiwa̱youbs waseg; igaw mo beisiws wanakabkaleiwag. E, tasiyas tasimavs isimounids waseg Yowbad mo beisiws wanakabkaleiwag.
59002006	Tage nukuyagages tasiyas tasimavs. Asimwasin. Bo igak! Kalisiy tayakeikays wasigeis yakamiy? Kalisiy iyateleimiy? Adok tasiyas guyawaw mwasanin.
59002007	O tasiyas mwasanin iyages yagan datoveks Yeisuw.
59002008	Kukwakins datoveks nakaleiwag kweiboug, Bukitab waseg, mamagina, “Kadiloka bukuvnas soum, ma̱wana kuvna̱seim tatoneim.” Kukin bukwanawes livan towen beibwein, mo beibwein amisinap yakamiy.
59002009	Kukin gog bukuvna̱ses gamag mwasanin o bukwasigumis gamag mwasanin, bogo amisinap kalbaleb, peinan kusiplaves Yowbad nakaleiwag.
59002010	Kal yak bukuvnas Yowbad nakaleiwag babaw, tage sinap katanok waseg bukukwalouw, bo bigeg amsinap; mamagina youd babaw wasigeis bo nukukwalouw.
59002011	Tamads gog nilivan, “Awoum kusubwan,” nilivan-vak, “Awoum kuweiy gamag.” Anmwa̱neta Yowbad anilivan tasiyas. Magat bukuweiy gamag, tage nag kusubwan, bogo takalbaleb ya̱koum, peinan bo kusiplev Yowbad nakaleiwag.
59002012	-
59002013	Kadiloka bukuvna̱ses beibwein amilivan o amisinap. Yowbad nakaleiwag waseg bo ilikuds mo taneis wamnat. Igaw nakaleiwag towen waseg bo bikatkineids. Kukin nag binok nuwam soum, Yowbad nag binok nuwan ya̱koum. Tage binok nuwam soum, Yowbad mo binok nuwan ya̱koum; nag bikamta̱nim, nag.
59002014	Sigwey yakamiy, kukin kal idoki bisimounid waseg Yeisuw, tage nag bikanow aygan, adok bo isimounid mav. Yeisuw nag bikatinob gamag towen.
59002015	-
59002016	Kal yak bukunek tayakelesiy teitan o na̱tan, anamoun isesuna, anakweim sigsa̱gob, bukudibek kulana, “Amkweim kupwa̱lum, bimuymuy woum; kam kukwam bukwamuweip, e mo kumwa̱saw,” tage nag kweitan kweim bukusek, o nag kweitan kan; adok bo kulivan mav ya̱koum.
59002017	Kukin bukusimounid, tage nag kwanow Yeisuw aygan, mo bukusimounid mav; magina simounid bo ikanig waseg ya̱koum.
59002018	Adok gamag teitan bidibakeim, bilana, “Ya̱koum kusimounid waseg Yeisuw; yey gog akanow aygan.” Kukin nag kweitan nawotet Yeisuw bukuwtel, ama̱wan bukusimounid? Tage yey asimounid, mapuna bukukines Yeisuw nawotet nawtel.
59002019	Adok kusimounids peinan Yowbad anmwa̱net nises. Bwein! Tage simounid sinap towen waseg nag kadilok. Tasiyas baloum-vak isimounids, to ivag aspwa̱yata singay.
59002020	Takabala̱wein yak, adok bakatimlakeim makava simounid nag bilabeim. Anagin nag. Tage simounid son wotet bo bilabeim.
59002021	Kunuw tabuds Ebelam, ikanow Yowbad aygan; magina itam natun Aysak, isek Yowbad, nakabeilun waseg. Mapuna Yowbad idok tadidumwal towen.
59002022	Kuninuways Ebelam isimounid mo iwotet, o nawotet waseg takakin singay isimounid bwein.
59002023	Sinap towen mamagina, “Ebelam isimounid Yowbad waseg, mapuna idok Ebelam tadidumwal.” Mapuna idokes veiyon Yowbad, mtowen Ebelam.
59002024	Taninuways igaw bitasimounids waseg Yeisuw, bitakawes nawotet mo Yowbad bidokeids tadidumwals ya̱kids. Makava simounid nag bikadilok.
59002025	Nakubukwab na̱wen yagan Leyab kweiboug ansinap ma̱wan, Yowbad idok nadidumwal peinan ileb Yosuw nagamag asteiy, ikidumwa̱lus, mo itanouys bwein kweitan ked waseg.
59002026	Takakins geg kal won ta-ivag kululuwan, mounida takanig tonen. Ma̱wana simounid, ta-ivag nawotet, mounida kanig.
59003001	Sigwey yakamiy, awoum bukumlavags takatimlakay babaw yakamiy. Takatimlakay yakamey kukin sivinem bakakatimlakay, o nag gog bakavag, Yowbad singay bimop sinap towen bo nakavag, o yakamiy-vak ma̱wan.
59003002	Tut towen tabla̱bols ya̱kids. Kukin kal nag beibol anilivan waseg, adok gamag towen singay bwein, peinan kadilok bikaluweg ansinap tonen.
59003003	Tasenas tanmunum son vitulen wawudous mansiyas hos wasigeis. Man mansiyas kawka̱veks mo takavaveis takidumwa̱lus, bitouvins bineis ampalawen sivinads.
59003004	O wag ma̱wan, magat wag singay avakaein, o yag avakaein bitotow, tage kavaveis nag bivakaein, kakit; tage kadilok bitakavaveis, wag mo bisawl bein ampalawen sivinads.
59003005	E, a̱wads bo ma̱wan, woun wuliyougwan kakit, towen a̱wn, tage natawtoun singay-wan, bikaluweg youd babaw. Kov kakit kadiloka bivakanot bigob kay avakaein, beikous.
59003006	A̱wn gog mamagina kov, silawun kalbaleb singay-wan, kadiloka biyagages woun wuliyougwan babaw, adsinaps babaw biyageg beikous, peinan Seitan ivakanot youd babaw a̱wads waseg.
59003007	-
59003008	Tawaw ya̱kids kadilok bitakaleiwags wasigeis bulawud babaw, tasiyas wanawoud, tasiyas iyoyows wanakaew, tasiyas itatets wapwepway, o tasiyas wabwanit, e, bo takaleiwags wasigeis; tage nag kal kadilok bikaleiwag a̱wan waseg, peinan kalbaleb singay-wan, mamagina pwa̱tuw, kanig silma̱nin.
59003009	Kunages sigwey yakamiy, a̱wads waseg takavasis Tamads wanakaew, mogo tayages gamag tasiyas Yowbad nibunis, migis ma̱wana towen.
59003010	A̱wn katanok waseg isunap livan bwein son livan kalbaleb. Bo igak!
59003011	Tabta yuyeil sivtanok beibwab yevagam son yol? Adok nag.
59003012	Ta-ma̱wan bukukil soup bwanabwein yuyeil yayan waseg, nag. Tabta yaveinun waseg bukulep oliv anagin? O bukulep anagin yaveinun kay yagan gleip waseg? Adok nag, peinan nag kweitan sinap ma̱wan. Ta-ma̱wan a̱wn kalbaleb bilivan bwein.
59003013	Yakamiy tassinap o takatanaks yakamiy, awoum kwaypamwes sinap. Kadiloka kuwotets bwein. Gamag babaw mo bikakins amsinap bwein.
59003014	Tage kukin bimouvit dabam, o bukwamliw soum, nag kadilok bukwaypom sinap, peinan tayyaweid ya̱koum.
59003015	Sinap towen nag meinoy neim walba̱lab, nag; ven watinow sinapun, mamagina Seitan ansinap.
59003016	Kukin bukwaya̱pams o bukwameiliws, mo bukutavileiys bukulivis bukumlavags bod babaw yakamiy, o sinap babaw kalbaleb bisap wasigeis yakamiy.
59003017	Tage sinapun liba̱lab bwanabwein waseg bitasiwa̱youb, bitakagma̱num, bitakanow kaeig, bikalin nuwad sod, o bitaleb sod; nag bitayaweid o bitakatidavidav, nag.
59003018	Kukin gog bitasiwa̱youb va̱gan beikous kameiliw; wotet to didumwal; anagin wotet towen igaw beiwuw, yagan sinap didumwal.
59004001	Aveiyag wawun kukwammeiliws o kuvvatays simsimiyas wasigeis? Adok peinan amisinap yagan kaya̱pam, to ivag ninoumiy babaw.
59004002	Tamtimwamons yakamiy, kupwa̱kitsa nag; mapuna kuweiys gamag. Kunineivs, ta-ma̱wan bukuba̱nes, mapuna kukwammeiliws o kuvvatays. Bo igak! Nag kunitougs waseg Yowbad; mapuna nag bukuba̱nes.
59004003	Kukin bukunitougs, nag kuba̱nes, peinan mikanitoug kalbaleb. Mikanitoug kalbaleb peinan amisinap kaya̱pam.
59004004	Takalbalebs yakamiy, adok kupiyaves datoveks Yowbad. Peinan kukwawes sinapun ven watinow, adok kupiyaves sinapun Yowbad. Kukin beivag sivinamiy ven watinow sinapun mo bukwamliwes Yowbad.
59004005	Awoum kudokes makava livan towen kweiboug nilel mamagina, “Kululuwan, waseg towen Yowbad isen wanuwads singay ikalpwa̱kit wasigeis ya̱kids.”
59004006	Tage Yowbad singay ilabeids. Kweitan livan nises Bukitab waseg mamagina, “Tasiyas takaya̱pams Yowbad isilbwades; tage tasiyas tamma̱nums Yowbad bisiwyoubus kid.”
59004007	Kadiloka kutams Yowbad nakaleiwag waseg. E, kadiloka kupiyaves Seitan, mo bisawl.
59004008	Takalbalebs yakamiy, kusineikimas Yowbad waseg, Yowbad mo biwekeimiy yakamiy. Kuwidis amisinap kalbaleb; beivag ninoumiy katanok, sinap kamnat silma̱nin.
59004009	-
59004010	Kadiloka bigeg ninoumiy, peinan amisinap kalbaleb. Kuvva̱lams avakaein. Awoum kumwa̱saws o kugagigs, awoum. Bweina kuma̱nums wamatan Yowbad, igaw mo bilabeimiy, biyamweneimiy.
59004011	Sigwey, awoum kuvtokays livan simsimiyas wasigeis; awoum. Kal yak bukuvtok livan soum, o bukuyeg soum, mamagina kuyeg Yowbad nakaleiwag. Awoum. Kukin bukuyeg Yowbad nakaleiwag adok bo kupiyev kaleiwag towen, o bo bukumlavag takaleiwag teitan ya̱koum. Awoum.
59004012	Takaleiwag anmwa̱net-wan. Mtowen kadilok bikatinabweids o biyagageids. Makava gamag ya̱koum, awoum kuvtok livan soum.
59004013	Kunages agulivan guyawaw yakamiy. Awoum kulivans, “Nagein o nubweig bakaywout bakan palatan, bakasesun katanoka bweilim, bakakow mavavag singay babaw, bakamey.” Awoum.
59004014	Peinan nag kukwakins aveiyag bukulivatus nubweig, o asina̱vin bukukwanigs. Mwamovads gog mamagina wob, bisesun tut nag biveiyov, mo beikous.
59004015	Kadiloka bukulivans, “Magat daGuyaws nanon ma̱wan, bakasesuna mo bakawtel mawotet ma̱wan ma̱wan.”
59004016	Nagein gog kukwaypamwes amisinap, mamagina taga̱gas yakamiy. Sinap towen kalbaleb.
59004017	Kukin kal bikakin aw-wotet bwein tage bipiyev wotet towen, towen gog ansinap kalbaleb.
59005001	Kunages agulivan guyawaw yakamiy, kadiloka bukuva̱lams avakaein peinan mouvit singaya bukulivatus.
59005002	-
59005003	Miwliyoug babaw bipsa̱pwas; man bikaboulis amikweim; mimoney bipwapop peinan kwayuses; anpwapop bimlavag mamagina pa̱nous, biggob woumiy, nakabiyokous tut waseg, peinan singay babaw kwayuses.
59005004	Mayses tasiyas tawteleins mibag bo kwayuses, igaw nises wamibunatum. Money towen iwkuwak. Aygan bo iligen Tatawtoun Yowbad; mapuna bikatimop amisinap kalbaleb nukuvva̱ges.
59005005	Nukumwa̱saws ven watinow waseg, nukukwamkwams mamagina misagal yam babaw waseg.
59005006	Nukuyateles tasiyas toubweins mo nukuweiys. Nag ikatimapus amilivan. Makava nukuybilebes. E, Yowbad bikatimop amisinap guyawaw yakamiy.
59005007	Sigwey, kadiloka kwaptuleimiy, kusesus-wan ee... igaw daGuyaws vayuwein bisap. E, kuninuways tabgubag ansinap, ikapatul, igaw kweis beikweis wuwal waseg, wankuyeim bulbweilim beikweis kweis, mo bita̱yoy kan singay avakaein.
59005008	Bitawtoun amisinap, kwapatuls, peinan nuwanaw daGuyaws bisap.
59005009	Awoum kuvtokays livan simsimiyas wasigeis. Kukin bukuvtok livan soum, daGuyaws mo bikamta̱nim yak. Takaleiwag towen igaw wakoukwed nises; nuwanaw bisap.
59005010	-
59005011	Sigwey, kuninuways tasiyas palopit, kweiboug nikawes daGuyaws anilivan, abes singay igeg, tage ikaptules-wan. Kukin bukusesus ma̱wan, igaw mo bukumwa̱saws. Kweiboug Youb ma̱wan, a̱ban singay igeg, tage isesun-wan, Yowbad ikalin nuwan, wankuyeim mo isiwyoub avakaein. Yowbad nuwanen wasigeis ya̱kids singay avakaein.
59005012	Sigwey yakamiy, livan towen kuvna̱ses beibwein, awoum kutabdabods; awoum kutabdabods kal yagan waseg, walba̱lab o watinow; awoum. Magat bukutam, misinaka kulana, “Ee”; magat bukupiyev, kulana, “Nag”. Kukin kweitan livan bukusen mo beivag sinap kalbaleb, o Yowbad bikatimop sinap towen.
59005013	Kal yak a̱bam igeg, kadiloka kunitoug Yowbad waseg. Kal yak amnam ibwein, kadiloka kukwanuwel, kuyakawen Yowbad.
59005014	Kal yak bukukwatoun, kadiloka kudawes tasiyas mituwa̱vek tayekelesiys bimeis binitougs silma̱nim, bisenas tagon wa̱woum, daGuyaws yagan waseg.
59005015	Magat bukusimounids waseg Yowbad, o bukunitougs takatoun silma̱nin, daGuyaws mo bikatinob gamag towen, ankatoun mo beibwein. O magat ansinap kalbaleb, daGuyaws biwid, beikous.
59005016	E, kukwa̱mats amisinap kalbaleb, kulavewas, kunitougs pines simiyas, mo bukubweins. Kukin kal tadidumwal binitoug Yowbad waseg, Yowbad mo bitawtoun youd towen silma̱nin.
59005017	Ilaytiy kweiboug gimgilitoun ma̱wana ya̱kids, itawtoun inanitoug Yowbad waseg va̱gan nag beikweis kweis, Yowbad mo isilbwed kweis. Ta-ikweis kweis kweitoun bweilim, kweinim katanok tibukon. Makava ka̱las.
59005018	Ikous, Ilaytiy mo initoug vayuwein, e, mo ikweis kweis, pwepway ivag anagin.
59005019	-
59005020	Sigwey yakamiy, kukin soum tayekelesiy teitan, ansinap bwein, mo bipiyev sinap mounid, wankuyeim mo bukukidumwal, va̱gan takalbaleb towen bipiyev sinap yaweid. E, kuninuways, bukukidumwal gamag towen bo bukwatinob kululuwan; nag biyageg; nag. Peinan Yowbad biwid ansinap; e, youd babaw kalbaleb biwid beikous.
60001001	-
60001002	Yey Pita, takawein liva̱nen Yeisuw Kelis yey. Kalin nuwag Yeisuw nagamag yakamiy, tasiyas takalbalebs nikayabeimiy mo kugals vena babaw ibekena - Ponit, Galetiy, Kapedosiy, Esiy, o Binitiy. Tamads Yowbad bo ikayuseimiy, o Kululuwan ikayuseimiy va̱gan bukukwanawes aygan Yeisuw Kelis, o va̱gan buya̱vin waseg bisouwumiy. Bweina bisiwyoubumiy singay va̱gan beitaw nuwamiy.
60001003	-
60001004	Kalin nuwads Yowbad, mtowen daGuyaws Yeisuw Kelis Taman. Singay inok nuwan ya̱kids, bo iyakit Yeisuw Kelis kanig waseg, mapuna tanmises mounid biyakituds ya̱kids, mamagina mwamovads kweivaw nitaba̱nes, o dakiyays nitakawes. Dakiyays bwanabwein, nag beipwas, nag. Bo bises bisigeg. Tut towen nises walba̱lab, peinads.
60001005	Tasimounids waseg Yowbad mo bimtakavateids natawtoun waseg, va̱gan bikatinabweids. Nakabiyokous tut waseg mo bitakines abkatuneib towen.
60001006	-
60001007	Mapuna kumwa̱saws tage tut kayakus waseg abamiy bigeg peinan mimouvit kweitan kweitan biva̱ges. Abamiy kalbaleb waseg Yowbad biyakwaneimiy, bikin bukusimounids bwein, o nag? Ma̱wan goul bitagob, simwan bivakayev, anagin mo bitakow. Tage goul nag bises bisigeg, nag. Goul kalamwey-nen bwein, tage kukin bukusimounids, sinap towen singaya bwein. Kukin bukusimounids bwein, igaw Kelis bikamat wadaban pwepway mo singaya bikavasimiy.
60001008	Nag kukines wamtamiy Yeisuw Kelis, tage bo nukupwa̱kitsa waseg. Tut towen nag kukines, tage bo nukusimounids waseg, mo kumwa̱saws singay. Nag bitalivan!
60001009	Bweina kusimounida ee... igaw mo bikatinob kululuwamiy.
60001010	-
60001011	Tasiyas palopits kweiboug nikatigikes Yowbad nasiwa̱youb wasigeis ya̱kids; sivines kid bikakins ama̱wan bikatinabweids, ikatugwans va̱gan bikakins. Kelis Kululuwan waninous ikatimlakes mo ikakins Kelis a̱ban bigeg mo bimliguyaw wankuyeim, mapuna ikatugwans va̱gan bikakins kavel mtowen Kelis o asina̱vin bisap?
60001012	Kweiboug Yowbad ikatimlakes tasiyas palopits mo ikakins, nag biwotets pines tatineis tage pinamiy yakamiy. Peinan asilivan bwanabwein anagin mwana ikamat wasigeis yakamiy. Yowbad nikayeb Kululuwan Bwanabwein, meinoy neim walba̱lab ilabes tasiyas takaweins liva̱nen Yeisuw mo idibakeimiy livan towen bwanabwein. Min-liba̱lab sivines bikakins, nag gog.
60001013	Yakamiy gog bweina ninoumiy bitawtoun, kutitoukums; bweina kunmises beibwein va̱gan Yowbad nasiwa̱youb bisekeimiy. Igaw Yeisuw Kelis bikamat wadaban pwepway mo bisekeimiy.
60001014	Nitug yakamiy, bweina bukwanawes Yowbad aygan. Kweiboug tatagouwaws yakamiy, amivikeiy nikaliwageimiy. Awoum kukikunis vayuwein; awoum.
60001015	-
60001016	Ansinap kamnat mtowen nikatigikeids angamag ya̱kids, mapuna tatineimiy-nan beivag amisinap kamnat. Bukitab waseg Yowbad ilivan mamagina: “Beivag amisinap kamnat, peinan yey Takamnat yey.”
60001017	Mtowen Yowbad igaw mo bikatukin wasigeis ya̱kids, inakaleiwag katanok-wan bivkek gamag tatanok tatanok wasigeis. Magat dawotets bwein mo bikaleiwag dakabmwa̱saws bisekeids; kukin gog kalbaleb, bo kalbaleb. Mtowen tadokes Tamads, taninitougs waseg. Bweina bukugoulus mtowen, yam babaw nukusesus ven towen tobwag waseg.
60001018	-
60001019	Kweiboug kukikuns tammwayas sikaleiwag waseg, tage sinap towen nag ilabeimiy, tage Yowbad iyamiyiseimiy silma̱nin kweivaw ked. Nag iyamiyiseimiy moneyin ven watinow waseg, mamagina silib o goul; nag. Tage maysamiy buya̱vin Kelis, mamagina La̱miy lun bulukwan, singaya bwein ankakin, neiweiys pinamiy yakamiy. E buya̱vin Kelis nag bitamop mapun, nag.
60001020	Kweiboug Yowbad nikatigik Kelis nawotet, wankuyeim gog mo ibun ven watinow, nagein gog nakabiyokous tut waseg, mo ikamat wadaban pwepway peinads ya̱kids.
60001021	Kelis buya̱vin waseg niyamiyiseimiy mapuna kunmises va̱gan Yowbad bilabeimiy. Yowbad bo iyakit Kelis kanig waseg, isek naguyaw. Mtowen Yowbad kusimounids waseg, o kunmises va̱gan mo bilabeimiy.
60001022	Bweina bukwanawes livan mounid mo kululuwamiy bikamnat, o bukusiwyoubus mounid tasiyas tayakelesiys. E, kusiwa̱youbs simiyas wasigeis, siwa̱youb mounid waseg.
60001023	Yowbad bo isop anyoupeis, isob, mamagina mwamovads kweivaw. Youpeis towen nag beipwas, nag; peinan youpeis towen anilivan tatonen, o mwamovan nises waseg youpeis towen; waseg nag beikous, nag; bo bisesun-wan.
60001024	-
60001025	Liva̱nen sinap towen Bukitab waseg nises mamagina: “Gamag ven watinow mamagina awuyow. Butus mamagina awuyow la̱lan. Igaw awuyow bikalayag, mo la̱lan bitibta̱boul bein watinow. Tage Yowbad anilivan bises bisigeg.” Anilivan towen bulagan bwanabwein nigeiguys wasigeis yakamiy.
60002001	Bweina kupiyaves sinap kalbaleb, kameiliw, silponay, katidividav, silakod, wutokay livan.
60002002	Kadiloka ninoumiy kuva̱ges ma̱wan a̱pwaw yakamiy, va̱gan beivag sivinamiy sus bwanabwein silma̱nin kululuwamiy bitawtoun; bukumoums mo kululuwamiy bitubwes Yowbad nakatuneib silma̱nin.
60002003	Bo kusimkwanes daGuyaws nasiwa̱youb wasigeis yakamiy.
60002004	Kunekes Yeisuw, mtowen mamagina wululay, mwamov-wan. Gamag mwasanin bo ipiyaves, tage Yowbad singay sivinan; peinan bo ikatigik silma̱nin inawotet.
60002005	Yakamiy ma̱wana wululay mwamov yakamiy, bweina kululuwamiy biwlul mamagina nabunatum, mamagina natalineiluns bwana̱bweins yakamiy, mo Yeisuw Kelis bilabeimiy va̱gan Yowbad beitam amilun waseg, mamagina kululuwamiy waseg bukuluns.
60002006	Livan nises Bukitab waseg mamagina: “Bo batamnow gunkakol ven Sayon waseg, kakol bwana-bwein bo akatigik silma̱nin sol. Kukin kal bisimounid waseg gamag towen nag beivag anmwasin.”
60002007	Yakamiy tasimounid sivinamiy gamag towen, tage tasiyas nag isimounids, livnes nises mamagina: “Wululay towen tawteleins bunatum nipiyaves; tage bo imlavag anmwamwan bunatum.”
60002008	Kweitan-vak livan mamagina: “Gamag bikatpines kikeis wululay towen mo bikalouws.” Bo bikalivatows peinan isiplaves anilivan. Yowbad bo ilivnek ma̱wan.
60002009	Yakamiy gog Yowbad nikatigikeimiy angamag yakamiy, yakamiy tanuwgwes lun silma̱nin guyaw towen, yakamiy inabod bwanabwein, yakamiy Yowbad inagamag tatonen. Miwotet bukwamteles ama̱wan nikatigikeimiy tadadubs yakamiy, mo kusiws nakamnat avakaein waseg. E, bukwamteles nasiwa̱youb towen avakaein.
60002010	Kweiboug nag kweitan bod yakamiy, tage nagein bo nukumlavags Yowbad angamag yakamiy. Kweiboug nag inok nuwan yakamiy, nagein gog inok nuwan, ikatinabweimiy.
60002011	Sigwey, kadiloka kwatibomes woumiy anvikeiy, peinan biyageg kululuwamiy, peinan yakamiy mamagina taggobwaws yakamiy, o bwabwal yakamiy.
60002012	Beivag amisinap bwein wamtes tadadubs. Magat bivtokeimiy livan peinan bidokeimiy takalbalebs yakamiy, tage bikines miwotet bwanabwein, o yam towen Yowbad bilakwaneimiy mo biya̱kawns Yowbad waseg.
60002013	-
60002014	DaGuyaws angamag yakamiy, bweina bukutams waseg kaleiwag babaw ven watinow, magat tavakaein towen king, o takinew gabman tasiyas nikayabes silma̱nin bimapus takalbalebs o bikavasis tasiyas toubweins.
60002015	Yowbad sivinan beivag amisinap kamnat, mo bikineimiy tasiyas tatagouwaws, asilivan kabala̱wein; tage bikineimiy amisinap bwein, mo bika̱pays.
60002016	Awoum beivag amisinap ma̱wana tasiwun deil yakamiy, peinan yakamiy kunounas wamnat, ampalawen sivinamiy; tage awoum kunounas ked kalbaleb waseg, peinan Yowbad natouwat yakamiy.
60002017	Kuvna̱ses gamag babaw. Kusiwyoubus tasiyas tayekelesiys. Kugoulus Yowbad. Kuvna̱ses mtowen takaleiwag king avakaein.
60002018	Touwats yakamiy, kugoulus mituwa̱veks o kwanawes ages, takinew mituwa̱veks tasiwa̱youbs o tamma̱nums, o takinew tayakeikays tasiyas, bweina bukwanawes ages.
60002019	Kukin kal toubwein, mwasanis gamag biyagages makaw, a̱ban bigeg, tage binuway Yowbad, bikaptul, mo Yowbad bidok bwanabwein gamag towen.
60002020	Tage kukin amsinap kalbaleb mapuna biwaweims mo bukwaptuleim, nag amsinap bwanabwein towen, nag. Kukin gog amsinap bwein mo biyagageims o bukwaptuleim, Yowbad mo bidokeim gamag bwanabwein ya̱koum.
60002021	Ked towen silma̱nin Yowbad nikatigikeids, Kelis gog igeg a̱ban peinads, waseg ikatimlakeids ama̱wan bitabwa̱kuns waseg.
60002022	Nag ivag ansinap kalbaleb. Nag ikatidavis gamag, nag.
60002023	Tasiyas niyyages Yeisuw, tage nag ikatimop asilivan. A̱ban igeg, tage nag ikananeiy. Bo inamis waseg Yowbad, peinan ikakina Yowbad nakaleiwag didumwal.
60002024	Yeisuw anmwa̱net ikow adsinaps kalbaleb wakamweilok, won tatonen ikanig, va̱gan sinap kalbaleb bikanig wanuwads ya̱kids, wankuyeim mo bitamwamovs silma̱nin sinap didumwal. Ibasis won Yeisuw, mapuna ya̱kids tasesus bwein.
60002025	Kweiboug ya̱kids ma̱wana sip talasisulin ked, tage bo nitayums tanekes datamtakavatays mtowen takaymatein kululuwads.
60003001	-
60003002	Vinay yakamiy bweina kwanawes ages mimwa̱nas, va̱gan mwasinis mo bisimounids. Tut towen mwasinis nag ikanawes aygan Yowbad, tage bikineimiy amisinap bwanabwein, kamnat, mo bisimounids. Nag bukuguyes; misinaka amisinap bikines, mo bikanavin ninous.
60003003	-
60003004	Awoum kuninuways miguwa̱vin waseg bukusinats mo mikatubub bukusikams o dibeimiy bukutoumis bibabaw; tage bweina kuninuways amisinap ma̱num wanuwamiy. Yowbad singay sivinan sinap towen; bises nag beikous.
60003005	Namumwey bwana̱bweins kweiboug asisinap ma̱wan, inmises Yowbad bilabes o ikanawes simwa̱nas ages; mamagina astubub bwanabwein towen.
60003006	Ma̱wan Sela, ikanow aygan Ebelam, idok natovek towen; o yakamiy gog magat nag beivag amipwa̱yat, o bukuwwotets beibwein mo bukumlavags Sela nitun yakamiy.
60003007	Yakamiy-vak tawaw, bweina bukumtakavates mikwavas, kuvna̱ses, peinan vinay nag ivag sitawtoun ma̱wan yakamiy tawaw, tage asteiy son nakwav biba̱nes Yowbad nasiwa̱youb, mwamoves silma̱nin. E, kumtakavates mikwavas va̱gan nag aveiyag bisilbwed mikanitoug Yowbad waseg.
60003008	Kweitan livan nises, bweina bilaten ninoumiy tababaw yakamiy, bikalin nuwamiy kusiwa̱youbs simiyas wasigeis; kumma̱nums o binok nuwamiy simiyas wasigeis.
60003009	Kukin kal biyagageim, awoum kumop. Kukin kal bitawyageim, awoum kutawyeg. Tage amilivan siwa̱youb kudibakes. Yowbad bo ikatigikeimiy silma̱nin sinap siwa̱youb son ma̱num, va̱gan mo bisiwyoubumiy beibwein.
60003010	“Kukin kal sivinan bimwa̱saw, tut babaw kadiloka bipiyev livan kalbaleb; awoum bikatidividav;
60003011	Sinap kalbaleb bipiyev mo biwotet bwein; beivag sivinan sinap niwal, bitoukum silma̱nin.
60003012	Tut babaw daGuyaws imtakavates tasiyas tadidumwals; inganeg sikanitoug. Tage bo bisilbwed tasiyas takalbalebs.”
60003013	Kukin biseiw nuwamiy silma̱nin sinap bwein, nag teitan biyagageim.
60003014	-
60003015	Kukin gog gamag mwasanin biyagageims, peinan amsinap didumwal, Yowbad mo bisiwyoubumiy beibwein. Awoum kuninuways tasiyas; awoum bikubukub nuwamiy. Tage waninoumiy kugoulus daGuyaws Kelis. Asina̱vin gamag mwasanin bikatiga̱neimiy bilansa, “Aveiyag silma̱nin kunnamis?” Bweina bukwatimapus ages, tage kuvna̱ses amilivan kwagma̱nums-wan.
60003016	Beivag amisinap bwein, kamnat. Mwasanin tasiyas bitawyageimiy, peinan kuwteles Kelis inawotet bwanabwein, tage bikines amisinap bwein, mo beivag asimwasin.
60003017	Kukin Yowbad nanon ma̱wan, bweina bigeg a̱bads peinan adsinaps bwein. Tage awoum bigeg a̱bads sinap kalbaleb waseg.
60003018	-
60003020	Kelis-vak sivtanok imat peinads ya̱kids adsinaps kalbaleb. Mtowen toubwein; ya̱kids gog takalbalebs. Bo ikanig peinads va̱gan bitokeids binaweids Yowbad waseg. Bo iweiys won, tage Yowbad iyakit kululuwan, mo inoun in iguyes kululuwes tasiyas wa̱deil nisesus. Tasiyas kweiboug nag isimounids, tage Yowbad ikaptules, ikayamat, Now mo ivakaes inawag ikous. Wanuwan wag towen mo ikatinabwes asteiyuy gamag, teinim teitoun misinak. E, bo ikatinabwes yevagam waseg.
60003021	-
60003022	Tut nagein baptays mamagina yevagam towen bikatinabweimiy, nag peinan biwid amibik nises wawoumiy, tage mamagina nitoug waseg Yowbad va̱gan biwid adsinaps beibwein, peinan bo iyakit Yeisuw Kelis, inoun in walba̱lab, nises Yowbad wanaka̱tay, bo ikalliwages tasiyas takalleiwags kweitan kweitan nisesus walba̱lab.
60004001	-
60004002	Kelis gimgilitoun ven watinow ilivet mamayuy, kuninuways bigeg abamiy ma̱wan, mo bukutawtouns. Kukin kal mamayuy bilivet mo beikous ansinap kalbaleb. Ven watinow vikeiyan nag bikaluweg, tage igaw Yowbad mo bikalawagena oko amibweilim beikous ven watinow.
60004003	Kweiboug amisinap dadub waseg, ma̱wana sivines tasiyas tobwag ven gimgilis. Kweiboug amisinap kalbaleb bo misinak, tage tasiyas isisubwans, ikammeiliws, ikatuyouns va̱gan bimwamoums mo bikabala̱weins, o beivag asisinap kalbaleb, o tobwag yowbad siwotet biwteles.
60004004	Idokes yakamiy bukunekes silma̱nin bukwawna̱weins, silma̱nin sinap kalbaleb, nag gog. Mapuna igeg ninous mo itawyageimiy.
60004005	Tage igaw bikatimapus aygan Yowbad peinan biyateles. E, igaw mo biyateles tasiyas tamwamovs sisiyas takanigs.
60004006	Mapuna anilivan bwanabwein bo isekes-vak tasiyas takanigs. Kweiboug igaw tamwamovs tasiyas wadaban pwepway imapus asisinap kalbaleb, tage kululuwes mo bimwamovs, ma̱wana Yowbad.
60004007	Youd babaw sikabiyokous kakita bitalivatus ven watinow; mapuna kusinaps beibwein, kutitoukums silma̱nin bukunitougs bwein waseg Yowbad.
60004008	Bweina bukutoukums singay silma̱nin siwa̱youb simsimiyas wasigeis, peinan siwa̱youb biwid sinap kalbaleb babaw-wan.
60004009	Simiyas amibwabwal kuvna̱seimiy beibwein. Awoum kusiga̱nes.
60004010	Yowbad ansinap kweitan kweitan bo isiwyoub isekeimiy teitan teitan yakamiy. Bweina bukuwotets waseg, va̱gan bukulabes simiyas, ma̱wan Yowbad natouwat bwanabwein yakamiy.
60004011	Kukin kal bilivan, bweina bilivan mamagina Yowbad tonen anilivan. Kukin kal bilabes gamags, bweina bilabes mamagina Yowbad ikimtuw silma̱nin wotet towen. Mapuna youd babaw waseg, gamag bininuways Yeisuw Kelis mo biyakawanes Yowbad. Bweina bitakavasis takaleiwag towen tut nag beikous waseg. Eimen.
60004012	Sigwey, awoum bisunasun ninoumiy peinan abamiy bigeg singay. Abamiy bigeg va̱gan biyakwaneimiy. Awoum kudokes kid tobwag ked makadewen.
60004013	Tage bweina bukumwa̱saws peinan kulatanes simiy Kelis a̱ban nigeg waseg. Igaw tut wanakougwaw bisap son inakamnat avakaein mo bukumwa̱saws singay.
60004014	Adok gamag mwasanin bitawyageimiy peinan Kelis angamag yakamiy, tage kumwa̱saws-wan, peinan Yowbad Kululuwan kamnat nises wasigeis yakamiy va̱gan bukutawtouns.
60004015	Tage awoum bukuweiys gamag, awoum bukuveinaws, awoum bukusilakods, o bukusilponays, awoum. Kukin gamag bimapus amisinap ma̱wan kalbaleb, mo beivag amimwasin.
60004016	Tage kukin kal tayekelesiy ansinap kamnat mapuna gamag bitawyages, awoum beivag anmwasin. Bweina biyakawen Yowbad, Kelis yagan waseg.
60004017	Tut towen waseg, Yowbad bisilamaw bikatukin angamag wasigeis. Bo bimop adsinap kalbaleb, tage singaya bimop asisinap tasiyas tapiyaveins liva̱nen Yowbad.
60004018	Liva̱nen nises mamagina: “Singay avakaein inawotet va̱gan bikatinabwes tasiyas tadidumwals. Tage takalbalebs tapiyaveins Yowbad, bo biyamkwanes tasiyas.”
60004019	Mapuna tasiyas abes igeg kadiloka beivag asisinap kamnat. Kukin gog Yowbad nakaleiwag va̱gan tayekelesiys mwasanin abes bigeg, tage kadiloka bikamnat asisinap, o bweina bita̱mes kululuwes va̱gan towen tabunin youda babaw mo bimtakavet, peinan tatoukum mtowen.
60005001	-
60005003	Tamumwey yakamiy, kumtakavates Yowbad alen. Yey tamwey ma̱wan yakamiy, tage bo nakin Kelis ikanig waklos; o nakamnat igaw bitakines sigwey yakamiy mo bitamwa̱saws. Mapuna aguyeimiy va̱gan bukumtakavates Yowbad alen tasiyas nisesus wasigeis yakamiy. Biseiw nuwamiy silma̱nin wotet towen, awoum bukubgumats silma̱nin wotet. Kadiloka kutoukums. Awoum kuninuways maysan wotet, awoum. Awoum kuyakeikays wasigeis tasiyas, tage kadiloka kuva̱ges amisinap beibwein, va̱gan tasiyas bikaylasis amisinap.
60005004	Igaw towen tavakaein tamtakavatein alen mo bisap, mo bukuba̱nes amila̱lan silma̱nin mikamnat nag beikous.
60005005	Tabwa̱bwats yakamiy kwanawes ages tammwayas. Kumma̱nums tababaw yakamiy, simiyas wasigeis. “Yowbad gog bisilbwades tasiyas takaypamweins sinap, tage bisiwyoubus tasiyas tamma̱nums.”
60005006	Yowbad Tatawtoun bikaliwageimiy, bweina bukumma̱nums wamatan, tutan ikakin-wan mo biyamweneimiy.
60005007	Aveiyag silma̱nin ikubukub nuwamiy. Bweina kuta̱mes kululuwamiy va̱gan Yowbad bimtakavet, peinan ikalin nuwan wasigeis yakamiy.
60005008	Kumtakavateimiy, kutitoukums. Tasilbwadeimiy towen Seitan ininoun ma̱wan la̱yon nakananeiy, sivinan kid beikam gamag.
60005009	-
60005010	Kusimounids beibwein waseg Yowbad, mo kusibwades mtowen Seitan. Kukwakinsa tayekelesiys babaw ven watinow bo bigeg abes ma̱wana yakamiy. Igaw abamiy bigeg tut kayakus waseg, tassiwa̱youb towen Yowbad mo bikatilow abamiy beibwein, bikimtuweimiy mo bukutawtouns, peinan bo ilivnakeimiy Kelis waseg silma̱nin nakamnat nag beikous.
60005011	Kadilokena bikaleiwag tut nag beikous. Eimen.
60005012	Bwadads mtowen Saylos, akakina tatitoukum towen. Bo ilabeig mo kalel milet towen kayakus, waseg bo aguyeimiy, akatimlakeimiy Yowbad nasiwa̱youb mounid towen; bweina bukuvvaluts nasiwa̱youb waseg.
60005013	Yowbad nikatigik-vak na̱tan vin mana̱wen nises Babilon. Mana̱wen vin anilivan siwa̱youb wasigeis yakamiy. Natug Mak anilivan-vak ma̱wan.
60005014	Misiwa̱youb waseg kumulouls simiyas wasigeis. Tababawa yakamiy, Kelis angamag yakamiy, niwal bises wasigeis yakamiy. Yey Pita.
61001001	Yey Saymon Pita, Yeisuw Kelis natouwat yey, takawein anilivan. Milet balel beiw kuvinis yakamiy, nukusimounids waseg Yeisuw mo nukumwa̱saws ma̱wana yakamey. Nitasimounids peinan asteiy asisinap didumwal, daYowbads son Takatinabweids towen Yeisuw Kelis.
61001002	Kadiloka bukukwakins Yowbad son daGuyaws Yeisuw va̱gan bisiwyoubumiy singay mo beitaw nuwamiy.
61001003	-
61001004	Natawtoun waseg bo ilabeids mo isekeids youd babaw silma̱nin mwamovads o silma̱nin adsinaps kamnat. Bo ilabeids ma̱wan mamagina ikatimlakeids mo takakins mtowen nikatigikeids silma̱nin nakamnat tatonen son ansinap tonen bwanabwein, o youd babaw nikatigik mo itam wasigeis ya̱kids. Youd tasiyas singay bwanabwein, tawtoun, waseg bukulisawes ven watinow bikibik-nen, towen meinoy neim advikeiys kalbaleb waseg. E, bukulisawes ven watinow bikibik-nen va̱gan Yowbad ansinap bwanabwein bukukwawes.
61001005	-
61001007	Mapuna kutawtouns peinan tasimounids yakamiy, tage kadiloka misimounid bukwatimweisis wakunuwatan amisinap kamnat, mo kwatimweisis wakunuwatan sinap waninoumiy, mo kwatimweisis wakunuwatan kapatul, mo kwatimweisis wakunuwatan toukum, mo kwatimweisis wakunuwatan tapwa̱loul mounid, mo kwatimweisis wakunuwatan siwa̱youb sidayas wasigeis, mo kwatimweisis wakunuwatan siwa̱youb tatonen.
61001008	Kukin amisinap ma̱wan bwanabwein bituwal-wan, mo bukukwakin beibwein daGuyaws Yeisuw Kelis, mo bukuwotets beibwein. Nag beigwey mikawotet, nag.
61001009	Tage kukin kal nag ivag ansinap ma̱wan, towen mamagina toukwaw. Nuwanaw mo binumlev Yeisuw inawotet, waseg bo iwid ansinap kweiboug kalbaleb.
61001010	Mapuna sigwey, kutawtouns bwein, va̱gan bukusesus wanuwan Yowbad nikatigik-yay. Magat amisinap ma̱wan, nag bukukwalouws, nag.
61001011	Wankuyeim Yowbad mo beitam mounid va̱gan bukusiws wanuwan nakabkaleiwag mtowen takatinabweids, daGuyaws Yeisuw Kelis. Nakaleiwag towen nag beikous.
61001012	Mapuna tut babaw ivag sivinag bagguyeimiy va̱gan bukuninuways sinap tasiyas. Tage kukwakins-wan, o Yowbad anilivan mounid bo itawtoun wanuwamiy yakamiy.
61001013	Igaw son mwamovag nases ven watinow kadiloka bagguyeimiy va̱gan bukuninuways mo bukutawtouns.
61001014	Akakin-wan, igaw tut kayakus waseg mo balisow woug towen, peinan daGuyaws Yeisuw Kelis nikatimlakeig ma̱wan.
61001015	Bayokon gunawotet waseg va̱gan tutan bakanig ikous, mo bukuninuways youd tasiyas tuta babaw waseg.
61001016	Kweiboug kakatimlakeimiy daGuyaws Yeisuw Kelis inatawtoun, o inakabsunap ven watinow waseg. Amalivan waseg nag kataleiliw tassinaps mwasanin sitaleiliw, nag. Tage wamitem nakakin inatawtoun mo kadibakeimiy ma̱wan.
61001017	-
61001018	Peinan kweiboug simey Yeisuw, Yowbad inakoy wakunuwatan, Taman Yowbad mo isek naguyaw son nakamnat, o kaligen aygan meinoy neim walba̱lab mititeilin waseg, ilana, “Mtowen Natug bwanabwein, singay ibwein nanoug waseg.”
61001019	Mapuna kasimounid singay wasigeis tasiyas palopit asilivan, kweiboug nillivans. Tage yakamiy bweina bukunganegs beibwein, peinan ma̱wana wodam mititeilin ked dadub bimteil. Kuninuways oko bikiv lalayis o kubwan beipel mo bimteil kululuwamiy.
61001020	Kadiloka kukwakins wanamug tasiyas palopit asilivan Bukitab wanuwan. Nag gamag anmwa̱net biban silawun palopit asilivan, nag.
61001021	Tasiyas palopit nag ilivans ninous tatineis waseg, tage Kululuwan Bwanabwein isek ninous, mo ilivans Yowbad anilivan.
61002001	Tage palopit mwasanin tayyaweids nisaps wasigeis gamag. Ma̱wan-vak takatimlakays mwasanin bisilponays, bisaps wasigeis yakamiy mo bikatimlakays livan yaweid va̱gan biyagages gamags; bipiyaves-vak datoveks towen niyamiyiseids, mapuna bo bimop asisinap kalbaleb, biyagages.
61002002	Asisinap kalbaleb, gamag kalamwey babaw mo bikaylasis, biba̱sims o bikannavays mav ma̱wana tasiyas. Wankuyeim gamag kalisiy bikines asisinap kalbaleb mo biyagays, bilansa, “Tapwa̱loul towen kalbaleb, peinan tatapwa̱louls tasiyas asisinap singaya kalbaleb.” E, idakeds mounid, tage bo biyages tasiyas.
61002003	Mwamon mites tasiyas, asilivan yaweid mo bisilkodeimiy. Tut babaw sitakaleiwag ikayyamat va̱gan bimop asisinap kalbaleb. Nag imasis, nag. Igaw mo biyagages tasiyas.
61002004	Kweiboug min-liba̱lab mwasinis asisinap kalbaleb, tage Yowbad nag inok nuwan wasigeis tasiyas. Ilaves kid bo ineis wa̱Tum, ikaleiwag kid bisesusa wanuwan leg dadub oko igaw anatut waseg mo bikatukin wasigeis.
61002005	Tammwayas-vak iyagages kweiboug tutan Now waseg. Tage Now Yowbad ikatinob, mtowen tageiguy silma̱nin sinap didumwal, siney teinim teiy, tage takalbalebs babaw ven watinow ivag yevagam avakaein iwgweles.
61002006	Kalbaleb ven wunsiyas Sodom o Gomol igob mo imlavags pulikov, ikaleiwag va̱gan beikous wunsiyas ven, o va̱gan takalbalebs babaw bikines mo bika̱kin mites.
61002007	-
61002008	Tage misinaka toubwein mtowen Lot Yowbad nikatinob, singaya igeg nanon peinan ikaninavaysa mav sisiyas wasigeis o pwa̱daw biyagagays yam katanok katanok. Peinan yam babaw siney tasiyas nisesus ikin o iligen asisinap kalbaleb, mo igeg nanon singay.
61002009	DaGuyaws gog ikakina ama̱wan bikatinabwes tasiyas toubweins, sikabiyokon waseg; tage tasiyas takalbalebs Yowbad ikayus va̱gan bisesus sona sikalbaleb oko tut wanakougwaw mo bikamta̱nis igaw tutan bikatukin gamag wasigeis.
